0012.en: With this strange thought in her mind, the game started soon after. As the male leads of the novel, Ye Liang and Dongfang Yang were, of course, practically good at everything.
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 带着奇怪的念头，很快比赛就开始了，叶良和东方阳作为小说男主，自然是近乎全能的存在。

0012.en: The two teams were evenly matched, and one cool shot after another made most of the girls in the audience scream with excitement.
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 两边队伍打得难解难分，一个又一个帅气的投篮看得现场大部分女生都尖叫连连。

0012.en: Halfway through the match, Chi Xiaocheng sneaked a peek at Su Tao.
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 赛程过半，池小橙偷偷看了一眼苏桃。

0012.en: She saw that Su Tao's eyes were also sparkling with excitement.
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 只见苏桃双眼也是异彩连连。

0012.en: Although her feelings about her were complex.
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 她对她的思绪虽然复杂。

0012.en: It was clear that Su Tao also had a very good impression of the male leads.
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 可显然对几位男主也有着不少好感。

0012.en: Noticing the two unopened bottles of water beside her, Chi Xiaocheng's eyes shifted.
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 注意到她身边放着两瓶未开的矿泉水，池小橙转了转眼珠子。

0012.en: She turned to a boy behind her and said with a sweet smile, "Hey, could you do me a favor?"
0012.speaker: 池小橙
0012.cn: 转身看向身后的一个男生，甜甜笑道，“小哥哥，你能帮我一个忙吗？”

0012.en: The boy was taken aback by Chi Xiaocheng suddenly talking to him, and his eyes lingered on her cute, delicate face for a couple of seconds.
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 男生被池小橙忽然搭讪也是呆了一下，视线在那精致可爱的面容停滞了两秒。

0012.en: Chi Xiaocheng didn't mind, and even gave a playful blink.
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 池小橙也不介意，反倒是俏皮地眨了眨眼睛。

0012.en: The boy quickly snapped out of it and nodded nervously, "N-No problem."
0012.speaker: 陌生男1
0012.cn: 男生连忙回神，局促地点点头，“没...没问题的。”

0012.en: "I'm a bit thirsty. Could you buy two bottles of water for me?"
0012.speaker: 池小橙
0012.cn: “我有些口渴了，你能帮我买两瓶矿泉水回来可以吗？”

0012.en: "T-Two bottles?"
0012.speaker: 陌生男1
0012.cn: “两...两瓶是吗？”

0012.en: The boy nodded blankly, secretly happy.
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 男生呆呆地点了一下头，心中暗喜。

0012.en: He was thirsty too, so one bottle for each of them would be perfect.
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 正好他也口渴了，一人一瓶刚刚好。

0012.en: The game was still going on. The boy, with the pretty girl on his mind, ran back quickly. He handed one bottle to Chi Xiaocheng, but just as he was about to open the other one, he saw her reach out for it.
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 比赛还在继续，心系美少女的男生很快就跑了回来，先是将一瓶递给池小橙，另一瓶刚打算拧开瓶盖，却见池小橙又伸手过来。

0012.en: He froze for a second. "What's wrong?"
0012.speaker: 陌生男1
0012.cn: 他愣了一下，“怎么了？”

0012.en: "It was two bottles." Chi Xiaocheng said with an innocent face.
0012.speaker: 池小橙
0012.cn: “是两瓶呀。”池小橙一脸人畜无害。

0012.en: The boy looked at his friend next to him, then back at Chi Xiaocheng, confused. "Are you drinking two bottles by yourself?"
0012.speaker: 陌生男1
0012.cn: 男生不解地看了眼旁边的兄弟，又看向池小橙，“你一个人喝两瓶？”

0012.en: "Oh, they're not for me. I'm giving them to Ye Liang and Dongfang Yang later."
0012.speaker: 池小橙
0012.cn: “哦，我不是自己喝的，一会儿要送给叶良和东方阳。”

0012.en: These simple, plain words instantly made the boy's heart sink.
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 朴实平淡的话语，瞬间让男生心凉了。

0012.en: I bought water for a pretty girl, and she's using the water I bought to give to other guys.
0012.speaker: 陌生男1
0012.cn: 我买水给美少女，美少女用我买的水送给其他男人。

0012.en: "Then what does that make me?"
0012.speaker: 陌生男1
0012.cn: 那我算什么？

0012.en: He numbly handed over the water. Then, he saw Chi Xiaocheng take out her small wallet and pull out a 5-yuan bill.
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 呆呆地把水递过去，男生又见池小橙拿出小钱包，从中抽了一张5元钱出来。

0012.en: She placed it in his hand. "Thank you, little bro~"
0012.speaker: 池小橙
0012.cn: 交到他的手中，“谢谢小哥哥~”

0012.en: Two bottles of water only cost four yuan.
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 两瓶水只要四块钱。

0012.en: She even gave him a one-yuan tip for running the errand!
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 她甚至还给了一块钱的跑腿费！

0012.en: The boy felt his nose turning red and as if he was wearing a clown's frizzy wig.
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 男生只觉得自己此刻鼻子渐渐变红，头上好似戴了一头爆炸的假发。

0012.en: His love story was over before it even began.
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 爱情还没开始，就已经结束了。

0012.en: His friend next to him silently patted his shoulder and stood up. "Let's go, or Batman will be here to catch the Joker soon."
0012.speaker: 陌生男1
0012.cn: 旁边的兄弟沉默地拍了拍男生的肩膀，站起身，“走吧，不然一会儿蝙蝠侠就要来抓小丑了。”

0012.en: Soon, the first half of the game ended.
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 很快，比赛上半场结束。

0012.en: Ye Liang's blue team was in the lead.
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 叶良所在的蓝队占优。

0012.en: It was break time.
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 进入休息时间。

0012.en: The boys on both teams were drenched in sweat, and girls were constantly giving them water and towels, except for Ye Liang and Dongfang Yang.
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 两边队伍的男生都大汗淋漓，不断有女生为他们送水和毛巾，除了叶良和东方阳。

0012.en: These two were true campus idols, famous and well-respected, so most people didn't dare to approach them.
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 这两位是实打实的校草，在学校名声大，威望高，常人根本不敢去接触。

0012.en: Besides, didn't everyone know they were both pursuing Su Tao?
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 并且，谁不知道，他们都在追求苏桃？

0012.en: The main character was right here, after all.
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 正主都还在这儿呢。

0012.en: Just as Su Tao picked up a bottle of water and was about to get up.
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 只见苏桃拿起一瓶水，刚好起身。

0012.en: Another small figure was faster than her.
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 另一个娇小的身影比她还快。

0012.en: Chi Xiaocheng grabbed a bottle of water, trotted over to Dongfang Yang, and showed a silly smile. "Master Dongfang, would you like some water?"
0012.speaker: 池小橙
0012.cn: 池小橙拿起一瓶水，迈着小步子跑到了东方阳面前，露出傻傻的笑容，“东方少爷，要喝水吗？”

0012.en: She held the water with both hands, her face full of anticipation.
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 她双手将水捧着，面怀期待。

0012.en: It was as if this was some precious treasure.
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 好似这是什么珍贵的宝物。

0012.en: Dongfang Yang chuckled and shook his head. "No, thank you."
0012.speaker: 东方阳
0012.cn: 东方阳轻笑了一声，又摇摇头，“不需要，谢谢。”

0012.en: Although his opinion of Chi Xiaocheng had changed, he definitely wouldn't accept water from her in front of everyone.
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 他虽然对池小橙有所改观，但肯定不会在众目睽睽之下接受她送的水。

0012.en: Especially not in front of Su Tao.
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 特别还是在苏桃面前。

0012.en: Seeing this, the disappointment on Chi Xiaocheng's face flashed for a moment.
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 见此，池小橙脸上的失望一闪而逝。

0012.en: With a burst of great acting, she let Dongfang Yang catch that trace of emotion, then forced a smile. "If you want some water, you can tell me."
0012.speaker: 池小橙
0012.cn: 演技大爆发的她，很好地让东方阳捕捉到了痕迹后，挤出牵强的笑容，“如果要喝水的话，可以和我说哦。”

0012.en: She turned around.
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 她转过身。

0012.en: The System's voice echoed in her mind.
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 脑海里响起系统的声音。

0012.en: 【Emotion Points +4...】
0012.speaker: 系统

0012.en: 【Emotion Points +7...】
0012.speaker: 系统

0012.en: 【Emotion Points +2...】
0012.speaker: 系统

0012.en: Dongfang Yang was surprised that she still dared to give him water in front of so many people, especially when Su Tao had already stood up.
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 东方阳在惊讶她竟然还敢在那么多人的眼前给自己送水，明明苏桃都站起来了。

0012.en: "She's doing this on purpose!"
0012.speaker: 东方阳
0012.cn: 这是故意的啊！

0012.en: Of course, Chi Xiaocheng was doing it on purpose.
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 池小橙当然是故意的。

0012.en: She just didn't expect to earn some Emotion Points this way.
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 只是她没想到这样还能赚一些情绪值。

0012.en: So, she turned around again.
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 于是一转身。

0012.en: And walked towards Ye Liang.
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 走向了叶良。

0012.en: That silly smile instantly turned a little fearful as she stood before him, holding out the water bottle with both hands.
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 那傻傻的笑容刹那间变得有些害怕，站在他面前双手将矿泉水递上去时。

0012.en: Before she could even speak.
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 还未开口。

0012.en: Ye Liang slapped the water bottle to the ground.
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 叶良一巴掌就将矿泉水给拍到地上。

0012.en: "How dare you show up in front of me and pretend? Get lost!"
0012.speaker: 叶良
0012.cn: “你居然还敢出现在我面前装模作样，给我滚！”

0012.en: His voice was filled with anger, and his annoyance also provided Chi Xiaocheng with 23 Emotion Points.
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 声音夹带着些许怒气，因为厌烦，同样为池小橙提供了23点情绪。

0012.en: The water bottle rolled a few times and stopped at the feet of a girl with bleached-blonde hair.
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 矿泉水滚了好几圈，停在了一个黄毛女生的脚下。

0012.en: She stepped on it.
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 一脚踩上。

0012.en: The girl looked at Chi Xiaocheng with a sneer.
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 女生讥讽地看着池小橙。

0012.en: The small figure stood in the empty space cleared by the crowd, looking so wronged and helpless.
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 那个小小的身影站在一片被人挪腾出来的空地上，显得是那样的委屈、无助。

0012.en: Seeing this, Dongfang Yang frowned and couldn't help but say to Ye Liang, "Was that necessary? There are so many people here, watch your image."
0012.speaker: 东方阳
0012.cn: 东方阳见状，皱了皱眉，不免对叶良道，“没必要吧，这里人那么多呢，注意点形象。”

0012.en: Ye Liang snorted coldly. "What, Dongfang Yang, you feel sorry for this girl now? I haven't even settled the score with her yet and she dares to come near. If Su Tao hadn't stopped me, she would have disappeared from this school yesterday. Just looking at her makes me want to puke."
0012.speaker: 叶良
0012.cn: 叶良冷哼一声，“怎么，东方阳你还同情起这个家伙了，我都还没找她算账呢还敢凑过来，如果不是苏桃拦着，昨天她就该在这个学校消失了，看着她我就想呕。”

0012.en: From beginning to end, he never looked at Chi Xiaocheng directly.
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 自始至终，他都没正眼看过池小橙。

0012.en: That pale, makeup-free face was pitiful, but if you don't look, how can you be charmed?
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 那张惨白的素颜小脸蛋很让人怜惜，但不去看，又怎么会被魅惑呢？

0012.en: Chi Xiaocheng walked back to her seat, looking lost. She picked up the last bottle of water and slowly looked at Su Tao. "Tao Tao, do you... want some water?"
0012.speaker: 池小橙
0012.cn: 池小橙失魂落魄地回到自己的位置，又拿起最后一瓶矿泉水，慢慢看向了苏桃，“桃桃，你...要喝水吗？”

0012.en: After being rejected by two people in a row.
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 连续被两个人拒绝。

0012.en: She seemed to be looking for some comfort.
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 她似乎在寻找心灵寄托。

0012.en: Seeing Chi Xiaocheng's sad expression and poor state, Su Tao wanted to take the water and comfort her.
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 眼见池小橙神情和状态都很差，苏桃想将水接过并安慰一下她。

0012.en: But Ye Liang walked over from a distance, huffing coldly.
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 可叶良，又从远处走来，冷冷地哼了一声。

0012.en: Su Tao shrank back, glanced at him, and after hesitating, she shook her head. "Sorry, Xiaocheng, I'm not thirsty right now. I don't really want any water."
0012.speaker: 苏桃
0012.cn: 苏桃缩了缩脖子，看了一眼他后，犹豫再三还是摇了摇头，“抱歉小橙，我现在不渴，不太想喝水。”

0012.en: "Thud!"
0012.speaker: 旁白

0012.en: The water bottle she was holding fell heavily to the ground.
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 被她拿在手中的矿泉水，重重地掉在了地面。

0012.en: The onlookers who were just watching the drama now looked at her with either scorn or pity.
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 周遭原本看戏的眼神，也渐渐变得或讥讽、或怜悯。

0012.en: "I see, so Tao Tao doesn't want water..."
0012.speaker: 池小橙
0012.cn: “这样呀，原来桃桃不想喝水……”

0012.en: Chi Xiaocheng's voice was quiet, but it was just loud enough for Su Tao to hear.
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 池小橙声音不大，却又恰好传到苏桃耳中。

0012.en: She handed a bottle of water to Ye Liang, then turned her head and saw a faint smile on Chi Xiaocheng's lips. Her crimson eyes reflected the action of her handing over the water.
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 她拿着一瓶水递给叶良，又转过头，发现池小橙嘴角挂着若有若无的笑容，赤红的眸子倒映着她递水的动作。

0012.en: Her pupils seemed to have no light in them, completely empty.
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 瞳孔好似没有高光，空洞无比。

0012.en: That dazed expression seemed to be sending Su Tao a message.
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 那失神的表情就仿佛在给苏桃传递一个信息。

0012.en: Chi Xiaocheng's world.
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 池小橙的天。

0012.en: Had collapsed.
0012.speaker: 旁白
0012.cn: 塌了。

0013.en: Chapter 13: Say That Again!
0013.speaker: 旁白
0013.cn: 第13章 你再说一遍！

0013.en: "Host, you could win an Oscar for that performance! It was amazing. If I were the female lead, I'd get goosebumps from you staring at me like that. It's so creepy."
0013.speaker: 系统
0013.cn: 【宿主，你都可以去拿奥斯卡小金人了，演得简直也太棒了，我要是女主，被你这么盯着鸡皮疙瘩都得起来，太渗人了】

0013.en: "You don't understand. This is a sign that I'm turning into a villain. Only by making Su Tao anxious and keeping her thinking about me can I continuously get Emotion Points from her and proceed with the next step of my plan."
0013.speaker: 池小橙
0013.cn: “你不懂，我这样的表现是黑化的前兆，只有让苏桃心神不宁，时时刻刻想着我，我才能从她身上源源不断获取情绪值，并且进行下一步的计划。”

0013.en: "I can't wait to see you outsmart the female lead! When are we starting? When are we starting!"
0013.speaker: 系统
0013.cn: 【我已经迫不及待想要看到宿主你拿捏女主了，什么时候行动，什么时候行动！】

0013.en: "You're just a system. What's the rush?"
0013.speaker: 池小橙
0013.cn: “你一个破系统，你急什么？”

0013.en: "We're the villains here, and a villain has to look the part. If I didn't know your situation, I'd think you were a real yandere."
0013.speaker: 系统
0013.cn: 【我们都是反派啊，反派当然要有反派的样子，要不是知道宿主你的情况，我都以为你真的是个病娇了】

0013.en: Chi Xiaocheng walked into the crowd, looking dejected, and the onlookers automatically cleared a path for her.
0013.speaker: 旁白
0013.cn: 池小橙失落地往人群中走去，围观的群众不由自主地给她让出一条出去的道路。

0013.en: With her head lowered and back hunched, her brown hair hiding her eyes, she looked utterly dejected.
0013.speaker: 旁白
0013.cn: 现在的她垂着头，驼着背，茶色的秀发盖过眼眸，显得是那么落魄。

0013.en: But in her mind, she was happily chatting with the System.
0013.speaker: 旁白
0013.cn: 但在脑海中，却和系统聊得不亦乐乎。

0013.en: At the same time, Chi Xiaocheng realized that her situation at school was a bit strange.
0013.speaker: 旁白
0013.cn: 同时，池小橙也发现了，原主在学校的处境有些微妙。

0013.en: Thanks to her delicate and cute face, some strangers and classmates she knew were quite nice to her.
0013.speaker: 旁白
0013.cn: 凭着这张娇弱可爱的小脸，一些路人和认识的同学，对池小橙的态度都挺好的。

0013.en: But anyone associated with the main characters like Ye Liang and Dongfang Yang treated her terribly.
0013.speaker: 旁白
0013.cn: 但只要与叶良、东方阳等主角相关周边的人，对她的态度就极差。

0013.en: There were also some from high school who never got along with the original owner.
0013.speaker: 旁白
0013.cn: 还有一部分在高中时就和原主不对付的

0013.en: Just as Chi Xiaocheng was thinking and walking towards her dorm to rest, she suddenly heard a voice from a quiet path lined with bushes.
0013.speaker: 旁白
0013.cn: 就在池小橙一边思考一边走向自己宿舍打算休息时，就在一条尽是灌木丛的幽静小道，身后陡然传来了声音。

0013.en: "Hey, Chi Xiaocheng!"
0013.speaker: 陌生女1
0013.cn: “喂，池小橙！”

0013.en: Hearing the voice, Chi Xiaocheng stopped and slowly turned around.
0013.speaker: 旁白
0013.cn: 闻言，池小橙止住了身形，徐徐转身。

0013.en: A girl with blonde hair, wearing a crop top and a short skirt, walked over slowly with her hands in her pockets.
0013.speaker: 旁白
0013.cn: 一个穿着露脐装、小短裙的黄毛女生双手插兜，慢悠悠地走了过来。

0013.en: Behind her was a gloomy-looking follower with black-framed glasses and messy hair, her head lowered.
0013.speaker: 旁白
0013.cn: 她的身后还有一个戴着黑框眼镜，披散头发，低着头一脸阴沉的跟班。

0013.en: Chi Xiaocheng frowned when she saw her.
0013.speaker: 旁白
0013.cn: 池小橙见到她皱了皱眉。

0013.en: This was the same blonde girl from the basketball court who had stepped on the water bottle she dropped.
0013.speaker: 旁白
0013.cn: 这人正是刚刚在球场，踩住她掉下那瓶水的黄毛女生。

0013.en: She was also a bully who had picked on the original owner in high school.
0013.speaker: 旁白
0013.cn: 同时也是在高中霸凌原主的一个不良少女。

0013.en: Beating up the original owner used to be a regular thing, and she had continued to bother her often during the first two months of university.
0013.speaker: 旁白
0013.cn: 以前对原主拳脚相加那是常态，上了大学，这两个月依旧时常找原主麻烦。

0013.en: Huang Limei gently pushed aside a small bush, slowly walked up to Chi Xiaocheng, and said with an arrogant look, "Well, if it isn't Chi Xiaocheng. Why aren't you wearing your pretty makeup today? Pretending to be innocent and delivering water, who are you trying to seduce?"
0013.speaker: 黄莉梅
0013.cn: 黄莉梅用手轻轻拨弄小树丛，慢悠悠地走到池小橙面前，一脸嚣张，“哟，这不是池小橙吗，今天怎么没化你那美美的妆啊，还装纯去送水，勾引谁呢？”

0013.en: The hostility was obvious, and her classic villain tone made Chi Xiaocheng reflect.
0013.speaker: 旁白
0013.cn: 敌意毫不掩饰，反派特有的语气让池小橙不由反思了起来。

0013.en: She felt that she wasn't much of a villain.
0013.speaker: 旁白
0013.cn: 总感觉自己不像是反派。

0013.en: This tone and expression, this must be what a real cannon fodder villain is like, right?
0013.speaker: 旁白
0013.cn: 这样的语气、表情才是真正的炮灰反派吧？

0013.en: Glancing at the security camera on the corner of the building, Chi Xiaocheng maintained her act.
0013.speaker: 旁白
0013.cn: 不动声色地瞥了眼右上小楼墙角的摄像头，池小橙还是保持了一贯的演技。

0013.en: She shrank back and said cautiously to Huang Limei, "What do you want?"
0013.speaker: 池小橙
0013.cn: 缩了缩脖子后，对黄莉梅警惕道，“你想做什么？”

0013.en: "I don't like you. You got a problem with that?"
0013.speaker: 黄莉梅
0013.cn: “看你不爽，有问题吗？”

0013.en: She grabbed the collar of Chi Xiaocheng's sweatshirt and lifted her up with one hand.
0013.speaker: 旁白
0013.cn: 她一把拽住池小橙的卫衣领口，竟是单手将她给提了起来。

0013.en: Her arm, tattooed with a butterfly, had bulging muscles, not at all like a typical girl's.
0013.speaker: 旁白
0013.cn: 那纹着花蝴蝶的臂膀，鼓起一块块肌肉，哪里像是一个普通的女孩子。

0013.en: This was Chi Xiaocheng's biggest weakness since she had crossed over.
0013.speaker: 旁白
0013.cn: 这也是池小橙穿越以来绝对的弱项。

0013.en: Her body was too weak.
0013.speaker: 旁白
0013.cn: 身体太弱了。

0013.en: She would lose any physical fight, and even with the System, she couldn't change that overnight.
0013.speaker: 旁白
0013.cn: 只要涉及打架基本就是会输，即便有了系统也无法短时间改变这点。

0013.en: Huang Limei threatened Chi Xiaocheng, saying fiercely, "I'm warning you, stay away from Dongfang Yang. That's the man I've got my eyes on!"
0013.speaker: 黄莉梅
0013.cn: 黄莉梅威胁着池小橙，恶狠狠说道，“我警告你，别接近东方阳，那是老子看上的男人！”

0013.en: "Pfft."
0013.speaker: 池小橙
0013.cn: “噗嗤。”

0013.en: Chi Xiaocheng, who had been acting the whole time, couldn't help but let out a laugh.
0013.speaker: 旁白
0013.cn: 一直演技在线的池小橙，还是没绷住笑出了声。

0013.en: To think it was because of the male lead.
0013.speaker: 旁白
0013.cn: 没想到居然还是因为男主。

0013.en: In this novel world, these main characters really were the source of all trouble.
0013.speaker: 旁白
0013.cn: 在这小说世界中，这些主角还真就是万恶之源啊。

0013.en: But in Huang Limei's eyes, Chi Xiaocheng's suppressed laugh was mocking her.
0013.speaker: 旁白
0013.cn: 可在黄莉梅眼里，池小橙这没憋住的笑就是在嘲讽她。

0013.en: Her expression darkened as she stared at Chi Xiaocheng's clean, makeup-free face.
0013.speaker: 旁白
0013.cn: 她的眼神渐渐沉了下来，死死地盯着池小橙白净的素颜小脸。

0013.en: "You think it's funny?"
0013.speaker: 黄莉梅
0013.cn: “很好笑吗？”

0013.en: She raised a hand, her voice turning cold.
0013.speaker: 旁白
0013.cn: 她举起一只手，声音寒了下来。

0013.en: Seeing this, Chi Xiaocheng dropped the act and said calmly, "Are you sure you want to do this? This is a university, not our old high school. The school won't side with you anymore, even if you have good grades."
0013.speaker: 池小橙
0013.cn: 池小橙见状，也不装了，眼神平淡地说道，“你确定要动手吗，这里是大学，可不是咱们以前的那破高中，就算你成绩好校方也不会站在你这边了。”

0013.en: At the same time, she quickly searched the System for a way to fight back.
0013.speaker: 旁白
0013.cn: 同时，迅速在系统内搜寻着可以反制的手段。

0013.en: She had just reached 200 Emotion Points. She could either spend 150 points on a temporary strength pill.
0013.speaker: 旁白
0013.cn: 她的情绪值如今刚好到200点，要么是花150点买临时加力量的药丸。

0013.en: Or spend 10 Emotion Points on a fruit knife and go all out.
0013.speaker: 旁白
0013.cn: 要么是10点情绪值的水果刀一不做二不休。

0013.en: Or, she could endure it.
0013.speaker: 旁白
0013.cn: 或者，忍下来

0013.en: Just then, the gloomy follower behind Huang Limei said weakly, "There's a camera up there. Maybe we should forget it?"
0013.speaker: 陌生女2
0013.cn: 这时，黄莉梅身后阴沉的散发跟班也弱弱说道，“头上有摄像头，要不还是算了吧？”

0013.en: Huang Limei looked up abruptly, her face growing even uglier.
0013.speaker: 旁白
0013.cn: 黄莉梅陡然抬头，脸色更难看了。

0013.en: Her raised right hand trembled; she was stuck, not knowing whether to hit her or not.
0013.speaker: 旁白
0013.cn: 举着的一只右手颤抖了一下，打也不是不打也不是。

0013.en: Chi Xiaocheng secretly breathed a sigh of relief.
0013.speaker: 旁白
0013.cn: 池小橙心底暗暗松了口气。

0013.en: But just then, she spotted a figure walking quickly towards them.
0013.speaker: 旁白
0013.cn: 可就在这时，她又眼尖地看到一个人影迅速朝这边走来。

0013.en: An idea popped into her head.
0013.speaker: 旁白
0013.cn: 眼珠子一转。

0013.en: She looked at Huang Limei provocatively. "Afraid to hit me? Useless!"
0013.speaker: 池小橙
0013.cn: 挑衅地看着黄莉梅，“不敢打吗？废物！”

0013.en: "Say that again!"
0013.speaker: 黄莉梅
0013.cn: “你再说一遍！”

0013.en: The veins on Huang Limei's raised right hand bulged, and she slapped Chi Xiaocheng hard across the face.
0013.speaker: 旁白
0013.cn: 黄莉梅举着的右手青筋陡然暴起，对着她的脸重重抽下。

0013.en: "Smack—"
0013.speaker: 旁白

0013.en: A crisp sound echoed, and the delicate face quickly turned red.
0013.speaker: 旁白
0013.cn: 一声脆响，娇弱的脸蛋迅速红了起来。

0013.en: Even though Chi Xiaocheng had a mid-level pain reduction skill, the slap still made her gasp.
0013.speaker: 旁白
0013.cn: 即便池小橙有着中级的疼痛减免技能，这一巴掌还是让她倒吸了一口凉气。

0013.en: But... she had achieved her goal.
0013.speaker: 旁白
0013.cn: 不过...目的达到了。

0013.en: "What are you doing!"
0013.speaker: 苏桃
0013.cn: “你们在干什么！”

0013.en: A hero arrives.
0013.speaker: 旁白
0013.cn: 英雄降临。

0013.en: The person who came was Su Tao!
0013.speaker: 旁白
0013.cn: 来的人正是苏桃！

0013.en: She rushed over and saw Chi Xiaocheng, who had just been slapped and was now in tears. "Xiaocheng!" she exclaimed.
0013.speaker: 苏桃
0013.cn: 她三步并两步走了过来，却见被扇了一巴掌，正直流泪水的池小橙，惊呼出声，“小橙！”

0013.en: Huang Limei threw Chi Xiaocheng to the ground and turned with a cold look. "What, Su Tao? You still want to protect this bitch like you did in high school? She's been going against you at every turn!"
0013.speaker: 黄莉梅
0013.cn: 黄莉梅将池小橙往地板一扔，转头眼神冰冷，“怎么苏桃，你还想和高中一样维护这个贱人吗，她可是处处针对你的！”

0013.en: Su Tao's eyes were icy, her pretty face expressionless. "No matter what, Xiaocheng is my sister!"
0013.speaker: 苏桃
0013.cn: 苏桃眼神冰冷，一张俏脸面无表情，“再怎么说，小橙也是我的妹妹！”

0013.en: "Such an act! I've been wanting to teach you a lesson for a long time!"
0013.speaker: 黄莉梅
0013.cn: “装模作样，老子看你不爽很久了！”

0013.en: Huang Limei gathered her strength and threw a heavy punch.
0013.speaker: 旁白
0013.cn: 黄莉梅鼓足力量，重重地一拳挥去。

0013.en: However, she didn't expect Su Tao to be a pushover. Su Tao quickly sidestepped the punch and grabbed her right hand.
0013.speaker: 旁白
0013.cn: 然而，她没料到苏桃也不是省油的灯，迅捷地侧身躲过直拳后，借势扣住她的右手。

0013.en: Getting in close, she executed a clean shoulder throw!
0013.speaker: 旁白
0013.cn: 一贴身，便是一个利落的过肩摔！

0013.en: "Ah!"
0013.speaker: 黄莉梅

0013.en: Before the thrown Huang Limei could react, Su Tao pulled her up and kneed her hard in the stomach!
0013.speaker: 旁白
0013.cn: 不待被摔在地的黄莉梅反应，又是将她扶起，重重一个膝击肘在了她的小腹！

0013.en: Huang Limei coughed up stomach acid, her face twisted in pain.
0013.speaker: 旁白
0013.cn: 一口胃液吐出，黄莉梅的脸狰狞又痛苦。

0013.en: Su Tao snorted, grabbed Huang Limei's hair, and walked over to Chi Xiaocheng. "Xiaocheng, how many times did she slap you?"
0013.speaker: 苏桃
0013.cn: 苏桃冷哼了一声，一把扯住黄莉梅的头发，走到池小橙身边，“小橙，她刚刚打了你多少巴掌？”

0013.en: Her commanding eyes softened when she spoke.
0013.speaker: 旁白
0013.cn: 那强势的眼神，在说话时柔然温柔了不少。

0013.en: She looked at her red cheek with a hint of heartache.
0013.speaker: 旁白
0013.cn: 看着她那涨红起来的小脸蛋，还有点点心疼。

0013.en: "O-one slap."
0013.speaker: 池小橙

0013.en: "Okay." Su Tao nodded, brushed back her hair, and raised her right hand, slapping it hard across Huang Limei's face.
0013.speaker: 旁白
0013.cn: “好。”苏桃点了点头，一撩秀发，举起右掌便是重重落在黄莉梅脸上。

0013.en: "Smack!"
0013.speaker: 旁白

0013.en: The sound was even louder than Huang Limei's slap had been.
0013.speaker: 旁白
0013.cn: 声音比之前黄莉梅的一掌有过之而无不及。

0013.en: A trickle of red blood flowed from the corner of Huang Limei's lips.
0013.speaker: 旁白
0013.cn: 一抹殷红，从黄莉梅的唇角流出。

0013.en: Her face quickly began to swell.
0013.speaker: 旁白
0013.cn: 她的脸迅速肿了起来。

0013.en: Tossing Huang Limei aside like a piece of trash, Su Tao dusted off her hands. The entire sequence happened in less than a minute, and she moved with such fluid grace.
0013.speaker: 旁白
0013.cn: 如扔垃圾一样将黄莉梅丢掉，苏桃这才嫌弃地拍了拍手，整套动作的发生不过短短一分钟，她是那样的行云流水。

0013.en: Cool and impressive.
0013.speaker: 旁白
0013.cn: 飒爽帅气。

0013.en: Chi Xiaocheng was completely stunned.
0013.speaker: 旁白
0013.cn: 直接把池小橙看呆了。

0013.en: She thought she finally understood why so many people would willingly fall for this "white moonlight" female lead.
0013.speaker: 旁白
0013.cn: 她好像知道，为什么那么多人都会心甘情愿拜倒在这位白月光女主的裙下了。

0013.en: She had only intended to get slapped to receive some gentle concern from the female lead.
0013.speaker: 旁白
0013.cn: 她原本只是想挨一巴掌以此获得女主温柔的关心。

0013.en: She had forgotten that Su Tao's character was actually quite strong.
0013.speaker: 旁白
0013.cn: 反倒是忘了苏桃的设定中，本就有不少武力值。

0013.en: "Xiaocheng, are you okay?"
0013.speaker: 苏桃
0013.cn: “小橙，你没事吧？”

0013.en: Even though she still had her doubts, when she helped Chi Xiaocheng up, Su Tao's eyes...
0013.speaker: 旁白
0013.cn: 即便心中有所芥蒂，可在扶起池小橙时，苏桃的眼神。

0013.en: ...were as gentle as water.
0013.speaker: 旁白
0013.cn: 依旧温柔如水。

0014.en: Chapter 14: A New Plan (Thanks to 汐汐是也 for the tip)
0014.speaker: 旁白
0014.cn: 第14章 新的计划（谢谢汐汐是也的打赏）

0014.en: "System, do you know something?"
0014.speaker: 池小橙
0014.cn: “系统，你知道吗？”

0014.en: [What?]
0014.speaker: 系统
0014.cn: 【什么？】

0014.en: "I've been in this world for over two days and I've seen Su Tao a few times. I always thought the so-called 'white moonlight' female lead was just a character the author gave a bunch of halos to make her appealing. I even treated her as just a tool for my survival."
0014.speaker: 池小橙
0014.cn: “穿越到这个世界两天多，我也见过好几次苏桃了，一直觉得所谓的白月光系女主无非就是作者在她身上加了各种光环，所以才吸引人，甚至我都是把她当成我生存的一种工具。”

0014.en: "I look down on that Huang Limei, and I know saving the damsel in distress is cliché, but I have to admit, this female lead... she's kind of charming."
0014.speaker: 池小橙
0014.cn: “我看不起那个黄莉梅，也知道英雄救美很老套，但不得不承认，这个女主，她有点香。”

0014.en: Of course, there were no feelings of love.
0014.speaker: 旁白
0014.cn: 喜欢的心思自然没有。

0014.en: It was more like appreciation, limited only to Su Tao's beauty.
0014.speaker: 旁白
0014.cn: 更多是欣赏，仅局限于苏桃的美貌。

0014.en: Sometimes, she even looked down on her, because she was just a puppet protagonist created by an author, with no real personality.
0014.speaker: 旁白
0014.cn: 偶尔还有点看不起，因为她只是某一个作者笔下硬加光环，没什么特点的傀儡主角。

0014.en: But that shoulder throw, that knee strike, and that slap just now...
0014.speaker: 旁白
0014.cn: 但刚刚那一个过肩摔，一击膝击，还有那一巴掌。

0014.en: They really impressed Chi Xiaocheng.
0014.speaker: 旁白
0014.cn: 确实把池小橙帅到了。

0014.en: And that gentle, concerned look in her eyes touched her heart.
0014.speaker: 旁白
0014.cn: 这温柔关切的小眼神，又戳中了她的内心。

0014.en: Half-covering her face, Chi Xiaocheng sat on the ground, lowered her head, and apologized to Su Tao, "I'm sorry."
0014.speaker: 池小橙
0014.cn: 半捂着脸，池小橙坐在地上低下头，对苏桃道歉说着，“对不起。”

0014.en: "What are you talking about?" Su Tao reached out, helped Chi Xiaocheng up, and then gently touched her cheek, carefully wiping the slapped right side.
0014.speaker: 苏桃
0014.cn: “说什么胡话呢？”苏桃伸出手，将池小橙给扶了起来，又轻轻抚上她的脸颊，小心翼翼地揩拭着被打了一巴掌的右脸。

0014.en: "Does it hurt?"
0014.speaker: 苏桃
0014.cn: “疼吗？”

0014.en: If she didn't have her skills, she probably would have cried.
0014.speaker: 旁白
0014.cn: 如果没有技能的话，可能已经掉眼泪了吧。

0014.en: But right now, it felt okay.
0014.speaker: 旁白
0014.cn: 现在的话感觉还好。

0014.en: Feeling the gentle touch and the warmth of her fingertips on her cheek, Chi Xiaocheng gave a silly smile, "I'm used to it."
0014.speaker: 池小橙
0014.cn: 但感受着那轻柔的抚摸和指腹贴在脸颊温润的触感，池小橙露出一个傻傻的笑容，“习惯了。”

0014.en: Those three words made Su Tao's heart ache again.
0014.speaker: 旁白
0014.cn: 三个字，又是听得苏桃心中一紧。

0014.en: She took a soft breath, "Let's go back to the dorm first. I'll put some medicine on it for you."
0014.speaker: 苏桃
0014.cn: 她轻轻呼了口气，“先回宿舍吧，我给你上点药。”

0014.en: Leaning on her for support, Chi Xiaocheng didn't dare to look her in the eye. "Taotao, you don't hate me, do you?"
0014.speaker: 池小橙
0014.cn: 池小橙被她搀扶着，没敢去看她的眼睛，“桃桃不讨厌我吗？”

0014.en: "Hmm?"
0014.speaker: 苏桃
0014.cn: “嗯哼？”

0014.en: "I did such a terrible thing to you in the basement, and you've been ignoring me these past two days. You must really hate me, right?"
0014.speaker: 池小橙
0014.cn: “地下室我对你做了那么过分的事情，这两天你也不理我，果然是很讨厌我吧？”

0014.en: "Well..."
0014.speaker: 苏桃

0014.en: Chi Xiaocheng's question hit a nerve. The thing Su Tao least wanted to face was Chi Xiaocheng's strange behavior in the basement.
0014.speaker: 旁白
0014.cn: 池小橙的话问到了苏桃心里，她目前最不愿意面对的，就是地下室时池小橙那奇怪的状态。

0014.en: She seemed quite normal now, though.
0014.speaker: 旁白
0014.cn: 现在看起来倒还蛮正常的。

0014.en: Without makeup, she looked cute and a little fragile.
0014.speaker: 旁白
0014.cn: 卸了妆，很可爱，又有些柔弱。

0014.en: Just like the Chi Xiaocheng she remembered from their childhood.
0014.speaker: 旁白
0014.cn: 和她印象中小时候的池小橙一样。

0014.en: Could it be... that last time was an accident?
0014.speaker: 旁白
0014.cn: 上次难道...是意外？

0014.en: Su Tao glanced at the lowered head of Chi Xiaocheng and asked tentatively, "Then, Xiaocheng, do you still like me?"
0014.speaker: 苏桃
0014.cn: 苏桃瞥了眼低头的池小橙，试探地问道，“那小橙你还喜欢我吗？”

0014.en: "I do."
0014.speaker: 池小橙
0014.cn: “喜欢。”

0014.en: Chi Xiaocheng answered without any hesitation, the words coming out almost as soon as Su Tao finished speaking.
0014.speaker: 旁白
0014.cn: 池小橙回答得毫不犹豫，几乎是在她话音刚落就接上了答案。

0014.en: But with her head down, her expression was impossible to see.
0014.speaker: 旁白
0014.cn: 只是低着头，看不清她的表情。

0014.en: Su Tao was at a loss for words. After a moment, her dry lips trembled as she replied, "How could I hate you, Xiaocheng? Just now, you were going to give water to Ye Liang and Dongfang Yang because you saw me stand up and wanted to give it to them, right?"
0014.speaker: 苏桃
0014.cn: 苏桃一时语塞，颤了颤有些发干的嘴唇后，回答道，“我怎么会讨厌小橙呢，刚刚小橙给叶良和东方阳送水，是看到我站起来了想给他们送了吧？”

0014.en: Chi Xiaocheng didn't answer; her silence was an affirmation.
0014.speaker: 旁白
0014.cn: 池小橙没有回答，沉默又代表了肯定。

0014.en: Su Tao smiled, "Xiaocheng is always paying attention to me, so how could I really hate you?"
0014.speaker: 苏桃
0014.cn: 苏桃笑了笑，“小橙都在关注我，我又怎么可能真的讨厌小橙呢？”

0014.en: If she had hated her, she would have stopped caring about the original owner long ago.
0014.speaker: 旁白
0014.cn: 但凡讨厌，很早就不会管原主了。

0014.en: "After all, we are good sisters."
0014.speaker: 苏桃
0014.cn: “毕竟我们是好姐妹啊。”

0014.en: She avoided the topic of love and steered the conversation toward friendship.
0014.speaker: 旁白
0014.cn: 她回避了喜欢的话题，转到了朋友身上。

0014.en: The two arrived at dorm room 801. Su Tao told Chi Xiaocheng to sit down and quickly took out a tube of ointment from her drawer.
0014.speaker: 旁白
0014.cn: 二人来到了801宿舍，苏桃让池小橙先坐着，很快从她的抽屉里拿出一支药膏。

0014.en: "Close your eyes. I'll be gentle, I promise it won't hurt."
0014.speaker: 苏桃
0014.cn: “闭上眼睛，我会轻点，保证不弄疼小橙的。”

0014.en: Her index finger felt a bit cold as it touched Chi Xiaocheng's cheek.
0014.speaker: 旁白
0014.cn: 食指触及脸颊，有些冰凉。

0014.en: Chi Xiaocheng couldn't see Su Tao's expression, but it wasn't hard to guess it was focused and gentle.
0014.speaker: 旁白
0014.cn: 池小橙看不到苏桃此时的表情，但也不难猜出，一定很专注，也很温柔。

0014.en: Actions can reveal a person's inner feelings. Accompanied by that unique, light fragrance of a girl, Chi Xiaocheng truly enjoyed having the medicine applied.
0014.speaker: 池小橙
0014.cn: 动作会传递一个人的内心，伴随着女孩子特有的淡淡清香，池小橙很享受这一刻的上药。

0014.en: It seemed that after she revealed her yandere personality in the basement, Su Tao's self-persuasion over the past two days had worked quite well.
0014.speaker: 旁白
0014.cn: 看来，地下室病娇性格展现出来后，苏桃这两天的自我攻略效果还不错。

0014.en: But with her being so gentle now, it made her next plan a bit difficult to execute.
0014.speaker: 旁白
0014.cn: 但她现在这么温柔，下一步计划反倒不太好做啊。

0014.en: As she was thinking, Su Tao's cheerful voice broke the silence, "Alright, you'll be fine after a little rest, Xiaocheng. Luckily, it's not swollen or scraped, so there won't be a scar."
0014.speaker: 苏桃
0014.cn: 思绪间，传来苏桃轻松的声音，“好了，小橙休息一下就没问题了，幸好没有肿起来，也没有擦伤，不会破相。”

0014.en: "Mhm, thank you, Taotao." Chi Xiaocheng smiled happily.
0014.speaker: 池小橙
0014.cn: “嗯嗯，谢谢桃桃。”池小橙露出了幸福的笑容。

0014.en: Then, remembering something, she took out the bottle of mineral water from the basketball court.
0014.speaker: 旁白
0014.cn: 又想起什么，从挎包拿出了刚刚球场上的那瓶矿泉水。

0014.en: Holding it in her hands once again, she offered it to Su Tao. "Taotao, have some water and rest a bit?"
0014.speaker: 池小橙
0014.cn: 再一度捧在手中，递给了苏桃，“桃桃，喝水休息一下吧？”

0014.en: Su Tao shook her head and put the other medicines into a small bag. "I won't have any. During the game just now, Ye Liang and Dongfang Yang bumped into each other and got hurt. I need to take some medicine to them, so I have to go."
0014.speaker: 苏桃
0014.cn: 苏桃摇了摇头，又将其他的药物装进一个包包里，“我就不喝了，刚刚比赛的时候，叶良和东方阳撞在一起伤到了，我还要带点药给他们，就先走了。”

0014.en: No wonder she came back before the game was over.
0014.speaker: 旁白
0014.cn: 难怪比赛还没结束就回来。

0014.en: So that was the reason.
0014.speaker: 旁白
0014.cn: 原来是因为这个呀。

0014.en: A dangerous smile touched the corner of Chi Xiaocheng's lips, her eyes deep and thoughtful.
0014.speaker: 池小橙
0014.cn: 池小橙唇角勾出一抹危险的笑容，眼神深邃。

0014.en: Her next plan was forming.
0014.speaker: 旁白
0014.cn: 她的下一步计划，有了。

0014.en: Still holding the water bottle, she stood up and tried to persuade her, "Taotao, are you sure you don't want a sip? Or do you not like mineral water?"
0014.speaker: 池小橙
0014.cn: 手中拿着的水依旧没有放下，她站起来挽留道，“桃桃，真的不喝一口水吗，还是说不喜欢喝矿泉水？”

0014.en: Su Tao walked to the door and gave Chi Xiaocheng a strange look.
0014.speaker: 旁白
0014.cn: 苏桃走到门边，奇怪地看了一眼池小橙。

0014.en: That was a very odd question.
0014.speaker: 旁白
0014.cn: 这个问题问得就很奇怪。

0014.en: She looked Chi Xiaocheng up and down and saw that she still looked normal. Waving her hand, she hurried out the door.
0014.speaker: 旁白
0014.cn: 上下看了一眼池小橙，见其还是一副正常的模样，摆了摆手后，就着急地出门了。

0014.en: Last time must have been an accident. Xiaocheng seems perfectly normal.
0014.speaker: 旁白
0014.cn: 上次应该是意外吧，小橙看起来还是蛮正常的。

0014.en: But she didn't notice that the moment she left, Chi Xiaocheng's hand holding the water bottle dropped.
0014.speaker: 旁白
0014.cn: 可她却没注意到，离去的那一刻，池小橙拿着矿泉水瓶的小手垂了下来。

0014.en: Her red pupils glowed, and the smile on her lips grew increasingly wicked.
0014.speaker: 旁白
0014.cn: 赤瞳散发红光，唇角的笑容也渐渐妖异。

0014.en: [Host, what wicked thoughts are you having now?]
0014.speaker: 系统
0014.cn: 【宿主，又有什么坏心思了？】

0014.en: "System, it seems the male leads are much more important to her than I am."
0014.speaker: 池小橙
0014.cn: “统子，看来在她心里，几个男主的位置比我要重很多啊。”

0014.en: [Isn't that obvious? She was always straight to begin with, so bending her won't be easy. Besides, the male leads have their own halos.]
0014.speaker: 系统
0014.cn: 【那不是理所当然的吗，人家本来就是直的，想掰弯可不容易，并且几个男主身上也有光环。】

0014.en: "But this is all just a tragedy in the end!"
0014.speaker: 池小橙
0014.cn: “可这终究是一场悲剧啊！”

0014.en: In the book's ending, except for the male leads, every female character was treated like a joke.
0014.speaker: 旁白
0014.cn: 在这本书的结局中，除了那几位男主，所有出现的女性角色，都是小丑。

0014.en: And none of them had a good end.
0014.speaker: 旁白
0014.cn: 并且不得善终。

0014.en: Including the destined female lead, Su Tao.
0014.speaker: 旁白
0014.cn: 包括苏桃这位天命女主。

0014.en: This was why Chi Xiaocheng had said that Su Tao would reach the peak of her life in the early to middle stages, but didn't mention the later part.
0014.speaker: 旁白
0014.cn: 这也是为什么池小橙说，在前中期女主苏桃会走上人生巅峰，却只字不提后期。

0014.en: In her past life, the book became popular not just because it was well-written, but because of the author's shocking twist in the later stages.
0014.speaker: 旁白
0014.cn: 前世，这本书能火，除了写得好以外，出圈的关键还是作者后期的骚操作。

0014.en: In the latter part of the story, a rich female reader appeared and tipped the author 1,000,000 RMB, asking for a character based on her to be written into the story.
0014.speaker: 旁白
0014.cn: 在步入后期时，书里出现了一个富婆老板，给这本小说打赏了100万软妹币要求以她的形象人设写一个配角客串。

0014.en: To seize this massive fortune and get on the rich woman's good side, the author followed her instructions, added a new supporting character, and wrote the rest of the story according to the rich woman's wishes.
0014.speaker: 旁白
0014.cn: 作者为了接住这泼天的富贵，甚至想抱上富婆大腿，于是听从老板的话，加入了一个配角，后续内容还按照富婆的意愿去写。

0014.en: In the end, this new character rose up and took all the male leads who originally liked Su Tao for herself, and the whole book started to pave the way for her.
0014.speaker: 旁白
0014.cn: 最终，天降女配翻身，将所有原本喜欢苏桃的男主收入后宫，整本书都开始为这个天降女配铺路。

0014.en: Meanwhile, the true female lead, Su Tao, was written as a clown, humiliated by this new character, and had falling outs with all the male leads due to various plots.
0014.speaker: 旁白
0014.cn: 而真女主苏桃，则是被写成了小丑，被这个女配侮辱，因为各种情节与各男主决裂。

0014.en: She was despised, cursed, and beaten.
0014.speaker: 旁白
0014.cn: 被厌恶、唾骂、殴打。

0014.en: The author gave her countless moments of hope, only to crush them with despair again and again.
0014.speaker: 旁白
0014.cn: 作者给了无数次希望她，接着又一次次绝望。

0014.en: Finally, after developing severe depression, she died by suicide in a small rented room.
0014.speaker: 旁白
0014.cn: 最终，患上重度抑郁后，在小小的出租屋内，自杀而死。

0014.en: It was because of this drastic change that the book was heavily criticized by readers. As good as the first half was, the second half was just as bad.
0014.speaker: 旁白
0014.cn: 正是因为这样的大转变，整本书被读者大骂特骂，前中期写得有多好，后期就有多烂。

0014.en: Ultimately, it went viral, even becoming popular among male readers for a while.
0014.speaker: 旁白
0014.cn: 最终出圈，在男频都火了一阵子。

0014.en: Chi Xiaocheng sat on Su Tao's bed, hugging one of her favorite cat plushies and gently playing with her pigtail.
0014.speaker: 旁白
0014.cn: 池小橙坐在苏桃床上，将她喜欢的一只猫猫玩偶抱在怀中，轻轻拨弄自己的马尾辫。

0014.en: "Even setting aside the original plot of the novel, such moonlight-like gentleness... I really want to have it all to myself~"
0014.speaker: 池小橙
0014.cn: “即便抛开小说原著的剧情不谈，这样月光般的温柔，果然还是想独自占有呢~”

0014.en: Chi Xiaocheng searched in the system store and quickly found an item she wanted.
0014.speaker: 旁白
0014.cn: 池小橙在系统商城内搜索了一下，很快找到了一个心仪的物品。

0014.en: [Energy Pill: Price 200 Emotion Points]
0014.speaker: 系统
0014.cn: 【能量药丸：售价200情绪值】

0014.en: [Description: A miraculous pill that can replenish the body's energy.]
0014.speaker: 系统
0014.cn: 【介绍：能够对人体能量补充的神奇药丸】

0014.en: "It's a bit expensive, and I don't know how effective it is, but this body of mine is too weak. If I want to carry out the plan I just thought of, I can't do without this."
0014.speaker: 池小橙
0014.cn: “有点贵，效果也不知道怎么样，但我这具身体过于贫弱了，如果要完成这个临时想的计划，这东西缺不了啊。”

0014.en: Chi Xiaocheng looked at the bottle of mineral water on the desk.
0014.speaker: 旁白
0014.cn: 池小橙看向那瓶放在桌上的矿泉水。

0014.en: "I've been rejected twice now."
0014.speaker: 池小橙
0014.cn: “被拒绝了两次呢。”

0014.en: "It seems Taotao doesn't like to drink water."
0014.speaker: 池小橙
0014.cn: “看来桃桃不喜欢喝水。”

0014.en: Chi Xiaocheng chuckled, unscrewed the cap of the water bottle, and poured all the water into the sink.
0014.speaker: 旁白
0014.cn: 池小橙轻笑了一声，将矿泉水的盖子拧开，然后把里面的水全部倒进洗漱池。

0014.en: She then placed the empty bottle in a prominent spot on Su Tao's desk before slowly walking out of the dorm.
0014.speaker: 旁白
0014.cn: 又将空瓶子放在苏桃书桌的显眼位置后，缓缓走出宿舍。

0014.en: Her two pigtails swayed gently with her movements.
0014.speaker: 旁白
0014.cn: 两条马尾辫，顺着她的动作，轻轻摇曳。

0014.en: The basketball game ended quickly. Ye Liang's blue team narrowly beat Dongfang Yang's red team by 3 points.
0014.speaker: 旁白
0014.cn: 篮球场的比赛很快结束了，叶良蓝队以3分的优势，险胜东方阳所在的红队。

0014.en: The game seemed like a contest for Su Tao, and the loser, Dongfang Yang, looked annoyed.
0014.speaker: 旁白
0014.cn: 这一场比赛好似在争夺苏桃一样，败了的东方阳一脸不爽。

0014.en: As the winner, Ye Liang was naturally happy to show off in front of Su Tao.
0014.speaker: 旁白
0014.cn: 作为胜者的叶良，自然也是开心地在苏桃面前炫耀。

0014.en: He followed up with a winner's invitation, "Su Tao, thanks for your cheering. I definitely couldn't have beaten this guy Dongfang Yang without you. How about I treat you to dinner tonight?"
0014.speaker: 叶良
0014.cn: 并顺势，发出胜利者的邀请，“苏桃，谢谢你的加油，要是没有你的话我肯定赢不了东方阳这家伙，今晚要不我请你吃顿饭吧？”

0014.en: "Well..."
0014.speaker: 苏桃

0014.en: Su Tao hesitated, glancing at Dongfang Yang.
0014.speaker: 旁白
0014.cn: 苏桃有些犹豫，看了一眼东方阳。

0014.en: Normally, the three of them should have gone together.
0014.speaker: 旁白
0014.cn: 按理说，三人应该一起去的。

0014.en: Before Ye Liang could say anything, Dongfang Yang waved his hand in refusal, "I have something to do tonight, you two go ahead."
0014.speaker: 东方阳
0014.cn: 都不等叶良出声，东方阳就摆手拒绝，“我今晚还有事，你们自己去吧。”

0014.en: With that, he slung his jacket over his shoulder, waved, and walked away.
0014.speaker: 旁白
0014.cn: 说完将外套搭在肩上，挥了挥手便扬长而去。

0014.en: Ye Liang smiled triumphantly and said again, "Su Tao, you can't refuse me this time. You said last time you'd treat me to a meal to thank me properly."
0014.speaker: 叶良
0014.cn: 叶良露出得意的笑容，又道，“苏桃这次你可不能拒绝我，上次你可是说了要请我吃饭好好报答我呢。”

0014.en: Su Tao sighed helplessly, "Alright, but I have to make it clear first, I don't drink alcohol, and..."
0014.speaker: 苏桃
0014.cn: 苏桃也是无奈地叹了口气，“好吧，但我要先声明，我不喝酒的嗷，还有......”

0014.en: Before she could finish, her phone chimed with a "ding-dong." Su Tao picked it up with a puzzled look and saw a message from Chi Xiaocheng.
0014.speaker: 旁白
0014.cn: 话没说完，手机“叮咚”响了一声，苏桃拿起手机疑惑地看了一眼，发现是池小橙发来的消息。

0014.en: Chi Xiaocheng: "Taotao, I have something to tell you. I'll be waiting for you on the rooftop of the dorm at 9 PM tonight."
0014.speaker: 池小橙
0014.cn: 池小橙：“桃桃，我有话想对你说，今晚9点，我在宿舍的天台上等你哦。”

0014.en: Ye Liang wiped his sweat, not looking at Su Tao, and asked, "What's wrong?"
0014.speaker: 叶良
0014.cn: 叶良擦着汗，没去看苏桃，询问道，“怎么了？”

0014.en: Su Tao came back to her senses, closed the chat window, and put her phone away. "It's nothing. What are we eating tonight?"
0014.speaker: 苏桃
0014.cn: 苏桃回神，关掉聊天框将手机收起，“没什么，今晚吃什么呀？”

0014.en: Ye Liang snapped his fingers: "The weather forecast says there will be heavy rain tonight, so let's not go shopping. I know a fun place to take you, it starts at 9. I guarantee you'll like it!"
0014.speaker: 叶良
0014.cn: 叶良打了个响指：“天气预报说今晚会有大雨，就不逛街了，正好带你去一个好玩的地方，9点开场，保证你喜欢！”

0014.en: Just then, a flash of lightning cut across the sky.
0014.speaker: 旁白
0014.cn: 恰逢此时，一道闪电从空中划过。

0014.en: Followed by a roll of thunder.
0014.speaker: 旁白
0014.cn: 带起阵阵雷鸣。

0014.en: BOOM——
0014.speaker: 旁白
0014.cn: 轰隆——

0014.en: The evening sunset was gradually hidden by dark clouds, blooming into a blood-red color.
0014.speaker: 旁白
0014.cn: 夕阳的黄昏渐渐被乌云遮挡，绽放如血般的殷红。

0015.en: Chapter 15: When Are You Coming Back?
0015.speaker: 旁白
0015.cn: 第15章 你什么时候回来呀？

0015.en: "Su Tao, you've seemed distracted ever since we finished dinner. Is something on your mind?"
0015.speaker: 叶良
0015.cn: “苏桃，吃完饭后总感觉你心不在焉的，是有什么事情吗？”

0015.en: At 8 PM, large raindrops began to wash over the city as twilight fell, carrying the earthy smell of rain.
0015.speaker: 旁白
0015.cn: 夜晚8点，豆大的雨点淅沥沥地冲刷被暮色笼罩的城市，泥尘的芬芳飘荡。

0015.en: Su Tao and Ye Liang stood outside a shop under a dark and gloomy sky.
0015.speaker: 旁白
0015.cn: 苏桃和叶良站在一家商店外，天空昏暗低沉。

0015.en: Having just finished dinner, they decided to wander around a bit before the 9 PM event started.
0015.speaker: 旁白
0015.cn: 刚吃完饭，趁着9点的活动还未开始，二人打算随便逛逛。

0015.en: But the rain came without warning.
0015.speaker: 旁白
0015.cn: 可雨说来就来。

0015.en: Along with the sound of the rain, Ye Liang carefully noticed that Su Tao didn't seem very enthusiastic.
0015.speaker: 旁白
0015.cn: 随着雨声，叶良也很细心地发现，苏桃的兴致似乎没那么高了。

0015.en: Dressed in a simple white embroidered dress, she looked down, lightly tapping the floor with the tip of her shoe, lost in thought.
0015.speaker: 旁白
0015.cn: 一袭素白绣花礼裙的她低着头，裹着小脚的鞋尖轻点地板，也不知道在想些什么。

0015.en: Ye Liang noticed this and tapped her on the shoulder. "What are you thinking about? You're so spaced out."
0015.speaker: 叶良
0015.cn: 叶良将其看在眼里，又碰了下她的肩膀，“想什么呢，这么出神？”

0015.en: "Ah... oh, sorry." Su Tao forced a smile. "It's nothing, I was just thinking about Xiaocheng."
0015.speaker: 苏桃
0015.cn: “啊...哦，抱歉。”苏桃扬起笑容，“没什么，只是在想小橙的事情。”

0015.en: Hearing that name, Ye Liang frowned slightly. "Why are you thinking about her? You two aren't the same kind of person. Su Tao, you should just cut ties with her instead of defending her."
0015.speaker: 叶良
0015.cn: 听到这个名字，叶良微微皱眉，“想她做什么，她和你就不是一路人，苏桃你趁早和她绝交得了，还这样维护她。”

0015.en: Su Tao opened her mouth, wanting to express her true feelings, but the memory of the scene in the basement stopped her.
0015.speaker: 旁白
0015.cn: 苏桃张了张嘴，想倾述内心的想法，可脑海闪过地下室的一幕又止住了想说的话。

0015.en: Finally, she slowly asked, "Ye Liang, what kind of person do you think Xiaocheng is?"
0015.speaker: 苏桃
0015.cn: 最终缓缓问道，“叶良，在你的感觉中，小橙是什么样的人呢？”

0015.en: "Disgusting."
0015.speaker: 叶良
0015.cn: “很恶心。”

0015.en: Ye Liang replied without hesitation.
0015.speaker: 旁白
0015.cn: 叶良毫不犹豫地回应。

0015.en: Su Tao gave a dry laugh. "Putting aside your later impressions, what about when you first met Xiaocheng and me?"
0015.speaker: 苏桃
0015.cn: 苏桃干笑了一下，“剔除后来的刻板印象，一开始见到我和小橙的时候呢？”

0015.en: Ye Liang looked at Su Tao, confused.
0015.speaker: 旁白
0015.cn: 叶良不解地看了眼苏桃。

0015.en: But her words still took his thoughts back to the summer vacation a few months ago.
0015.speaker: 旁白
0015.cn: 思绪却还是随着她的话回到了几个月前的暑假。

0015.en: He first met Su Tao in a clothing store.
0015.speaker: 旁白
0015.cn: 他和苏桃的初见，是在一家服装店内。

0015.en: He was hiding in the fitting room to avoid a woman from an arranged date, and by chance, Su Tao walked out.
0015.speaker: 旁白
0015.cn: 他为了逃避另一个家族相亲的女人，躲到了服装店的换衣间，好巧不巧苏桃从里面出来。

0015.en: She had just changed into a simple white long dress she was planning to buy.
0015.speaker: 旁白
0015.cn: 换了一条打算买的素白长裙。

0015.en: Like a pure white fairy, she effortlessly captured everyone's attention.
0015.speaker: 旁白
0015.cn: 犹如纯白的仙子，不由自主吸引住了人的目光。

0015.en: After the two met face-to-face.
0015.speaker: 旁白
0015.cn: 二人打了个照面后。

0015.en: The woman from the arranged date came over to question him.
0015.speaker: 旁白
0015.cn: 相亲的那个女人前来质问。

0015.en: He ordered Su Tao not to reveal his location, offering her 100,000 yuan afterward.
0015.speaker: 旁白
0015.cn: 他命令式地让苏桃不要出卖他的位置，完事了可以给10万软妹币。

0015.en: Although Su Tao tried to cover for him, he was still discovered.
0015.speaker: 旁白
0015.cn: 尽管苏桃在掩饰，他还是被发现了。

0015.en: Faced with the questions, he had no choice but to say Su Tao was his girlfriend.
0015.speaker: 旁白
0015.cn: 面对质问，他只好硬着头皮说苏桃是他的女朋友。

0015.en: In the end, Su Tao not only went along with it but also confidently talked back to the shameless woman.
0015.speaker: 旁白
0015.cn: 结果就是，苏桃不仅承认了，还大方地回怼了那个不要脸的相亲女。

0015.en: As the powerful young master of his family, it was the first time he had hidden behind a girl.
0015.speaker: 旁白
0015.cn: 作为家族中强势无比的大少爷，第一次藏在一个女孩的后面。

0015.en: She had given him a gentle smile.
0015.speaker: 旁白
0015.cn: 被温柔地报以微笑。

0015.en: Looked at him with a reassuring gaze.
0015.speaker: 旁白
0015.cn: 被安心的眼神注视。

0015.en: He was protected.
0015.speaker: 旁白
0015.cn: 被保护。

0015.en: Afterward, because he had delayed Su Tao, Ye Liang offered her one million yuan as compensation.
0015.speaker: 旁白
0015.cn: 事后，因为多耽搁了苏桃，叶良开口就是补偿100万。

0015.en: Most people would have been too excited to speak when faced with such a huge amount of money.
0015.speaker: 旁白
0015.cn: 普通人面对这样的巨款，早已激动得说不出话。

0015.en: But Su Tao calmly refused.
0015.speaker: 旁白
0015.cn: 可苏桃却是平静地拒绝。

0015.en: And she patiently comforted him, saying she was just doing a small favor.
0015.speaker: 旁白
0015.cn: 并耐心安慰说着“她只不过是举手之劳”这样的话。

0015.en: Perhaps because of her "main character aura," after being rejected several times, Ye Liang found Su Tao very interesting.
0015.speaker: 旁白
0015.cn: 兴许是有女主光环的加持，各种被拒绝之后，叶良不由觉得苏桃很有趣。

0015.en: Of course, her appearance was also a very important factor.
0015.speaker: 旁白
0015.cn: 自然，颜值也是很重要的一点。

0015.en: And so, his story with Su Tao began.
0015.speaker: 旁白
0015.cn: 于是他和苏桃的故事就这样展开了。

0015.en: As for Chi Xiaocheng...
0015.speaker: 旁白
0015.cn: 至于池小橙

0015.en: Ye Liang touched his chin and tried to remember again, only then recalling the tiny, almost unnoticeable person next to Su Tao.
0015.speaker: 旁白
0015.cn: 叶良按着下巴，又认真回忆了一遍，这才想起，苏桃的旁边，还有一只小到几乎可以让人无视的家伙。

0015.en: "I think her makeup wasn't as crazy back then, just a little light makeup?" Ye Liang said, looking thoughtful. "I don't remember much, just that she's disgusting."
0015.speaker: 叶良
0015.cn: “当时好像化妆没现在那么离谱，只是涂了点淡妆？”叶良一副苦思冥想的模样，“印象没多少了，总之很恶心。”

0015.en: Su Tao looked up at the cloudy sky and sighed. "Actually, Xiaocheng wasn't like this at first. She... she met some bad friends and was led astray."
0015.speaker: 苏桃
0015.cn: 苏桃抬头望着乌云密布的天空，叹气道，“其实小橙一开始不是这样的，她...认识了一些不好的朋友，就被带坏了。”

0015.en: As she spoke, Su Tao recalled their time in high school and couldn't help but chuckle. "Xiaocheng used to be so innocent, and she's actually quite cute without makeup."
0015.speaker: 苏桃
0015.cn: 说着，苏桃回忆起了刚上高中的时候，噗嗤一下没忍住笑了出来，“以前的小橙很单纯，而且不化妆的小橙其实蛮可爱的。”

0015.en: Ye Liang gave Su Tao another strange look.
0015.speaker: 旁白
0015.cn: 叶良又奇怪地看了眼苏桃。

0015.en: He didn't understand why Su Tao would talk about that person.
0015.speaker: 旁白
0015.cn: 不明白苏桃为什么会聊起那个人。

0015.en: She was already so ugly with makeup.
0015.speaker: 旁白
0015.cn: 化妆都那么丑了。

0015.en: He couldn't imagine what Chi Xiaocheng would look like without it.
0015.speaker: 旁白
0015.cn: 他想象不出池小橙不化妆的样子。

0015.en: So he said forcefully to Su Tao, "Anyway, I can listen to you and not bother Chi Xiaocheng, but you have to listen to me and stop seeing her."
0015.speaker: 叶良
0015.cn: 于是强势地对苏桃说道，“总之，我可以听你的不去找池小橙的麻烦，但你也要听我的，不许再和她有所往来了。”

0015.en: Su Tao opened her mouth.
0015.speaker: 旁白
0015.cn: 苏桃张了张嘴。

0015.en: She lowered her head.
0015.speaker: 旁白
0015.cn: 低下脑袋。

0015.en: She didn't nod, nor did she shake her head.
0015.speaker: 旁白
0015.cn: 没有点头，也没有摇头。

0015.en: Seeing this, Ye Liang let out a displeased "Hm?"
0015.speaker: 叶良
0015.cn: 叶良见状，不喜地拉长了鼻音，“嗯？”

0015.en: Su Tao flinched at the sound. "I actually want to try again. Xiaocheng was just led astray by others. She's a good person at heart. I don't want to give up on our friendship if I can help it."
0015.speaker: 苏桃
0015.cn: 苏桃听到声音缩了缩脖子，“我其实还想再试试，小橙只是被人带坏的，她本性其实是善良的，如果可以我不想放弃她这个朋友。”

0015.en: "She did that to you, she kidnapped you! If I hadn't arrived in time, something terrible could have happened. Why do you still have hope for her?!"
0015.speaker: 叶良
0015.cn: “她都那样对你了，绑架你啊，如果不是我及时到来可能你就出事了，为什么还要对她抱有期望呢？！”

0015.en: Ye Liang couldn't understand Su Tao's way of thinking at all.
0015.speaker: 旁白
0015.cn: 叶良完全想不通苏桃的脑回路。

0015.en: But he also felt helpless.
0015.speaker: 旁白
0015.cn: 但他也很无奈。

0015.en: Because he liked her, he didn't want to be rough with Su Tao or force her to do anything.
0015.speaker: 旁白
0015.cn: 因为喜欢，所以他不想对苏桃动粗，更不想强硬地让她必须去做某种事情。

0015.en: Seeing that Ye Liang seemed about to get angry, Su Tao weakly explained, "I'm an orphan. Ever since I met Xiaocheng in elementary school, we've been together. She was with me my whole childhood, like a sensible little sister. For the first time, I felt like I had a family."
0015.speaker: 苏桃
0015.cn: 苏桃见叶良似乎要生气，弱弱地解释道，“我是个孤儿，从小学认识小橙开始，我们就在一起了，是她陪伴我整个童年，像一个懂事的妹妹，第一次让我有了一种家的感觉。”

0015.en: "So I want to... try again."
0015.speaker: 苏桃
0015.cn: “所以我想...再试试。”

0015.en: Ye Liang raised his large hand, wanting to say something.
0015.speaker: 旁白
0015.cn: 叶良伸出大手，想说些什么。

0015.en: In the end, he dropped it heavily.
0015.speaker: 旁白
0015.cn: 最后又重重垂下。

0015.en: He scratched his head in frustration.
0015.speaker: 旁白
0015.cn: 烦躁地挠了挠头。

0015.en: "People change!" he said, then changed the subject to avoid talking about it. "Forget it, let's not talk about that person. The event doesn't start until 9, but let's go over there first."
0015.speaker: 叶良
0015.cn: “人是会变的啊！”他说了一句，不想聊索性直接转移话题，“算了，不聊那个晦气的家伙，虽然9点活动才开场，我们先过去吧。”

0015.en: With that, he ordered Su Tao into the car and drove towards the beach in Jiuzhou City.
0015.speaker: 旁白
0015.cn: 说罢，直接命令苏桃上车，朝着九州市的海滩驶去。

0015.en: As Ye Liang drove, he said to Su Tao, "This event is being held on a large cruise ship by our families. If you wear this dress, you'll definitely amaze everyone!"
0015.speaker: 叶良
0015.cn: 叶良一边开车，一边跟苏桃说道，“这次的活动，是我们一众家族在一座大游轮举办的，你这一套礼服穿过去，绝对会惊艳四座！”

0015.en: "And my family will be there too. Su Tao, do you know what that means?"
0015.speaker: 叶良
0015.cn: “而且我家里人也会去，苏桃你知道这代表着什么吗？”

0015.en: Ye Liang talked on, but when he glanced to the side, he saw Su Tao looking down at her phone. "Are you listening to me?"
0015.speaker: 叶良
0015.cn: 叶良侃侃而谈，可侧目时却发现，苏桃低头看着手机，“你有听我说话吗？”

0015.en: "Huh?" Su Tao immediately looked up, smiling sheepishly. "Um, could you say that again?"
0015.speaker: 苏桃
0015.cn: “啊？”苏桃立马回神，讪讪笑道，“那个，你再说一下？”

0015.en: Ye Liang's voice sounded in her ear again, but her thoughts were still on her phone.
0015.speaker: 旁白
0015.cn: 耳边又响起叶良的声音，可思绪，却依旧在手机上。

0015.en: On it was a message Chi Xiaocheng had just sent.
0015.speaker: 旁白
0015.cn: 上面是池小橙刚刚发来的一条消息。

0015.en: "Taotao, it's almost 9 o'clock. Are you in the dorm? I'll come find you."
0015.speaker: 池小橙
0015.cn: “桃桃，差不多要9点了哦，你在宿舍吗，我去找你吧。”

0015.en: I have to go to a party with Ye Liang at 9.
0015.speaker: 旁白
0015.cn: 9点自己要去陪叶良参加聚会啊。

0015.en: I wonder what Xiaocheng wants to tell me.
0015.speaker: 旁白
0015.cn: 也不知道小橙是有什么话要跟我说。

0015.en: If it's just talking, we can do it over the phone, right?
0015.speaker: 旁白
0015.cn: 只是说说的话，手机里聊也可以的吧？

0015.en: Su Tao thought for a moment and typed a reply, "Is something wrong, Xiaocheng? I can't get back by 9."
0015.speaker: 苏桃
0015.cn: 苏桃想了想，敲字回复道，“小橙是有什么事情吗，我9点还回不去呢。”

0015.en: Chi Xiaocheng's message came back instantly: "I need to tell you in person. Can you come back, Taotao?"
0015.speaker: 池小橙
0015.cn: 池小橙的消息秒回：“需要当面说才行呢，桃桃能回来吗？”

0015.en: "Sorry." Su Tao sent a cute, apologetic emoji. "I'm still out shopping with someone, so I won't be back so soon."
0015.speaker: 苏桃
0015.cn: “抱歉啊。”苏桃发了一个求饶的可爱小表情，“我还在外面和别人逛街，没那么快。”

0015.en: Boom—
0015.speaker: 旁白
0015.cn: 轰隆——

0015.en: A clap of thunder sounded at that moment.
0015.speaker: 旁白
0015.cn: 一声雷鸣在此时响起。

0015.en: The rain grew heavier.
0015.speaker: 旁白
0015.cn: 雨更大了。

0015.en: As soon as she sent the message, Su Tao regretted it.
0015.speaker: 旁白
0015.cn: 这话发出去，苏桃就后悔了。

0015.en: It looked like a storm was coming, so her excuse was terrible.
0015.speaker: 旁白
0015.cn: 这情况看起来是要下暴雨了，找的理由差到了极点。

0015.en: But she didn't dare say she was with Ye Liang, afraid of provoking Chi Xiaocheng.
0015.speaker: 旁白
0015.cn: 可她又不敢说是跟叶良在一起，怕刺激到池小橙。

0015.en: Fortunately, Chi Xiaocheng's reply made her feel relieved, "So, will you come?"
0015.speaker: 池小橙
0015.cn: 好在，池小橙的回复让她松了一口气，“那你会赴约吗？”

0015.en: "Yes, yes, I'll be back as soon as I can!"
0015.speaker: 苏桃
0015.cn: “嗯嗯，我会尽快回来的！”

0015.en: Su Tao put down her phone, a relieved expression on her face.
0015.speaker: 旁白
0015.cn: 苏桃放下手机，脸上露出了一丝轻松的表情。

0015.en: This was a good sign.
0015.speaker: 旁白
0015.cn: 这是一个好兆头。

0015.en: As long as Xiaocheng was still willing to talk to her, there was a chance to restore their friendship.
0015.speaker: 旁白
0015.cn: 只要小橙还愿意和自己交流，那么就一定有机会恢复我们曾经的朋友关系。

0015.en: Lifting her head, Su Tao brushed her hair back and happened to meet Ye Liang's displeased eyes.
0015.speaker: 旁白
0015.cn: 脑袋抬起，苏桃拨弄了一下秀发，却恰好对上了叶良那不满的双眼。

0015.en: Su Tao gave a dry laugh. "I'll put my phone away now. I'm muting it."
0015.speaker: 苏桃
0015.cn: 苏姚干笑了一下，“我不看手机了，这就静音。”

0015.en: She turned off the sound on her phone and put it in her bag.
0015.speaker: 旁白
0015.cn: 她将手机声音关闭，放在了包里。

0015.en: But she didn't notice the next message from Chi Xiaocheng.
0015.speaker: 旁白
0015.cn: 却没注意到，池小橙发来的下一条消息。

0015.en: "Okay Taotao, I'll wait for you on the rooftop. When are you coming back?"
0015.speaker: 池小橙
0015.cn: “桃桃，那我在天台上等你哦，你什么时候回来呀？”

0015.en: Ten minutes later: "Taotao, when are you coming back?"
0015.speaker: 池小橙
0015.cn: 十分钟后：“桃桃，你什么时候回来呀？”

0015.en: Fifteen minutes later: "Taotao, when are you coming back?"
0015.speaker: 池小橙
0015.cn: 十五分钟后：“桃桃，你什么时候回来呀？”

0015.en: Twenty minutes later: "Taotao, when are you coming back?"
0015.speaker: 池小橙
0015.cn: 二十分钟后：“桃桃，你什么时候回来呀？”

0015.en: The rain fell harder and harder.
0015.speaker: 旁白
0015.cn: 雨，越下越大。

0015.en: "Taotao, when are you coming back?"
0015.speaker: 池小橙
0015.cn: “桃桃，你什么时候回来呀？”

0016.en: Chapter 16: Her Paranoia
0016.speaker: 旁白
0016.cn: 第16章 她的偏执

0016.en: Lightning flashed and thunder rumbled as the rain poured down endlessly.
0016.speaker: 旁白
0016.cn: 电闪雷鸣，雨幕不断。

0016.en: Inside the cruise ship, in stark contrast to the harsh weather outside, handsome men and beautiful women mingled happily.
0016.speaker: 旁白
0016.cn: 游轮内部与外面恶劣的天气成反比，诸多俊男靓女其乐融融。

0016.en: By 9 o'clock, all the guests who were supposed to arrive had entered.
0016.speaker: 旁白
0016.cn: 9点钟一到，该进场的宾客都已经进场。

0016.en: Making their grand entrance last were, naturally, Su Tao and Ye Liang.
0016.speaker: 旁白
0016.cn: 压轴登场的，自然苏桃和叶良。

0016.en: As the one who could become the unrequited love of many male leads, and a presence who outshined countless villains and young ladies in the story, Su Tao's beauty was undeniable.
0016.speaker: 旁白
0016.cn: 能成为诸多男主的白月光，剧情中力压无数反派炮灰与各派大小姐的存在，苏桃颜值自然没得说。

0016.en: She just stood there, her delicate and pretty face looking especially gentle under the lights.
0016.speaker: 旁白
0016.cn: 她就站在那里，清秀俏丽的面容在灯光下显得格外温婉。

0016.en: Her long white gown clung to her slender waist, perfectly outlining her slim curves. The neckline was slightly open, revealing the elegant curve of her collarbones, and her skin was as smooth as satin, with a faint glow.
0016.speaker: 旁白
0016.cn: 白色长裙礼服贴合纤细的腰肢，将那盈盈一握的曲线勾勒得淋漓尽致，领口微微敞开，露出她锁骨处优美的弧线，肌肤细滑如缎，透着淡淡的光泽。

0016.en: Her silky black hair fell to her shoulders, and a few loose strands brushed against her ear, making her look exceptionally gentle.
0016.speaker: 旁白
0016.cn: 如丝绸般柔顺的黑发垂落肩头，几缕碎发扫过耳侧，显得格外温柔。

0016.en: She was like a soft moonbeam in the night sky, serene with a hint of mystery, and like a white lotus at dawn, pure and untouched by dust.
0016.speaker: 旁白
0016.cn: 像夜空中的一抹淡月光，宁静中带着一丝神秘，又如清晨初露的白莲，纯净而不染尘埃。

0016.en: As for Ye Liang, he looked quite presentable.
0016.speaker: 旁白
0016.cn: 而叶良，挺像个人的。

0016.en: He seemed to be declaring that Su Tao belonged to him, giving off the aura of a domineering CEO who kept strangers at a distance.
0016.speaker: 旁白
0016.cn: 好似宣布苏桃的归属就是他，散发生人莫近的霸总气质。

0016.en: However, most people still fixed their gazes on Su Tao.
0016.speaker: 旁白
0016.cn: 然而大多数人还是将视线投在了苏桃身上。

0016.en: Was she the one from the wild rumors, Young Master Ye's fake girlfriend?
0016.speaker: 旁白
0016.cn: 她就是谣传得很厉害的那个，叶少爷的假女友？

0016.en: Among the many girls present, almost all were pampered young ladies from prominent families.
0016.speaker: 旁白
0016.cn: 在座的诸多女生，哪个不是大家族娇生惯养的大小姐。

0016.en: Their looks and figures were naturally not bad, but compared to Su Tao, they all seemed slightly inferior.
0016.speaker: 旁白
0016.cn: 颜值身材自然不差，只是比起苏桃，好似都稍逊一筹。

0016.en: Some jealous girls soon curled their lips in disdain. "A couple attending a banquet without even linking arms? How fake."
0016.speaker: 陌生女1
0016.cn: 有一些善妒的女生很快就不屑地撇嘴了，“男女对象参加晚宴，连挽手都没有，弄虚作假。”

0016.en: Dongfang Yang happened to be sipping wine next to this girl and chuckled, "Don't be fooled by Ye Liang's confident look. I bet he hasn't even held Su Tao's hand."
0016.speaker: 东方阳
0016.cn: 东方阳恰巧就在这个女生旁边品着小酒，嗤笑道，“你别看叶良一副胸有成竹的模样，他怕不是都没牵过苏桃的手。”

0016.en: The girl looked at Dongfang Yang curiously. "How do you know?"
0016.speaker: 陌生女1
0016.cn: 女生好奇地看向东方阳，“你怎么知道？”

0016.en: We're rivals, of course I'd know.
0016.speaker: 东方阳
0016.cn: 我是竞争对手，能不知道吗？

0016.en: Back then, he, Ye Liang, and Si Chen were all competing for her, and none of them could outdo the others.
0016.speaker: 东方阳
0016.cn: 当初，他与叶良、司辰三人竞争，谁也拗不过谁。

0016.en: After all, it was just pursuing a girl; it wasn't worth making the three big families fight.
0016.speaker: 东方阳
0016.cn: 终究是追一个女孩子，犯不着让三大家族打起来。

0016.en: So they made a pact: no one could force Su Tao. Unless she was willing, they couldn't even touch her, and that included holding hands!
0016.speaker: 东方阳
0016.cn: 于是做出约定，谁也不能强迫苏桃，除非苏桃自愿，否则更不能碰她，牵手也在内！

0016.en: And so, they began a fair competition.
0016.speaker: 东方阳
0016.cn: 而后展开公平竞争。

0016.en: He, Dongfang Yang, was a young master, Ye Liang was a CEO, and Si Chen's status was also high. Each of them had their own pride, thinking that winning over a common girl would be easy, right?
0016.speaker: 东方阳
0016.cn: 他东方阳是少爷，叶良是总裁，司辰身份亦是不低，每个人都有自己的傲骨，想着追一个平民小女生不是简简单单？

0016.en: The result was that they held onto that pride.
0016.speaker: 东方阳
0016.cn: 结果就是带着自己的这份骄傲。

0016.en: They pursued Su Tao for three months.
0016.speaker: 东方阳
0016.cn: 追了苏桃三个月。

0016.en: Forget about caressing her cheek or hugging each other.
0016.speaker: 东方白
0016.cn: 别说什么抚摸脸颊相互拥抱了。

0016.en: They hadn't even properly held her hand once!
0016.speaker: 东方阳
0016.cn: 正经的牵手都没试过一次！

0016.en: The jealous girl looked at Su Tao, who kept a slight distance from Ye Liang, and sneered, "So what if he's the great Young Master Ye? He's still just a simp."
0016.speaker: 陌生女1
0016.cn: 善妒的女生看着和叶良始终隔了一寸距离的苏桃，冷笑了一声，“什么叶家大少爷，不也是个舔狗。”

0016.en: Dongfang Yang: "..."
0016.speaker: 东方阳

0016.en: Why do I feel like I just got insulted too?
0016.speaker: 东方阳
0016.cn: 为什么感觉自己也挨骂了。

0016.en: Just then, another girl in a flowing red dress walked over, holding a wine glass. "Well, well, Young Master Dongfang, drinking all alone? Can't find a date?"
0016.speaker: 钱清
0016.cn: 这时，又有一个女生举着一只酒杯走来，红色的礼裙款款，“哟，东方少爷怎么独自饮酒，找不到女伴？”

0016.en: Recognizing the newcomer, Dongfang Yang lightly clinked his glass against hers. "Qian Qing, aren't you alone too? I don't lack women, I just can't be bothered to find one."
0016.speaker: 东方阳
0016.cn: 见来的是自己熟悉的人，东方阳轻轻碰了一下杯，“钱清你不也是一个人吗，我不缺女人，只是懒得找而已。”

0016.en: Qian Qing glanced at Su Tao with an understanding look. "I know all about the pact between you three young masters. But if you ask me, you're all taking it too seriously. You don't have to pursue a girl so directly, you know. There are plenty of other ways to try."
0016.speaker: 钱清
0016.cn: 钱清多看了一眼苏桃，一副我懂的模样，“我只懂你们三个大少爷的约定，不过在我看来就是太较真了，追女孩子又不一定是要正面去追，大把方式可以尝试嘛。”

0016.en: "Besides, your family looks down on her, right? To attend a party for her without even bringing a date... that's really lowering your status."
0016.speaker: 钱清
0016.cn: “而且啊，你家里人也看不上她吧，为了她参加宴会连女伴都不找一个，这也太掉价了。”

0016.en: After speaking, Qian Qing took a sip of wine and sat down next to Dongfang Yang.
0016.speaker: 旁白
0016.cn: 说完，钱清抿了一口小酒，就这样坐在了东方阳身边。

0016.en: But she kept her eyes on Su Tao, her expression still one of annoyance.
0016.speaker: 旁白
0016.cn: 只是视线盯着苏桃，依旧一副不爽的模样。

0016.en: As for Dongfang Yang, he was actually a little moved.
0016.speaker: 旁白
0016.cn: 倒是东方阳，心中有些微微动容。

0016.en: Of course he didn't lack women. With a single word, plenty of beautiful young ladies from wealthy families would want to be with him.
0016.speaker: 旁白
0016.cn: 女人他当然不缺，一句话大把家族的漂亮大小姐想和他联姻。

0016.en: He just didn't like those kinds of women. They were only after his money and family influence.
0016.speaker: 旁白
0016.cn: 只是他不喜欢那种女人，无非就是看上自己的钱和家族势力。

0016.en: Even that foolish and dense Chi Xiaocheng had more character than them.
0016.speaker: 旁白
0016.cn: 即便是那又蠢又呆的池小橙，都比那些女人有特点。

0016.en: Her looks weren't bad either.
0016.speaker: 旁白
0016.cn: 颜值也不差。

0016.en: She was just a bit short.
0016.speaker: 旁白
0016.cn: 就是矮了点。

0016.en: "Forget it, why am I thinking about her?"
0016.speaker: 东方阳
0016.cn: “算了，想她干什么呢。”

0016.en: Dongfang Yang shook his head, looked at Su Tao's back, and downed the wine in his glass.
0016.speaker: 旁白
0016.cn: 东方阳摇了摇头，看着苏桃的背影，将杯中酒一口闷下。

0016.en: Meanwhile, after dealing with the many people who came up to talk to her, the female lead finally found a moment to sit and relax while Ye Liang was busy chatting with someone else.
0016.speaker: 旁白
0016.cn: 而女主，在应酬完众多搭讪的人后，趁着叶良和别人聊天，终于是能坐到一边放松。

0016.en: Although they were only in the socializing stage and the event hadn't officially started, Ye Liang had promised her that she would have a lot of fun later.
0016.speaker: 旁白
0016.cn: 虽然现在只是交友阶段，活动还未正式开始，叶良也保证说之后会玩得很开心。

0016.en: But this kind of occasion really isn't for me.
0016.speaker: 苏桃
0016.cn: 但这样的场合，还是不适合自己啊。

0016.en: Everyone wore a fake smile on their face.
0016.speaker: 苏桃
0016.cn: 每个人嘴角都挂着虚假的笑容。

0016.en: Their eyes were full of calculation.
0016.speaker: 苏桃
0016.cn: 眼神满是算计。

0016.en: Their polite conversations sounded elegant yet insincere.
0016.speaker: 苏桃
0016.cn: 相敬中的谈吐，显得优雅又虚伪。

0016.en: Different people, because of their different statuses, were either arrogant, flattering, or compromising.
0016.speaker: 苏桃
0016.cn: 不同的人因为不同的身份，或自满，或恭维，或委曲求全。

0016.en: She felt like a small boat, just drifting with the current.
0016.speaker: 旁白
0016.cn: 她只感觉自己像一叶扁舟，随波逐流。

0016.en: She took out her phone to check the time and realized it was already almost 9:30.
0016.speaker: 旁白
0016.cn: 拿起手机看了眼时间，她才发现，不知不觉已经要9点半了。

0016.en: On her home screen, there was a message from Chi Xiaocheng sent four minutes ago: "Taotao, when are you coming back?"
0016.speaker: 池小橙
0016.cn: 主屏幕上，还有着池小橙四分钟前发来的消息：“桃桃，你什么时候回来呀？”

0016.en: Su Tao smiled, recalling the times in elementary and middle school when she and Chi Xiaocheng had relied on each other.
0016.speaker: 旁白
0016.cn: 苏桃抿嘴笑了笑，又回忆起了小学和初中时跟池小橙相依为命的时光。

0016.en: "When I get back later, I have to have a good talk with Xiaocheng and clear up the recent misunderstandings. Then our relationship can definitely go back to how it was before!"
0016.speaker: 苏桃
0016.cn: “等一会儿回去了，一定要和小橙好好聊聊，尽早解除这段时间产生的误会，然后我们的关系一定能恢复和从前一样！”

0016.en: "But I probably won't be back until 11, right?"
0016.speaker: 苏桃
0016.cn: “不过回去的话，估计得11点吧？”

0016.en: She swiped the screen to unlock her phone.
0016.speaker: 旁白
0016.cn: 她滑动屏幕，解锁手机。

0016.en: Just as she was about to reply to Chi Xiaocheng, she noticed that the red notification dot for Chi Xiaocheng in WeChat showed dozens of messages!
0016.speaker: 旁白
0016.cn: 正想着给池小橙回个消息，结果却注意到，微信那里池小橙一栏的红点，竟是显示几十条消息！

0016.en: What on earth did Xiaocheng send me?
0016.speaker: 苏桃
0016.cn: 小橙到底发了什么给我。

0016.en: Why are there so many?
0016.speaker: 苏桃
0016.cn: 怎么这么多？

0016.en: She clicked into the chat and shot up from her seat.
0016.speaker: 旁白
0016.cn: 她点进聊天页面，“唰”地一下站了起来。

0016.en: In her haste, she knocked over a wine glass next to her.
0016.speaker: 旁白
0016.cn: 一个不注意，碰倒了旁边的一个酒杯。

0016.en: The sharp crash attracted the attention of most of the guests.
0016.speaker: 旁白
0016.cn: “砰”的一声脆响，吸引了大部分宾客的目光。

0016.en: But Su Tao's gaze was fixed on her phone, completely oblivious to the outside world.
0016.speaker: 旁白
0016.cn: 但苏桃的视线却紧紧盯着手机，丝毫没注意到外界。

0016.en: She scrolled down the screen. Starting from around 8 o'clock, Chi Xiaocheng had sent the same message every five minutes.
0016.speaker: 旁白
0016.cn: 指尖下滑屏幕，从8点左右开始，每隔5分钟，池小橙就会发来这样一条消息。

0016.en: —Taotao, when are you coming back?
0016.speaker: 池小橙
0016.cn: ——桃桃，你什么时候回来呀？

0016.en: Like a prank call from a horror movie, the messages sent a chill down Su Tao's spine.
0016.speaker: 旁白
0016.cn: 犹如午夜凶铃的恶作剧信息，让苏桃毛骨悚然。

0016.en: The last message was sent at exactly 9:30.
0016.speaker: 旁白
0016.cn: 上一条消息是9点30分整发出来的。

0016.en: And the next second, as soon as it turned 9:35, another new message came in. "Taotao, when are you coming back?"
0016.speaker: 池小橙
0016.cn: 而下一秒，9点35分一到，立刻又是一条新消息发了过来，“桃桃，你什么时候回来呀？”

0016.en: For some reason, Su Tao thought of Chi Xiaocheng's strange state in the basement.
0016.speaker: 旁白
0016.cn: 莫名的，苏桃想到了池小橙地下室时那奇怪的状态。

0016.en: She froze on the spot, her lips feeling a bit dry.
0016.speaker: 旁白
0016.cn: 她身子僵在原地，嘴唇有些干。

0016.en: It wasn't until a voice spoke beside her, "Miss, please lift your foot, be careful not to get hurt."
0016.speaker: 陌生男1
0016.cn: 直至旁边传来一道询问，“小姐，请抬一下脚，小心伤到。”

0016.en: A waiter had appeared at her feet at some point and was carefully cleaning up the broken glass.
0016.speaker: 旁白
0016.cn: 服务生不知什么时候来到了她的脚下，正小心翼翼地清理玻璃碎片。

0016.en: Su Tao numbly moved aside and quickly looked back at her phone.
0016.speaker: 旁白
0016.cn: 苏桃呆呆地挪到一边，又赶紧看向手机。

0016.en: A thought crossed her mind.
0016.speaker: 旁白
0016.cn: 心中产生一个念头。

0016.en: Maybe, just maybe, this is an automatic message feature Xiaocheng set up!
0016.speaker: 苏桃
0016.cn: 没准，没准这是小橙设置的自动发消息功能！

0016.en: But does WeChat even have that feature?
0016.speaker: 苏桃
0016.cn: 不过微信有这个功能吗？

0016.en: She couldn't think of one, but she typed a line with trembling fingers.
0016.speaker: 旁白
0016.cn: 她想不到，但还是颤抖着指尖输入了一行字。

0016.en: "Xiaocheng, are you okay?"
0016.speaker: 苏桃
0016.cn: “小橙，你没事吧？”

0016.en: The next second, a message from Chi Xiaocheng arrived.
0016.speaker: 旁白
0016.cn: 下一秒，池小橙的消息发来了。

0016.en: "Taotao, you finally replied! Of course I'm okay!"
0016.speaker: 池小橙
0016.cn: “桃桃你终于回我消息了，我当然没事呀！”

0016.en: "Phew—"
0016.speaker: 旁白

0016.en: Su Tao breathed a sigh of relief. Maybe it was just bad reception.
0016.speaker: 旁白
0016.cn: 苏桃松了一口气，没准是网络卡了。

0016.en: "I've been waiting for you. Taotao, when are you coming back?"
0016.speaker: 池小橙
0016.cn: “我一直在等你呢，桃桃你什么时候回来呀？”

0016.en: Forgetting the stray strand of hair that had fallen beside her cheek, she quickly typed, "I won't be back so soon. Xiaocheng, are you still in my dorm? Why don't you go back first? Have some water, get some sleep, and we can talk about everything tomorrow, okay?"
0016.speaker: 苏桃
0016.cn: 少女顾不得垂到侧脸的一抹调皮发梢，连忙打字道，“我没那么快回来，小橙你还在我宿舍吗，要不你先回去吧，喝口水睡个觉，有什么事情我们明天再说好吗？”

0016.en: Between the lines, she could sense that something was off with Chi Xiaocheng's mood.
0016.speaker: 旁白
0016.cn: 字里行间，她隐隐感觉到池小橙的情绪有些不对。

0016.en: Just as she was thinking about how to gently probe, she saw another strange reply from Chi Xiaocheng.
0016.speaker: 旁白
0016.cn: 正想着怎么旁敲侧击，又见到池小橙奇怪的回复。

0016.en: "Drink water? But it's all water here, I can't drink it all."
0016.speaker: 池小橙
0016.cn: “喝水？可这里全是水，喝不完呀。”

0016.en: What does that sentence mean?
0016.speaker: 苏桃
0016.cn: 这句话是什么意思？

0016.en: Su Tao didn't understand, but a loud clap of thunder echoed outside, and heavy rain beat against a nearby window.
0016.speaker: 旁白
0016.cn: 苏桃没看懂，可外面一声惊雷响起，大雨就拍打在自己不远处的窗户。

0016.en: She suddenly thought of a possibility.
0016.speaker: 旁白
0016.cn: 她猛地想到了一种可能。

0016.en: "Xiaocheng, where are you waiting for me?"
0016.speaker: 苏桃
0016.cn: “小橙，你在哪等的我？”

0016.en: "The rooftop. Didn't we agree? I'll wait for you on the rooftop at 9 o'clock."
0016.speaker: 池小橙
0016.cn: “天台呀，我们不是约好了吗，9点钟我在天台等你。”

0016.en: Another string of words, like a death sentence.
0016.speaker: 旁白
0016.cn: 又是一串字，如催命符一般。

0016.en: "So, Taotao, when are you coming back?"
0016.speaker: 池小橙
0016.cn: “所以桃桃，你什么时候回来呀？”

0017.en: Chapter 17: Am I still not as important as Chi Xiaocheng?
0017.speaker: 旁白
0017.cn: 第17章 难道我还没池小橙重要吗！（谢谢人无完人的狄修打赏）

0017.en: No, no, no, no!
0017.speaker: 苏桃
0017.cn: 不对不对不对不对！

0017.en: Su Tao's breathing quickened as she stared intently at the new message on WeChat.
0017.speaker: 旁白
0017.cn: 苏桃呼吸都急促了起来，死死地盯着微信上新发来的消息。

0017.en: Waiting for me on the rooftop?
0017.speaker: 苏桃
0017.cn: 在天台等自己？

0017.en: In such strong wind and heavy rain!
0017.speaker: 苏桃
0017.cn: 那么大的风和雨！

0017.en: She hoped it was just one of Chi Xiaocheng's pranks.
0017.speaker: 旁白
0017.cn: 她更希望这是池小橙的恶作剧。

0017.en: In this weather, with Chi Xiaocheng's weak constitution, she couldn't bear to imagine what would happen if she stayed in the rain for so long!
0017.speaker: 旁白
0017.cn: 这样的天气，以池小橙那虚弱的身体淋雨那么久，她都不敢想会怎么样！

0017.en: Just then, Ye Liang walked over, noticed Su Tao's uneasy expression, and asked with concern, "Is something wrong?"
0017.speaker: 叶良
0017.cn: 这时，叶良走了过来，注意到了苏桃不对劲的神色，关心问道，“怎么了吗？”

0017.en: Su Tao glanced at him and, with trembling lips, made an excuse, "Xiaocheng is stuck in the rain and can't get back. She wants me to bring her an umbrella."
0017.speaker: 苏桃
0017.cn: 苏桃看了一眼他，颤颤的薄唇找了个借口，“小橙在外面被雨淋了回不去，想让我送伞来着。”

0017.en: Ye Liang scoffed, "She should just wait for the rain to stop. The wind and rain are so heavy, even cars can barely drive, let alone a person. You're going to deliver an umbrella?"
0017.speaker: 叶良
0017.cn: 叶良呵了一声，“还是让她躲到雨停吧，外面这么大的风雨，别说是人了，就算是车都很难开，你过去送伞？”

0017.en: He glanced at Su Tao's slender figure under her dress. "Forget the umbrella, you'd be blown away yourself."
0017.speaker: 叶良
0017.cn: 他看了眼苏桃那藏在裙下的纤细身子，“别说是伞了，连你都得被吹走。”

0017.en: He then shrugged and added, "Just let her fend for herself. The event is about to start, shouldn't we go in?"
0017.speaker: 叶良
0017.cn: 说罢又耸耸肩，“还是让那家伙自生自灭吧，活动准备要开始了，我们也进去吧？”

0017.en: "You... you wait for me a moment." Still worried, Su Tao took her phone to the side. "I'm going to make a call."
0017.speaker: 苏桃
0017.cn: “你...你等我一下。”苏桃还是放心不下，拿着手机到了一边，“我去打个电话。”

0017.en: With that, she directly called Chi Xiaocheng on WeChat.
0017.speaker: 旁白
0017.cn: 说罢，直接拨通了池小橙的微信电话。

0017.en: She couldn't hear Chi Xiaocheng's voice yet.
0017.speaker: 旁白
0017.cn: 还没听到池小橙的声音。

0017.en: Instead, her ears were filled with the sound of howling wind and pounding rain.
0017.speaker: 旁白
0017.cn: 入耳即是呼啸的狂风和不断拍打的雨点。

0017.en: The sound of rumbling thunder made Su Tao realize that Chi Xiaocheng was definitely not indoors.
0017.speaker: 旁白
0017.cn: 阵阵惊雷的响起让苏桃意识到，池小橙绝不在室内。

0017.en: On the rooftop!
0017.speaker: 苏桃
0017.cn: 在天台！

0017.en: Su Tao panicked and anxiously said, "Xiaocheng! Xiaocheng, can you hear me?"
0017.speaker: 苏桃
0017.cn: 苏桃慌了，焦急地开口道，“小橙！小橙你能听到我说话吗？”

0017.en: On the other side, Chi Xiaocheng, standing under a rain shelter on the rooftop, heard Su Tao's anxious voice and couldn't help but sigh internally.
0017.speaker: 旁白
0017.cn: 而另一边，正在天台一处挡雨板下的池小橙听到苏桃焦急的声音，心中不由感叹。

0017.en: So this is the universally loved female lead.
0017.speaker: 池小橙
0017.cn: 这就是万人迷的女主啊。

0017.en: Even though I'm just the sidekick.
0017.speaker: 池小橙
0017.cn: 即便自己是炮灰女配。

0017.en: Even though I've done so many terrible things to her.
0017.speaker: 池小橙
0017.cn: 即便自己对她做了很多过分的事情。

0017.en: She still forgives me and offers her care and trust without hesitation.
0017.speaker: 池小橙
0017.cn: 依旧会包容自己，并毫不犹豫地投来关心与信任。

0017.en: Having been betrayed by her girlfriend twice in her past life, Chi Xiaocheng cherished this kind of concern that poured down like a rainstorm.
0017.speaker: 旁白
0017.cn: 前世被女友背叛过两次的池小橙，很喜欢这种如暴雨般倾泻的关心。

0017.en: Keeping her act up, her voice was flat and emotionless. "I can hear your voice, Taotao. What's wrong?"
0017.speaker: 池小橙
0017.cn: 她演技持续开启，声线平淡得听不出情感，“我能听到桃桃的声音，怎么了吗？”

0017.en: In the cruise ship's main hall, Su Tao sighed in relief but quickly said, "Xiaocheng, I can't come back that quickly. Please go downstairs, okay? The rooftop is windy and rainy, it's very dangerous!"
0017.speaker: 苏桃
0017.cn: 游轮的大厅，苏桃松了一口气的同时，着急道，“小橙，我回来不了那么快的，你先下去好吗，天台风大，雨大，很危险的！”

0017.en: However, Chi Xiaocheng seemed to only hear the key part of her sentence. "Go downstairs?"
0017.speaker: 池小橙
0017.cn: 然而池小橙似乎只听到了她这句话的重点，“下去？”

0017.en: "Yes." Su Tao didn't catch the hidden meaning in Chi Xiaocheng's words, and realizing her own tone was off, she softened her voice. "Go downstairs first, return to your dorm, take a hot shower, and rest. We can talk about whatever it is when I get back, okay? I should be able to leave around 11."
0017.speaker: 苏桃
0017.cn: “是啊。”苏桃没听出来池小橙的言外之意，也意识到自己情绪不对，声音变得温和了一些，“你先下去，回自己宿舍洗个热水澡休息一下，有什么事情等我回来再说好吗，我这边11点应该就能回去了。”

0017.en: "But we made a promise. I have to wait for you. Didn't we agree?"
0017.speaker: 池小橙
0017.cn: “可是说好了的，我要等你，约好了不是吗？”

0017.en: How could she not know that Chi Xiaocheng had slipped back into that strange state from the basement?
0017.speaker: 旁白
0017.cn: 她哪能不知道，池小橙是又进入了地下室时的奇怪状态。

0017.en: She didn't have time to think about whether this was her true nature or just a temporary, illness-like state.
0017.speaker: 旁白
0017.cn: 顾不得去思考这是她的本性，还是说这样的状态是临时的，是一种病。

0017.en: Su Tao tried to keep her tone from sounding too urgent and persuaded her, "It's just a chat, we can do it anywhere. When I get back, I'll listen carefully to whatever you have to say, Xiaocheng. We can have a good talk then."
0017.speaker: 苏桃
0017.cn: 苏桃尽量让自己的语气不那么急促，劝解道，“只是聊天而已，在哪里都一样的，等我回去，小橙你有什么话我都会仔细听的，我们到时候再好好聊聊。”

0017.en: "What will we talk about then?" Chi Xiaocheng asked again.
0017.speaker: 池小橙
0017.cn: “那聊什么呢？”池小橙又问。

0017.en: Su Tao bit her lower lip, glanced at Ye Liang not far away, and lowered her voice. "We'll talk about... the fact that you like me, Xiaocheng. I have a lot I want to say to you too. So be good and go back and wait for me."
0017.speaker: 苏桃
0017.cn: 苏桃咬了咬下唇，偷看一眼不远处的叶良后，压着声音道，“就聊...小橙你喜欢我的这件事，我也有许多话想对你说的，所以听话，先回去等我。”

0017.en: "Then it's the same if I wait for you here. After all, we agreed."
0017.speaker: 池小橙
0017.cn: “那我在这里等你也一样的，毕竟约好了。”

0017.en: The rain is so heavy, how is that the same!
0017.speaker: 旁白
0017.cn: 雨那么大呢，哪里一样了！

0017.en: Since the soft approach wasn't working, Su Tao had to be firm.
0017.speaker: 旁白
0017.cn: 软的不行，苏桃也只能来硬的。

0017.en: So she said to Chi Xiaocheng, "Xiaocheng, listen to me and go downstairs. If you don't listen, then I won't come back, and I won't talk with you."
0017.speaker: 苏桃
0017.cn: 于是她对池小橙说道，“小橙听话，先下去，你要是不听话，那我可就不回来了，也不会和你聊天了。”

0017.en: It was always like this when they were young.
0017.speaker: 旁白
0017.cn: 小的时候就是。

0017.en: As long as she acted like she was about to get angry.
0017.speaker: 旁白
0017.cn: 只要她摆出这样要生气的样子。

0017.en: No matter how much of a tantrum Chi Xiaocheng was throwing, she would obediently listen.
0017.speaker: 旁白
0017.cn: 再怎么闹的池小橙，都会乖乖地听话。

0017.en: She was occasionally mischievous, but most of the time, she was very sensible.
0017.speaker: 旁白
0017.cn: 她偶尔会调皮，大部分时间都很懂事。

0017.en: This time was no different.
0017.speaker: 旁白
0017.cn: 这次也一样。

0017.en: Hearing Su Tao's serious voice, Chi Xiaocheng's tone softened again, just like before, and sounded a little hurt. "Alright then, I'll listen to you."
0017.speaker: 池小橙
0017.cn: 池小橙听到苏桃严肃的声音，又和以前一样声音软了下来，还有点委屈，“那好吧，我听你的话。”

0017.en: "Okay, okay, I promise I'll be back soon!"
0017.speaker: 苏桃
0017.cn: “嗯嗯，我保证很快回来！”

0017.en: At this, Su Tao finally breathed a sigh of relief.
0017.speaker: 旁白
0017.cn: 到这里，苏桃总算是松了一口气。

0017.en: She had been clashing with Chi Xiaocheng for the past two months and couldn't get close to her at all.
0017.speaker: 旁白
0017.cn: 这两个月一直和池小橙起冲突，她都没办法接近对方。

0017.en: She didn't know what had happened.
0017.speaker: 旁白
0017.cn: 也不知道发生了什么事情。

0017.en: It must be her so-called group of sisters who led Xiaocheng astray!
0017.speaker: 旁白
0017.cn: 一定是她那群所谓的姐妹，把小橙带坏了！

0017.en: After she gets back from the party, she can finally have a proper talk with Xiaocheng.
0017.speaker: 旁白
0017.cn: 等宴会回去，就能好好地和小橙聊一聊了。

0017.en: As she was thinking this, Chi Xiaocheng's voice was heard again over the sound of the rain on the call, "If I go down, will Taotao definitely come back?"
0017.speaker: 池小橙
0017.cn: 如是想着，微信通话里除了雨声，又多了池小橙的声音，“我下去的话，桃桃一定会回来吗？”

0017.en: "Be good." Su Tao's voice became gentle again. "I won't lie to you, Xiaocheng. Don't worry."
0017.speaker: 苏桃
0017.cn: “乖。”苏桃语气再度温柔，“我不会骗小橙的，放心吧。”

0017.en: "Okay!"
0017.speaker: 池小橙

0017.en: Chi Xiaocheng's voice sounded a bit more cheerful.
0017.speaker: 旁白
0017.cn: 池小橙声音雀跃了一分。

0017.en: The conversation seemed to end there, but the WeChat call didn't disconnect. Su Tao wanted to keep listening to make sure the sound of the rain would get quieter, confirming Chi Xiaocheng had gone back inside.
0017.speaker: 旁白
0017.cn: 聊天似乎就到此结束，但微信电话并没有挂断，苏桃想确认一下声音，确认雨声变小，池小橙乖乖回到宿舍里。

0017.en: But as she listened, she realized the rain wasn't getting any quieter.
0017.speaker: 旁白
0017.cn: 可听着听着，她发现雨声怎么也没有变小。

0017.en: It didn't sound like she had gone indoors at all.
0017.speaker: 旁白
0017.cn: 丝毫没有回到室内的样子。

0017.en: After a while.
0017.speaker: 旁白
0017.cn: 好一会儿。

0017.en: The voice on the phone finally changed, and Chi Xiaocheng's soft, emotionless voice came through, "If I go down, Taotao will come back."
0017.speaker: 池小橙
0017.cn: 电话里的声音终于变了，多了池小橙毫无情感的柔软声音，“下去，桃桃就会回来。”

0017.en: "The 14th floor is a bit high."
0017.speaker: 池小橙
0017.cn: “14楼，有点高呢。”

0017.en: Hearing this, Su Tao froze for a moment.
0017.speaker: 旁白
0017.cn: 苏桃闻言，愣了一下。

0017.en: "Xiaocheng!"
0017.speaker: 苏桃
0017.cn: “小橙！”

0017.en: She realized too late and shouted, losing all her composure.
0017.speaker: 旁白
0017.cn: 她后知后觉，毫无形象地大声喊了一句。

0017.en: "Beep, beep, beep—"
0017.speaker: 旁白

0017.en: The call had already been disconnected.
0017.speaker: 旁白
0017.cn: 电话，已然挂断。

0017.en: She frantically tried to redial, but she couldn't get through.
0017.speaker: 旁白
0017.cn: 她手忙脚乱地重新拨打，却怎么也拨不通。

0017.en: "Su Tao, are you done with your call? The event is about to start, we need to head to the exhibition hall inside the cruise ship."
0017.speaker: 叶良
0017.cn: “苏桃，电话打完没有，活动要开始了，我们要往游轮里面的展厅去了。”

0017.en: Just then, Ye Liang walked over and saw Su Tao fumbling with her phone, her face filled with anxiety.
0017.speaker: 旁白
0017.cn: 这时，叶良从旁边走来，却见苏桃手忙脚乱，脸上表情焦急无比。

0017.en: She couldn't get through to Chi Xiaocheng's WeChat, and even calling her mobile number resulted in a notification that the phone was off. She lost her composure.
0017.speaker: 旁白
0017.cn: 怎么也无法拨通池小橙的微信电话，就连打手机号也是消息提示已关机，她失了分寸。

0017.en: She even imagined Chi Xiaocheng falling from the 14th floor with her phone.
0017.speaker: 旁白
0017.cn: 甚至想象到了池小橙和手机一同从14楼摔下。

0017.en: The phone would be shattered to pieces.
0017.speaker: 旁白
0017.cn: 手机碎了稀巴烂。

0017.en: And the person would be...
0017.speaker: 旁白
0017.cn: 人也

0017.en: She didn't dare to think further and quickly said to Ye Liang, "Ye Liang, I... I have to go back to the university. I'm not attending the party. Can you take me back?"
