0023.en: "She gets killed by a heaven-sent supporting female character, betrayed by the male lead, her relatives and friends die, and finally ends up dying from self-harm."
0023.speaker: 池小橙
0023.cn: “被天降女配爆杀，男主背叛，亲人朋友死亡，最后落得个自残而死的下场。”

0023.en: "I'm not doing this for selfish desires, but to save her, so I have no choice but to take this extreme route!"
0023.speaker: 池小橙
0023.cn: “我不是为了一己私欲，而是为了救她所以才不得不走极端的路线！”

0023.en: Chi Xiaocheng spoke with great righteousness.
0023.speaker: 旁白
0023.cn: 池小橙说得大义凛然。

0023.en: What yandere evil little loli?
0023.speaker: 池小橙
0023.cn: 什么病娇邪恶小萝莉？

0023.en: Please, my moral compass is super straight, okay!
0023.speaker: 池小橙
0023.cn: 拜托，我三观超正的好不好！

0023.en: Just as she was getting excited talking with the System, Chi Xiaocheng's phone suddenly vibrated.
0023.speaker: 旁白
0023.cn: 正和系统谈得上头，池小橙手机忽然震动了一下。

0023.en: It was actually a message from Chen Qian to her alternate account.
0023.speaker: 旁白
0023.cn: 竟然是陈倩发给自己小号的一条消息。

0023.en: "What exactly did you do to Su Tao? She actually sent me a message early this morning asking such strange questions?"
0023.speaker: 陈倩
0023.cn: “你到底对苏桃做了什么，她竟然大清早发消息问我这么奇怪的问题？”

0023.en: Chi Xiaocheng raised an eyebrow, showing a pleased expression.
0023.speaker: 旁白
0023.cn: 池小橙眉毛一挑，面露喜色。

0023.en: It had only been two days since she had won over Chen Qian and placed her beside Su Tao, but the effect was already showing.
0023.speaker: 旁白
0023.cn: 将陈倩收服并放在苏桃身边才两天，没想到作用这么快就来了。

0023.en: Perfect timing—she could start the next step of her plan!
0023.speaker: 旁白
0023.cn: 刚好她的下一步计划可以展开了！

0024.en: Chapter 24: Do You Know About Yandere?
0024.speaker: 旁白
0024.cn: 第24章 你知道病娇吗？

0024.en: Chi Xiaocheng had thought about this long before winning over Chen Qian.
0024.speaker: 旁白
0024.cn: 早在收服陈倩前，池小橙就想过。

0024.en: Su Tao must be completely confused when facing her right now, and because of her special situation, she wouldn't talk to Ye Liang, Dongfang Yang, or others about it. This meant she would definitely look for other people to ask about her condition.
0024.speaker: 旁白
0024.cn: 苏桃此时面对自己肯定一头雾水，由于自己的特殊性她不会和叶良东方阳等说，那么势必会找其他人询问自己的情况。

0024.en: Now that they had just entered university two months ago, among the supporting characters who had good relationships with Su Tao, Chen Qian, who was still undercover, was one of them.
0024.speaker: 旁白
0024.cn: 如今刚入大学两个月，和苏桃关系好的配角里，还在潜伏的陈倩就是其中一个。

0024.en: As long as Su Tao asked Chen Qian about her, she would have a lot of room to operate.
0024.speaker: 旁白
0024.cn: 只要苏桃询问陈倩有关自己的事情，那么自己的可操作空间就很大了。

0024.en: Thinking of this, Chi Xiaocheng sent a message to Chen Qian, "What did she tell you?"
0024.speaker: 池小橙
0024.cn: 想到这里，池小橙发消息给陈倩道，“她跟你说了什么？”

0024.en: Chen Qian replied, "She said some strange things, like if someone who was normally fine suddenly became weird, having episodes and asking what oranges taste like and stuff."
0024.speaker: 陈倩
0024.cn: 陈倩：“说的东西奇奇怪怪的，说什么如果有个人本来挺正常的，忽然变得奇怪了起来，又是发病又是问橙子什么味道什么的。”

0024.en: Chen Qian: "You're playing such a big game, and what does she mean by what she said?"
0024.speaker: 陈倩
0024.cn: 陈倩：“你玩这么大，而且她说的又是啥意思？”

0024.en: Chi Xiaocheng: "Why do you think it's me?"
0024.speaker: 池小橙
0024.cn: 池小橙：“你为什么认为是我？”

0024.en: Chen Qian: "You told me to stay hidden around her just to deceive her, right? Just tell me directly how you want me to respond to her."
0024.speaker: 陈倩
0024.cn: 陈倩：“你让我在她身边不要露头不就是为了骗她吗，你直接说让我怎么回她吧。”

0024.en: Chi Xiaocheng felt a bit embarrassed.
0024.speaker: 旁白
0024.cn: 池小橙微微汗颜。

0024.en: Was it that obvious?
0024.speaker: 池小橙
0024.cn: 有那么明显吗。

0024.en: She sent over a WeChat ID, "Tell Su Tao to add this account. This is a professional psychologist."
0024.speaker: 池小橙
0024.cn: 她推了一个微信号过去，“你让苏桃加这个号，这个是专业的心理医生。”

0024.en: Chen Qian: "A psychologist?"
0024.speaker: 陈倩
0024.cn: 陈倩：“心理医生？”

0024.en: "Just say it's someone you know, someone reliable."
0024.speaker: 池小橙
0024.cn: “反正你就说是你认识的熟人，很可靠就行。”

0024.en: Chi Xiaocheng quickly switched to a different WeChat account and logged into another one of her alternate accounts.
0024.speaker: 旁白
0024.cn: 池小橙迅速切换了一个微信分身，然后登上了自己的又一个小号。

0024.en: This psychologist was exactly the account she had created. Whether it was the content in the friend circle or the contacts, she had disguised everything very well.
0024.speaker: 旁白
0024.cn: 这个心理医生正是她搞的号，无论是朋友圈的内容还是联系人，都被她伪装得很好。

0024.en: As for where she got these skills, she had to thank the system's single draw last time - Hacker (Intermediate).
0024.speaker: 旁白
0024.cn: 至于哪里来的手段，这就要归功于上次系统单抽出的一个技能——黑客（中级）。

0024.en: Chi Xiaocheng originally didn't think this skill would be very useful. The original owner was just an ordinary student, and she was already grateful she didn't start with debt. She didn't have money to buy a series of hacking tools.
0024.speaker: 旁白
0024.cn: 池小橙原本没觉得这个技能有多大用处，原主只是普通学生，没有开局负债她已经很庆幸了，根本没钱买一系列的黑客工具。

0024.en: Without even a botnet, what kind of hacker could she be?
0024.speaker: 池小橙
0024.cn: 肉鸡都没有，当什么黑客？

0024.en: But thinking about it again, even without tools, she had already gained the corresponding knowledge. She could still do some basic disguising of her information without any problems.
0024.speaker: 旁白
0024.cn: 可转念一想，即便没有工具，已经得到了相应的知识，她对自己的信息做一些基础的掩饰还是没问题的。

0024.en: Like creating this fairly perfect psychologist alternate account.
0024.speaker: 旁白
0024.cn: 比如整了这个比较完美的心理医生小号。

0024.en: And like how she knew her changes would be investigated by Dongfang Yang, Ye Liang, and others, so she spread a lot of information that could cover up her strange behavior.
0024.speaker: 旁白
0024.cn: 又比如她清楚自己的变化会被东方阳和叶良等人查，所以往外散布了不少能够掩盖自己变得奇怪的信息。

0024.en: For example, bullying!
0024.speaker: 池小橙
0024.cn: 比如八零！

0024.en: The original owner had always been bullied, and Chi Xiaocheng could completely use being bullied to explain her psychological changes.
0024.speaker: 旁白
0024.cn: 原主一直都有被欺负，池小橙完全可以用被欺负来解释自己的心理变化。

0024.en: With Su Tao's character, if she was being bullied, she would definitely blame herself for not protecting her well, right?
0024.speaker: 池小橙
0024.cn: 以苏桃的人设，自己被欺负，肯定会自责没保护好我吧？

0024.en: Although Chen Qian didn't know why Chi Xiaocheng wanted to do this, she still followed her instructions and recommended this psychologist's WeChat to Su Tao.
0024.speaker: 旁白
0024.cn: 陈倩虽然不知道池小橙为什么要那样做，但还是按照她的说法，将这个心理医生的微信推荐给了苏桃。

0024.en: Then she found several more reasons.
0024.speaker: 旁白
0024.cn: 接着又找了几个理由。

0024.en: Before long, Su Tao added Chi Xiaocheng's alternate account.
0024.speaker: 旁白
0024.cn: 没多久，苏桃就加上了池小橙的小号。

0024.en: Chi Xiaocheng looked sideways at the wall on the right, as if she could see Su Tao sitting on the hospital bed holding her phone, with a cute expression and slightly furrowed eyebrows.
0024.speaker: 旁白
0024.cn: 池小橙侧目看向右边的墙壁，似乎见到了苏桃坐在病床上拿着手机，微皱秀眉的可爱模样。

0024.en: A shallow smile curved at the corners of her lips as she sent the first message.
0024.speaker: 旁白
0024.cn: 唇角浅浅地扬起一个笑容，率先发了消息过去。

0024.en: Dr. Cheng: "Hello (handshake)."
0024.speaker: 池小橙
0024.cn: 成医生：“你好（握手）。”

0024.en: Peach: "Hello, Doctor. I'm very sorry to bother you."
0024.speaker: 苏桃
0024.cn: 桃子：“医生您好，非常抱歉打扰到您。”

0024.en: Dr. Cheng: "It's fine. As a doctor, it's normal to help patients solve their problems, especially since you were recommended by my distant niece. Just tell me what the problem is."
0024.speaker: 池小橙
0024.cn: 成医生：“没事，作为医生为患者排忧解难是正常的，更何况你还是我那远房侄女推荐来的，有什么问题就先说吧。”

0024.en: Peach: "It's like this - I have a friend who has someone around her who has become very strange because of certain things. Let me organize my words and try to explain it to you as briefly as possible."
0024.speaker: 苏桃
0024.cn: 桃子：“是这样的，我有一个朋友，因为某些事情她身边有个人变得非常奇怪，我稍微整理一下语言，尽量简短一点跟您说。”

0024.en: Seeing this message, Chi Xiaocheng burst out laughing.
0024.speaker: 旁白
0024.cn: 看到这条消息，池小橙“噗嗤”一下，笑了出声。

0024.en: The classic "I have a friend."
0024.speaker: 池小橙
0024.cn: 经典你有一个朋友。

0024.en: "Peach, being this innocent makes you very easy to deceive."
0024.speaker: 池小橙
0024.cn: “桃桃，这么单纯可是很容易被骗的呀。”

0024.en: Chi Xiaocheng decisively exposed Su Tao's disguise, "Miss Peach, I'm a doctor, and we're two strangers. Maybe you think I'm not skilled enough and we should just delete each other. There's no need to be secretive. If you don't tell me honestly, how can I analyze it specifically?"
0024.speaker: 池小橙
0024.cn: 池小橙果断拆穿了苏桃的伪装，“桃子小姐，我是医生，咱们又是素不相识的两个人，兴许你认为我水平不行，咱们就互删了，没必要遮遮掩掩的，你不如实告诉我，我怎么具体分析呢？”

0024.en: This long sentence made Su Tao in the next room blush.
0024.speaker: 旁白
0024.cn: 一串长句，让隔壁病房的苏桃面红耳赤。

0024.en: She instinctively didn't want to face Chi Xiaocheng's strange condition.
0024.speaker: 旁白
0024.cn: 她下意识地不想去面对池小橙那样奇怪的状态。

0024.en: This kind of thing was hard to talk about.
0024.speaker: 旁白
0024.cn: 这种事情说起来又不太好。

0024.en: "Sigh, she even recommended her distant uncle to help me. I can't let down her good intentions!"
0024.speaker: 苏桃
0024.cn: “唉，她都推荐她的远房叔叔帮我了，我也不能辜负她的一片好意啊！”

0024.en: So Su Tao calmed down.
0024.speaker: 旁白
0024.cn: 于是苏桃放平了心态。

0024.en: And started chatting with Chi Xiaocheng, this "Dr. Cheng," about what had happened recently.
0024.speaker: 旁白
0024.cn: 和池小橙这位“成医生”聊起了这段时间发生的事情。

0024.en: First the basement, then the rooftop.
0024.speaker: 旁白
0024.cn: 先是地下室，然后是天台。

0024.en: And she emphasized that Chi Xiaocheng had quite serious self-harm tendencies.
0024.speaker: 旁白
0024.cn: 并且着重说明了池小橙有较为严重的自我伤害倾向。

0024.en: Finally, she asked, "Doctor, why do you think she became like this?"
0024.speaker: 苏桃
0024.cn: 最后，她询问道：“医生，您认为她为什么会变成那样呢？”

0024.en: Chi Xiaocheng pretended to think for a while, then typed, "A person's huge personality change must happen after experiencing something unacceptable, and then gradually changes occur."
0024.speaker: 池小橙
0024.cn: 池小橙假装思考了好一会儿，打字问道，“一个人的性格的巨大转变一定是发生了某些不可接受的事情后，才会渐渐产生变化的。”

0024.en: "Has your friend experienced any disappointment because of something you did?"
0024.speaker: 池小橙
0024.cn: “你那个朋友，有因为你的某种事情而产生过落差吗？”

0024.en: Su Tao immediately thought of Chi Xiaocheng saying she liked her when she saw this message.
0024.speaker: 旁白
0024.cn: 苏桃看到这条消息，瞬间就想到了池小橙说的喜欢她。

0024.en: So she replied, "Yes, we grew up together since childhood. Back then she was bullied, and I helped her. She had some psychological problems at that time and felt very insecure."
0024.speaker: 苏桃
0024.cn: 于是回道，“有的，从小时候开始我们一起长大，当时她被人欺负，是我帮了她，那个时候她就有点心理问题，很没安全感。”

0024.en: "So I often told her things like 'you're the most important person to me' and 'I will never leave you' to comfort her, though I actually meant it."
0024.speaker: 苏桃
0024.cn: “所以我经常会跟她说一些诸如‘你是我最重要的人’、‘我是永远不会离开你的’之类这样的话安慰她，虽然实际上我也是这么想的。”

0024.en: "There were no problems for many years, but now in university, quite a few boys are pursuing me. She misunderstood because of this and started self-harming, saying things like she likes me and telling me not to look for others."
0024.speaker: 苏桃
0024.cn: “很多年都没什么问题，现在上了大学，有不少男生追求我了，她因为这个事情产生了误会，于是就自我伤害着说什么喜欢我，让我别去找别人之类的这种话。”

0024.en: "Doctor, is it possible that Xiaocheng developed wrong feelings for me?"
0024.speaker: 苏桃
0024.cn: “医生，有没有可能是小橙她对我产生了错误的感情啊？”

0024.en: Wrong feelings?
0024.speaker: 池小橙
0024.cn: 错误的感情？

0024.en: Of course not.
0024.speaker: 池小橙
0024.cn: 当然没有了。

0024.en: I really like you, Peach!
0024.speaker: 池小橙
0024.cn: 我可是超喜欢桃桃你啊！

0024.en: Sighing in her heart, Chi Xiaocheng typed back seriously, "That's also possible. Long-term lack of love and insecurity can make someone mistake dependence for liking."
0024.speaker: 池小橙
0024.cn: 在心底感叹一句，池小橙一脸正经地打字回道，“也有这个可能，长期缺爱，没有安全感，会误将依赖认为是喜欢。”

0024.en: Peach: "I thought so too. After all, we're both girls, and her saying she likes me really gives me a headache."
0024.speaker: 苏桃
0024.cn: 桃子：“果然是这样的吧，毕竟我们两个都是女孩子，她说喜欢我什么的，实在是让我有些头疼。”

0024.en: Dr. Cheng: "But that possibility is very small. Based on what you said about her forcing you to say you like her and wanting to jump off a building, I think she might really like you."
0024.speaker: 池小橙
0024.cn: 成医生：“但那种可能性很小，按照你说的她强迫你说喜欢她，又想要跳楼，我觉得她可能是真的喜欢你。”

0024.en: Peach: "Huh?"
0024.speaker: 苏桃
0024.cn: 桃子：“啊？”

0024.en: Peach: "But... but we're both girls."
0024.speaker: 苏桃
0024.cn: 桃子：“可...可是我们俩都是女生。”

0024.en: Dr. Cheng: "That's not the point."
0024.speaker: 池小橙
0024.cn: 成医生：“这不是重点。”

0024.en: Peach: "This... this isn't the point?"
0024.speaker: 苏桃
0024.cn: 桃子：“这这...这还不是重点吗？”

0024.en: Dr. Cheng: "I've treated countless patients, and there are many who have problems with same-sex feelings. In my opinion, it's very normal. As long as there's love, gender can also be crossed."
0024.speaker: 池小橙
0024.cn: 成医生：“我接待过无数病人，因为同性感情问题的多了去了，在我看来很正常，只要有爱，性别照样可以跨越。”

0024.en: Dr. Cheng: "That's getting off topic. The point is your Xiaocheng's condition."
0024.speaker: 池小橙
0024.cn: 成医生：“说远了，重点是你那个小橙的病情。”

0024.en: Dr. Cheng: "Based on my years of experience, she most likely can't live without you. This is an unhealthy psychological disorder, as serious as common depression."
0024.speaker: 池小橙
0024.cn: 成医生：“以我多年的经验来看，她十有八九是离不开你了，这是一种不健全的心理疾病，严重程度堪比常见的抑郁症。”

0024.en: In the next room, Su Tao was stunned. Because she was completely led by Chi Xiaocheng's topic, she didn't even notice some flaws in the chat messages.
0024.speaker: 旁白
0024.cn: 隔壁房间，苏桃呆了一下，因为彻底被池小橙引导了话题，甚至没注意到聊天消息中的一些漏洞。

0024.en: She just anxiously asked, "Doctor, please don't keep me in suspense."
0024.speaker: 苏桃
0024.cn: 只是着急问道，“医生，您就别卖关子了。”

0024.en: Dr. Cheng: "Miss Peach, don't be anxious. I don't know if you've heard of people called 'yandere'?"
0024.speaker: 池小橙
0024.cn: 成医生：“桃子小姐你先别着急，不知道你有没有听说过病娇这类人？”

0024.en: "Yandere?"
0024.speaker: 苏桃
0024.cn: “病娇？”

0025.en: Chapter 25: Have you ever liked her?
0025.speaker: 旁白
0025.cn: 第25章 你喜欢过她吗？

0025.en: This was the first time Su Tao had heard this term.
0025.speaker: 旁白
0025.cn: 苏桃还是第一次听到这个词。

0025.en: She hadn't been exposed to ACG culture, nor had she grown up in a stable environment like ordinary people.
0025.speaker: 旁白
0025.cn: 她没接触过泛ACG文化，也不像普通人一样安定地长大。

0025.en: She had been an orphan since childhood, often having to struggle for survival. Before she found Chi Xiaocheng, she lived with an old grandmother who collected garbage.
0025.speaker: 旁白
0025.cn: 从小就是孤儿，还经常要为生活而奔波，在没捡到池小橙之前，她都是跟一个捡垃圾的老奶奶一起过。

0025.en: The old grandmother's son didn't care for her, and she had no grandchildren. Her legs weren't good, so living together with Su Tao was mutually helpful. Because of the grandmother's guidance, Su Tao became very sensible at a young age.
0025.speaker: 旁白
0025.cn: 老奶奶儿子不管她，也没有孙子，腿脚不便，跟她一起也算是相互照顾，正因为老奶奶的教导，她小小年纪就很懂事。

0025.en: But the old grandmother died early. After helping Su Tao through the most difficult period, she passed away.
0025.speaker: 旁白
0025.cn: 只是老奶奶走得早，带她熬过了最艰难的一个时期后，就撒手人寰。

0025.en: Later, in elementary school, she met Chi Xiaocheng who was being bullied.
0025.speaker: 旁白
0025.cn: 接而在小学遇到了被霸凌的池小橙。

0025.en: Chi Xiaocheng's family was also very poor, but they still accepted her.
0025.speaker: 旁白
0025.cn: 池小橙家同样很贫穷，但还是接纳了她。

0025.en: After that, besides working part-time jobs, she focused on studying hard. Her childhood happiness mostly came from Chi Xiaocheng. Every time she heard the cute little girl behind her calling her "sister," she felt it was all worth it.
0025.speaker: 旁白
0025.cn: 之后她除了打工外就是努力学习，儿时偶尔的快乐还是池小橙带来的，每次听到身后有个可爱的小家伙喊着她姐姐，她就觉得不管怎样都值。

0025.en: Even now, her hobbies were still reading books and listening to music.
0025.speaker: 旁白
0025.cn: 直到现在，她的兴趣爱好依旧是看书听音乐之类的。

0025.en: She didn't watch dramas, read novels, or play games, let alone watch video streams. Her internet use was mostly for reading news.
0025.speaker: 旁白
0025.cn: 不刷剧，不看小说，游戏也不玩，更别说什么视频直播了，接触互联网更多还是看新闻。

0025.en: When Chi Xiaocheng mentioned the concept of "yandere," she immediately went online to search for it.
0025.speaker: 旁白
0025.cn: 当池小橙提出病娇的概念时，她立马就上网去搜了。

0025.en: Chi Xiaocheng wasn't in a hurry during this time, slowly waiting for Su Tao's response.
0025.speaker: 旁白
0025.cn: 期间池小橙也不着急，慢慢等苏桃回复。

0025.en: In the next hospital room, Su Tao stared at the search results in shock.
0025.speaker: 旁白
0025.cn: 而在隔壁病房，苏桃看着搜出来的信息，目瞪口呆。

0025.en: "Based on how Xiaocheng has been acting, it really seems like what the doctor called 'yandere'?"
0025.speaker: 苏桃
0025.cn: “按照小橙表现出来的模样，好像真的是医生说的病娇？”

0025.en: "This is actually considered a cute trait online!"
0025.speaker: 苏桃
0025.cn: “这在网上居然还是萌属性！”

0025.en: Su Tao was stunned.
0025.speaker: 旁白
0025.cn: 苏桃傻眼了。

0025.en: Whether it was the basement or the rooftop, she deeply felt the terror of Chi Xiaocheng's strange state.
0025.speaker: 旁白
0025.cn: 无论是地下室还是天台，她都深感池小橙那奇怪状态的恐怖。

0025.en: But from internet users' perspective, this was apparently a lovable trait in the 2D world.
0025.speaker: 旁白
0025.cn: 可在网友看来，这居然是属于二次元中的讨人喜欢的属性。

0025.en: She looked at the explanation and read it word by word: "Abnormal twisted psychology caused by deformed love, with tendencies toward possessiveness and extreme thoughts or behaviors, leading to extreme words and actions beyond normal understanding..."
0025.speaker: 苏桃
0025.cn: 她看着注释，一字一字念了出来，“畸形的爱所产生的病态扭曲心理，有点偏向占有欲又有极端的思想或行为，从而做出超乎常人理解的过激言行......”

0025.en: "Extreme words and actions refer to crazy love confessions, exclusiveness, stalking, destroying what they can't have, self-harm, and other extreme behaviors."
0025.speaker: 苏桃
0025.cn: “过激言行又指疯狂示爱、排他、跟踪、得不到就毁掉、自伤等极端行为。”

0025.en: "Hiss!"
0025.speaker: 苏桃

0025.en: Su Tao thought carefully - wasn't this exactly like Xiaocheng?
0025.speaker: 旁白
0025.cn: 苏桃仔细想了想，小橙不就是这样的吗。

0025.en: Love confessions, exclusiveness, self-harm - it was a perfect match!
0025.speaker: 旁白
0025.cn: 示爱、排他、自伤，简直完美符合！

0025.en: "How do these twisted internet users think this is cute? Does nobody have anyone who loves them?"
0025.speaker: 苏桃
0025.cn: “这样的扭曲网友到底是怎么觉得是萌点的，难道大家都没有人爱吗？”

0025.en: Then Su Tao searched whether yandere could be cured.
0025.speaker: 旁白
0025.cn: 然后，苏桃又搜了一下病娇能治吗。

0025.en: Few doctors gave opinions on this topic, because yandere in reality also refers to a type of mental illness.
0025.speaker: 旁白
0025.cn: 很少有医生在这方面给出说法，因为病娇在现实指代的也是精神病的一种。

0025.en: This search was fine until she did it, then she got another shock.
0025.speaker: 旁白
0025.cn: 这不搜还好，一搜又吓了一跳。

0025.en: If extreme enough, yandere could turn dark, and many internet users' examples of yandere involved dismembering people and stuffing them in refrigerators, which made Su Tao's scalp tingle.
0025.speaker: 旁白
0025.cn: 如果足够极端，病娇还会黑化，不少网友举的病娇例子都是把人大卸八块然后塞冰箱里，看得苏桃那是头皮发麻。

0025.en: After a while, Su Tao hopefully went to find this "Dr. Cheng."
0025.speaker: 旁白
0025.cn: 好一会儿后，苏桃才抱着期望去寻找这位“成医生”。

0025.en: Peach: "Doctor, I just learned about what yandere means. I feel like my friend is quite serious. Do you have a solution?"
0025.speaker: 苏桃
0025.cn: 桃子：“医生我刚刚去了解了一下什么是病娇，感觉我的朋友有点严重，您有解决方法吗？”

0025.en: Dr. Cheng: "Of course, I've been practicing for thirty years. I've seen every kind of situation. Dealing with yandere is my specialty."
0025.speaker: 池小橙
0025.cn: 成医生：“当然，老夫会诊三十年，什么场面没见过，处理病娇是我的强项。”

0025.en: Peach: "That's great! How much do you charge?"
0025.speaker: 苏桃
0025.cn: 桃子：“那太好了，您这边怎么收费啊？”

0025.en: Dr. Cheng: "No rush, we're still in the consultation phase. I'll give you some initial treatment suggestions based on your friend's situation. If you find them useful, we can discuss further. However, this type of treatment rarely involves medication."
0025.speaker: 池小橙
0025.cn: 成医生：“不着急，现在还是咨询阶段，我会根据你的朋友情况给出一些初步的治疗意见，你觉得有用了咱们再深入探讨，不过这方面的治疗很少药物辅助。”

0025.en: Dr. Cheng: "For this type of mental patient, you need to use actions and words to provide psychological treatment."
0025.speaker: 池小橙
0025.cn: 成医生：“对于这类精神病人，更需要你用行动和言语来进行精神上的治疗。”

0025.en: Hearing this, Su Tao felt much more at ease.
0025.speaker: 旁白
0025.cn: 苏桃闻言，心中安心了不少。

0025.en: Chen Qian really was her good best friend, treating her so well.
0025.speaker: 旁白
0025.cn: 陈倩不愧是自己好闺蜜，对自己真好。

0025.en: The uncle she introduced was not only skilled but also responsible and serious. She had just been worried he might ask for too much money.
0025.speaker: 旁白
0025.cn: 介绍的叔叔不仅有实力，还认真负责，她刚刚还担心对方会不会狮子大开口。

0025.en: After all, she really didn't have money, and if he asked for a lot, she would have to borrow it.
0025.speaker: 旁白
0025.cn: 毕竟她确实没有钱，对方要很多钱的话她就只能去借了。

0025.en: With a serious expression on her face, Su Tao replied: "Then I'll trouble you, Dr. Cheng."
0025.speaker: 苏桃
0025.cn: 脸上露出认真的小表情，苏桃回复道，“那就麻烦成医生您了。”

0025.en: Chi Xiaocheng's lips curved up as she lightly snapped her fingers.
0025.speaker: 旁白
0025.cn: 池小橙唇角上扬，轻轻打了个响指。

0025.en: Perfect!
0025.speaker: 池小橙
0025.cn: 拿捏！

0025.en: Now she could completely cooperate with the doctor's identity to create a better yandere plan, forcing Su Tao to take bolder actions in the name of "treating" her.
0025.speaker: 旁白
0025.cn: 现在自己完全可以配合着医生的身份，去定制更好的病娇计划，让苏桃不得不因为“治疗”自己，而去做一些更大胆的举措。

0025.en: The fake persona she had created for herself earlier was now coming in handy.
0025.speaker: 旁白
0025.cn: 而她先前给自己伪造的人设此刻就派上用场了。

0025.en: She typed to Su Tao: "Miss Peach, yandere comes in many types. In my opinion, your friend should be the dependent type, but she has examples of kidnapping you, so she likely also has some possessive-type traits."
0025.speaker: 池小橙
0025.cn: 她打字对苏桃说道，“桃子小姐，病娇也分很多种，在我看来，你这位朋友应当是依存型，但她有过绑架你的例子，不出意外还会有些独占型的属性。”

0025.en: Dr. Cheng: "But you said she's mostly normal, so she should be primarily dependent-type with less possessive-type behavior."
0025.speaker: 池小橙
0025.cn: 成医生：“不过你说她大部分时间比较正常，应该是以依存型为主，独占型较少。”

0025.en: "The former develops deformed love for you and gradually becomes dependent on you. If you leave her or don't put her first in your heart, she'll develop various negative emotions, and in serious cases, she may have suicidal tendencies."
0025.speaker: 池小橙
0025.cn: “前者对你产生畸形的爱意以后逐渐依赖你，如果你离开了她或者没将她放在心中的第一位，她会产生各种消极的情绪，严重点会有轻生倾向。”

0025.en: Su Tao recalled everything that happened on the rooftop last night and immediately agreed with what Chi Xiaocheng said.
0025.speaker: 旁白
0025.cn: 苏桃回忆了一下昨晚天台的种种，立刻认同了池小橙说的话。

0025.en: Dr. Cheng: "The possessive type often shows twisted love and strong possessiveness. They want to make the person they like into their possession. Words are useless, so they mostly use imprisonment."
0025.speaker: 池小橙
0025.cn: 成医生：“而独占型常常表现为扭曲的爱意和强烈的占有欲，对方会想让自己喜欢的人成为自己的物品，口舌无用大多采取囚禁的手段。”

0025.en: "The good news is that her possessive traits are limited. Her dependence on you won't cause social harm. As long as you treat her well and go along with her ideas, she won't be too excessive."
0025.speaker: 池小橙
0025.cn: “好消息是她独占型的属性偏少，对你的依赖不会造成社会性的危害，只要你对她好一点，多顺着她的想法去，她不会表现得太过分的。”

0025.en: During their conversation, Chi Xiaocheng also sent Su Tao explanations of various yandere traits.
0025.speaker: 旁白
0025.cn: 说话期间，池小橙又给苏桃发去了各个病娇属性的注释。

0025.en: Like the elimination type and aggressive type - constantly killing people would be too terrifying.
0025.speaker: 旁白
0025.cn: 例如排除型和攻击型，动不动就杀人那就太恐怖了。

0025.en: Even so, it still gave Su Tao a headache.
0025.speaker: 旁白
0025.cn: 可即便如此，依旧是让苏桃头疼。

0025.en: She hesitated for a moment, then asked Dr. Cheng about the problem that had been bothering her: "Doctor, according to what you're saying, Xiaocheng says she likes me, so for treatment..."
0025.speaker: 苏桃
0025.cn: 她犹豫了一小会儿，还是对成医生问了心里一直迈不过去的问题，“医生，那按照您的意思，小橙说是喜欢我，那治疗的话......”

0025.en: Dr. Cheng: "Do you like her?"
0025.speaker: 池小橙
0025.cn: 成医生：“你喜欢她吗？”

0025.en: Peach: "Uh... well, I told you we're both girls."
0025.speaker: 苏桃
0025.cn: 桃子：“呃...那个，我说了我们都是女生。”

0025.en: Dr. Cheng: "I also said that's not the point."
0025.speaker: 池小橙
0025.cn: 成医生：“我也说了这不是重点。”

0025.en: Peach: "That IS the point!"
0025.speaker: 苏桃
0025.cn: 桃子：“这就是重点啊！”

0025.en: Peach: "You're a doctor so you might think it's nothing, but I'm the person involved. Two girls and all, this this this... this isn't right, is it?"
0025.speaker: 苏桃
0025.cn: 桃子：“您是医生可能觉得没什么，可我是当事人，两个女孩子什么的，这这这...这不对吧？”

0025.en: Chi Xiaocheng looked at Su Tao's panic between the lines and smiled calmly: "She really doesn't understand at all. Cute girls are treasures of this world, so wouldn't two cute girls be double the happiness?"
0025.speaker: 旁白
0025.cn: 池小橙看着苏桃字里行间的慌张，勾起从容的笑容，“真是一点都不懂啊，可爱的女孩子就是这个世界上的瑰宝，两个可爱的女孩子岂不是双倍的快乐？”

0025.en: She continued typing in Dr. Cheng's tone: "Actually, you've fallen into a misunderstanding. You don't need to actually like her, you just need to go along with her feelings and pretend to care about her."
0025.speaker: 池小橙
0025.cn: 她继续打字，以成医生的口吻道，“其实你陷入了误区，你完全没必要真的去喜欢她，只需要顺着她的喜欢假装在意她就好了。”

0025.en: Su Tao's eyes lit up: "Right! Doctor, this is indeed a good method. First calm her emotions, then gradually help her work through her issues during treatment. Once she returns to normal, it'll be fine, right?"
0025.speaker: 苏桃
0025.cn: 苏桃眼前一亮：“对呀，医生这确实是个办法，率先安抚她的情绪，然后在治疗中慢慢地让她走出心结，等她恢复正常就行了对吧。”

0025.en: Dr. Cheng: "Yes, you grew up together and have a good relationship, right? If you can't accept her, then use this method - pretend to like her, but there's one thing you need to pay attention to."
0025.speaker: 池小橙
0025.cn: 成医生：“是的，你们一起长大关系也很好的吧，你要是接受不了她，那就用这个方法，假装去喜欢她，但是有一点你需要注意。”

0025.en: Dr. Cheng: "Yandere people are often very sensitive. If she finds out you're pretending to like her, if she has a mental breakdown, there could be serious consequences."
0025.speaker: 池小橙
0025.cn: 成医生：“病娇往往是很敏锐的，要是让她知道了你是假喜欢她，如果她心理崩溃的话会有比较严重的后果。”

0025.en: Peach: "This..."
0025.speaker: 苏桃

0025.en: Dr. Cheng: "That's why I asked whether you actually like her or not. This point is very important. If you really don't like her at all, pretending might be quite difficult."
0025.speaker: 池小橙
0025.cn: 成医生：“所以我才问你到底喜不喜欢她，这点是非常重要的，如果你真的一点喜欢都没有，想伪装可能比较难。”

0025.en: Dr. Cheng: "Have you really never liked her at all?"
0025.speaker: 池小橙
0025.cn: 成医生：“你真的一点都没有喜欢过她吗？”

0026.en: Chapter 26: Do You Like It?
0026.speaker: 旁白
0026.cn: 第26章 你喜欢吗？

0026.en: "Do you like it...?"
0026.speaker: 苏桃

0026.en: Su Tao put down her phone and leaned back against the pillow. Her beautiful hair fell to her shoulders as she stared at the ceiling with a melancholy expression, gradually lost in thought.
0026.speaker: 旁白
0026.cn: 苏桃放下手机，靠着枕头，缕缕秀发垂到肩头，她惆怅地看着天花板，渐渐出神。

0026.en: She couldn't bear to see her get hurt.
0026.speaker: 旁白
0026.cn: 看不得她受伤。

0026.en: She was someone very important.
0026.speaker: 旁白
0026.cn: 是很重要的人。

0026.en: She wanted her to stay by her side.
0026.speaker: 旁白
0026.cn: 想她陪在自己身边。

0026.en: Many memories flashed through Su Tao's mind, but they finally settled on a scene from elementary school - that innocent and adorable little girl blinking her red-rimmed eyes, carefully calling her "big sister."
0026.speaker: 旁白
0026.cn: 苏桃脑海中闪过诸多回忆，最终还是渐渐定格在了小学时，那只天真可爱的小萝莉眨巴着映红的眼眸，小心翼翼地喊着自己“姐姐”的画面。

0026.en: She took a deep breath and typed again, "I don't think I have romantic feelings for her. I see her more like a little sister."
0026.speaker: 苏桃
0026.cn: 她呼了一口气，又打字道，“恋人间的喜欢我认为是没有，我更多是把她当成妹妹来看待吧。”

0026.en: Chi Xiaocheng looked at this message and thought to herself that it was exactly as she expected.
0026.speaker: 旁白
0026.cn: 池小橙看着这一句话，心中暗道果然。

0026.en: In terms of romantic feelings, even Dongfang Yang might have a higher score than herself right now.
0026.speaker: 旁白
0026.cn: 现在的情况，单论恋爱那边的好感度来说，东方阳可能都比自己要高。

0026.en: However, in terms of overall importance, they weren't as significant as she was.
0026.speaker: 旁白
0026.cn: 不过整体的分量，他们并不如自己。

0026.en: Chi Xiaocheng tried a different approach: "Miss Peach, do you think that Xiaocheng is pretty? If she wanted to be your girlfriend, would you reject her?"
0026.speaker: 池小橙
0026.cn: 池小橙换了一个角度去问：“桃子小姐，那你觉得那位小橙漂亮吗，如果作为对象你会不会拒绝？”

0026.en: Peach: "Eh?"
0026.speaker: 苏桃
0026.cn: 桃子：“欸？”

0026.en: Peach: "Xiaocheng is certainly very pretty. Actually, 'cute' would be a better word to describe her. She's not lacking in looks at all. But about your second question, I really don't know."
0026.speaker: 苏桃
0026.cn: 桃子：“小橙当然是很漂亮的，放在她身上可爱来形容会更好吧，在外貌条件上她并不差，只是你说后面的问题，我也不知道。”

0026.en: Without actually experiencing it, how could she say whether she could accept someone or not?
0026.speaker: 旁白
0026.cn: 没有真正经历过，又怎能直言能不能接受对方？

0026.en: Even when making assumptions, Su Tao was extremely hesitant.
0026.speaker: 旁白
0026.cn: 即便做出假设，苏桃也是犹豫无比。

0026.en: Humans are strange creatures.
0026.speaker: 旁白
0026.cn: 人是一种很奇怪的动物。

0026.en: When facing two or more choices, they become hesitant and think they can't make up their minds.
0026.speaker: 旁白
0026.cn: 当面临两种乃至更多选择的时候，就会陷入犹豫，认为自己举棋不定。

0026.en: The truth is, when you're hesitating about whether to do something, you've already made a choice deep down - you just don't have enough reasons to convince yourself yet.
0026.speaker: 旁白
0026.cn: 事实是，当你犹豫要不要去做一件事的时候，其实你内心已经有了选择，只是你还没有充足的理由去说服自己。

0026.en: A simple example: you stay up late every night reading novels and watching videos. Sometimes you think you can't keep being lazy like this, and you consider whether to wake up early tomorrow and change yourself.
0026.speaker: 旁白
0026.cn: 很简单的例子，你天天熬夜看小说，刷视频，偶尔会想不能这样堕落了，思考要不要明天早起然后改变自己。

0026.en: But you often hesitate about whether to stay up one more night.
0026.speaker: 旁白
0026.cn: 但往往会犹豫要不要再熬一晚。

0026.en: When you start hesitating, it proves you already want to keep staying up.
0026.speaker: 旁白
0026.cn: 当产生犹豫，就证明你已经想继续熬下去了。

0026.en: Then you hide under your blanket, lying on your side with your head on your hand, your phone screen not too bright, lighting up that silly smiling face.
0026.speaker: 旁白
0026.cn: 然后躲在小被窝，侧躺枕着手，手机屏幕的光不算很亮，照亮着那张傻笑的帅脸。

0026.en: Seeing Su Tao hesitate, Chi Xiaocheng understood clearly that the other person wasn't completely without feelings.
0026.speaker: 旁白
0026.cn: 见苏桃犹豫，池小橙心底门清，对方并不是一点感觉都没有。

0026.en: With this kind of beginning, it could grow into a wildfire.
0026.speaker: 旁白
0026.cn: 有这样的苗头，就能燃烧成燎原之火。

0026.en: The plan was feasible.
0026.speaker: 旁白
0026.cn: 计划是可行的。

0026.en: She typed to guide her: "Miss Peach, I understand your situation now. Pretending to like her is actually doable. According to what you've said, she likes you on one hand, and on the other hand, she depends on you and wants you to see her as your only one."
0026.speaker: 池小橙
0026.cn: 她打字诱导道：“桃子小姐，你的情况我大概明白了，假装喜欢她这件事其实是可行的，根据你的说法，对方喜欢你是一方面，另一方面是对你的依赖，想让你将她视为唯一。”

0026.en: "You just need to start from the second point. Be more caring with your words and actions, coax her a bit. You don't need to truly like her - just make her feel that you care about her a lot."
0026.speaker: 池小橙
0026.cn: “你只要从后者出发就好了，言语和行动上多哄一下她，不需要真的喜欢，让她产生一种你很在乎她的感觉就好了。”

0026.en: "Then when her emotions are stable, you can work on adjusting them."
0026.speaker: 池小橙
0026.cn: “然后在她情绪稳定时，就可以进行调节。”

0026.en: Peach: "Okay, thank you, doctor. What about medication?"
0026.speaker: 苏桃
0026.cn: 桃子：“好的，谢谢医生，用药方面呢？”

0026.en: Dr. Cheng: "I don't know her physical condition, so I don't dare prescribe medication carelessly. At most, I can give you some common medications that have few side effects and can stabilize emotions. If possible, you should find a psychologist to see her."
0026.speaker: 池小橙
0026.cn: 成医生：“我不清楚她的身体情况，不敢胡乱开药，需要的话我最多给你一些没什么副作用，能稳定情绪的常用药给你，可以的话你最好找个心理医生给她看看。”

0026.en: Peach: "I understand."
0026.speaker: 苏桃
0026.cn: 桃子：“我明白了。”

0026.en: Dr. Cheng: "Mm, if you have any questions, you can continue to contact me. Trying our best to help every patient is our responsibility as doctors. Although I can't prescribe medication based on her physical condition, I'll teach you how to solve some mental problems."
0026.speaker: 池小橙
0026.cn: 成医生：“嗯，有什么问题你可以继续来找我，尽力救治每一个病人是我们作为医生的责任，虽然我不能根据她身体情况开药，但一些精神上的问题我会教你如何解决的。”

0026.en: Peach: "Thank you so much!"
0026.speaker: 苏桃
0026.cn: 桃子：“非常感谢您！”

0026.en: The chat ended, and Chi Xiaocheng put down her phone.
0026.speaker: 旁白
0026.cn: 聊天结束，池小橙放下手机。

0026.en: She knew that with Su Tao's personality, as long as she talked to her a few more times as Dr. Cheng and gained her trust, Su Tao would listen to most of what she said.
0026.speaker: 旁白
0026.cn: 她清楚，以苏桃的性格，自己只要作为成医生去多和她聊几次，获取对方的信任，说的很多话她都会听的吧？

0026.en: It didn't matter if she didn't like her now.
0026.speaker: 旁白
0026.cn: 现在不喜欢没关系。

0026.en: The future was still very long.
0026.speaker: 旁白
0026.cn: 以后可还长着呢。

0026.en: Meanwhile, after organizing her emotions, Su Tao also got out of bed and moved around a bit.
0026.speaker: 旁白
0026.cn: 而另一边，苏桃在整理好情绪后，也下床活动了一下。

0026.en: She was naturally in good physical condition. In school sports meets, she was basically first place in the girls' long-distance running. After resting for one night, her fever had gone down considerably.
0026.speaker: 旁白
0026.cn: 她体质本就不差，上学时运动会女子长跑比赛她基本是第一，休息了一晚上后，烧退了不少。

0026.en: She came to Chi Xiaocheng's hospital room door, hesitating whether to go in.
0026.speaker: 旁白
0026.cn: 她来到池小橙病房前，踌躇着要不要进去。

0026.en: What Dr. Cheng told her had a big impact.
0026.speaker: 旁白
0026.cn: 成医生跟她说的话，影响很大。

0026.en: Xiaocheng's yandere tendencies were the type that didn't harm others, but she would hurt herself. She couldn't be left alone.
0026.speaker: 旁白
0026.cn: 小橙的病娇是对外无危害的类型，但她会对自己下手，不能放任不管。

0026.en: She also had to make her believe that she liked her.
0026.speaker: 旁白
0026.cn: 还要让她认为自己是喜欢她的。

0026.en: "Sorry, Xiaocheng. I'm not trying to play with your feelings on purpose."
0026.speaker: 苏桃
0026.cn: “抱歉啊小橙，我不是要故意玩弄你的感情的。”

0026.en: Su Tao closed her eyes and prepared herself mentally.
0026.speaker: 旁白
0026.cn: 苏桃闭上眼睛，做足了心理思想后。

0026.en: She slowly opened the door.
0026.speaker: 旁白
0026.cn: 缓缓打开门。

0026.en: "Xiaocheng, good morning! How are you feeling?"
0026.speaker: 苏桃
0026.cn: “小橙，早上好呀，身体怎么样了？”

0026.en: As soon as she entered, Su Tao began caring about Chi Xiaocheng's health. This part wasn't fake - she hoped more than anyone that Chi Xiaocheng could recover completely.
0026.speaker: 旁白
0026.cn: 一进门，苏桃就开始关心池小橙的身体，这方面倒不是装的，她比谁都希望池小橙能够恢复如初。

0026.en: Chi Xiaocheng sat obediently on the bed, her small hands folded on her stomach. The blue and white hospital gown hid her petite figure. She smiled gently at Su Tao, "My fever hasn't gone down yet, but I'm feeling much better mentally. Taotao, have you eaten breakfast?"
0026.speaker: 池小橙
0026.cn: 池小橙乖巧地坐在床上，两只小手交叠搭在腹部，蓝白相间的病号服藏住了娇小的身子，她浅浅笑着看向苏桃，“烧还没退，不过精神已经好了很多，桃桃吃早餐了吗？”

0026.en: She reached out to press the call button to ask the nurse to bring breakfast.
0026.speaker: 旁白
0026.cn: 她伸出手就想按铃喊护士姐姐送一份早餐过来。

0026.en: But her outstretched left hand had some scratches from her injury, and when she raised it, Su Tao felt heartbroken again.
0026.speaker: 旁白
0026.cn: 可伸出的左手上有着受伤的些许刮痕，抬高的那一瞬，又让苏桃有些心疼。

0026.en: Taking two quick steps, she hurried to Chi Xiaocheng's side and grabbed her small hand. "I've already eaten. The hospital provides breakfast. You should get more rest if you haven't slept enough."
0026.speaker: 苏桃
0026.cn: 三步并两步连忙来到池小橙身边，抓住了她的小手，“我已经吃过了，医院有提供早餐，倒是你，没休息够的话可以多睡一会儿。”

0026.en: "I can't sleep." Chi Xiaocheng felt the warmth on the back of her hand and suddenly said, "Want to chat?"
0026.speaker: 池小橙
0026.cn: “睡不着欸。”池小橙感受着手背的温暖，又忽然道，“来聊聊天？”

0026.en: "Sure." Su Tao brought over a small stool and sat in front of Chi Xiaocheng. When she looked up at her, she noticed something.
0026.speaker: 苏桃
0026.cn: “可以啊。”苏桃搬来一张小凳子，坐在池小橙面前，抬头看向她时，又注意到什么。

0026.en: She moved to sit by the head of the bed.
0026.speaker: 旁白
0026.cn: 来到她床头边坐下。

0026.en: "What's wrong?" Chi Xiaocheng tried to look back, but Su Tao held her head still.
0026.speaker: 池小橙
0026.cn: “怎么了？”池小橙往后看去，却被苏桃抵住了脑袋。

0026.en: She took out a comb. "Don't move. You didn't even fix your hair when you got up - it's all messy."
0026.speaker: 苏桃
0026.cn: 她拿出一只梳子，“别动，起床也不打理一下自己，头发都翘起来了。”

0026.en: With that, she gently ran her fingers through Chi Xiaocheng's hair.
0026.speaker: 旁白
0026.cn: 说罢，便温柔地抚过她的秀发。

0026.en: Chi Xiaocheng simply leaned back, enjoying the treatment while making small talk. "Taotao, you smell so good."
0026.speaker: 池小橙
0026.cn: 池小橙索性就往后靠着，一边享受，一边闲聊，“桃桃你好香啊。”

0026.en: "Ah?" Su Tao paused her movements.
0026.speaker: 苏桃
0026.cn: “啊？”苏桃动作顿了一下。

0026.en: Was this what they were going to talk about?
0026.speaker: 旁白
0026.cn: 聊天聊这个的？

0026.en: She curled a strand of Chi Xiaocheng's hair around her finger, not knowing how to respond. "This... might be the smell of the hospital body wash?"
0026.speaker: 苏桃
0026.cn: 她伸手卷了一下池小橙的秀发，一时间也不知怎么接话，“这...可能是医院沐浴露的味道吧？”

0026.en: "No, it's not." Chi Xiaocheng's lips curved upward. "I don't smell as good as you do, Taotao."
0026.speaker: 池小橙
0026.cn: “不是哦。”池小橙唇角上扬，“我身上就没有桃桃那么香。”

0026.en: "No... Xiaocheng, you also... you smell good too."
0026.speaker: 苏桃
0026.cn: “没...小橙你也...你也挺香的。”

0026.en: How embarrassing!
0026.speaker: 旁白
0026.cn: 好尴尬啊！

0026.en: Su Tao's toes were curling in her slippers. She had always wanted to have a heart-to-heart talk with Chi Xiaocheng face to face.
0026.speaker: 旁白
0026.cn: 苏桃踩在拖鞋上的脚趾都在不断抠动，她一直想和池小橙敞开心扉面对面地好好聊聊。

0026.en: Now she had the chance.
0026.speaker: 旁白
0026.cn: 现在有机会了。

0026.en: And they were talking about who smelled better!
0026.speaker: 旁白
0026.cn: 聊的竟然是谁比较香的话题！

0026.en: She desperately wanted to change the subject but didn't know where to start.
0026.speaker: 旁白
0026.cn: 她迫切地想转移话题，却又不知从何开口。

0026.en: Fortunately, Chi Xiaocheng didn't dwell on the topic of who smelled better. Instead, she seemed to think of something, paused, and looked at her clothes. "Speaking of which, when I woke up last night, I found that my hair was dry and my clothes were changed. There was also a new phone here. Who gave me a bath?"
0026.speaker: 池小橙
0026.cn: 好在，池小橙没在谁比较香这方面深究，而是想到了什么似的，顿了一下看向自己的衣服，“说起来，我昨晚醒来的时候发现自己头发干了，衣服也换了，还有个新的手机在这里，谁给我洗的澡呀？”

0026.en: Su Tao quickly answered, "I gave you a bath last night, and Dongfang Yang helped you get the new phone."
0026.speaker: 苏桃
0026.cn: 苏桃迅速答道，“昨晚倒是我给你洗的澡，手机倒是东方阳帮你换的。”

0026.en: "That's good. I was worried someone else had bathed me. If I became dirty, Taotao would definitely hate me, right?" Chi Xiaocheng let out a long sigh of relief. "Thank goodness it was Taotao."
0026.speaker: 池小橙
0026.cn: “那就好，我还以为是别人帮我洗澡呢，要是不干净了桃桃一定会讨厌我吧？”池小橙长长呼了口气，“幸好是桃桃。”

0026.en: Su Tao scratched her cheek, feeling that Chi Xiaocheng's words sounded strange.
0026.speaker: 旁白
0026.cn: 苏桃挠了挠脸颊，感觉池小橙说这话怪怪的。

0026.en: But remembering her chat with Dr. Cheng, she still responded, "Xiaocheng, don't overthink it. No matter what happens, I will never hate you."
0026.speaker: 苏桃
0026.cn: 但想到和成医生的聊天，她还是接话道，“小橙别想太多，我无论如何我都不会讨厌你的。”

0026.en: These comforting words should help stabilize Xiaocheng, right?
0026.speaker: 旁白
0026.cn: 安抚的话，这样子应该能稳定小橙吧？

0026.en: But she didn't expect Chi Xiaocheng to follow up with another question: "Then do you like it?"
0026.speaker: 池小橙
0026.cn: 但她没想到，池小橙又顺着他的话问道，“那你喜欢吗？”

0026.en: Su Tao was confused. "Like what?"
0026.speaker: 苏桃
0026.cn: 苏桃错愕，“喜欢什么？”

0026.en: "My cuteness."
0026.speaker: 池小橙
0026.cn: “我的可爱。”

0027.en: Chapter 27: She's Quite Cute
0027.speaker: 旁白
0027.cn: 第27章 她怪可爱的

0027.en: "This..."
0027.speaker: 苏桃

0027.en: Su Tao was suddenly at a loss for words and quickly started brainstorming.
0027.speaker: 旁白
0027.cn: 苏桃一时语塞，迅速头脑风暴了起来。

0027.en: If it were an ordinary person asking, they might mean whether her figure was cute or something like that.
0027.speaker: 旁白
0027.cn: 如果是普通人，问的意思没准是她的身材是否可爱怎么样之类的。

0027.en: But since it was Chi Xiaocheng, Su Tao felt she couldn't answer directly.
0027.speaker: 旁白
0027.cn: 但对象是池小橙，苏桃觉得不能直接回答。

0027.en: Because Chi Xiaocheng was a yandere!
0027.speaker: 旁白
0027.cn: 因为池小橙是病娇！

0027.en: She had self-harm tendencies and thought differently from others.
0027.speaker: 旁白
0027.cn: 她有自残倾向，想法和别人不一样。

0027.en: Recalling what she knew about yanderes, Su Tao felt that neither of her two options was very good.
0027.speaker: 旁白
0027.cn: 回忆了一下之前对病娇的了解，苏桃只感觉自己的两个选项都不太好。

0027.en: A: Don't like it.
0027.speaker: 旁白
0027.cn: A：不喜欢。

0027.en: Xiaocheng might think I don't like her, which could make her condition worse. She might fall into that strange state, or she might turn dark, or even have a breakdown!
0027.speaker: 苏桃
0027.cn: 小橙可能会误认为我不喜欢她，进而病情恶化，可能会陷入那奇怪的状态，也可能会黑化，更可能崩溃！

0027.en: B: Like it.
0027.speaker: 旁白
0027.cn: B：喜欢。

0027.en: This was indeed a problem-free option. The only issue was that her goal was to make Xiaocheng stop being a yandere. Just pretending to like her would be fine, but if she said it directly, would it deepen the misunderstanding?
0027.speaker: 苏桃
0027.cn: 这确实是没什么问题的选项，唯一的问题就是，自己的目的是让小橙不再病娇，假装喜欢她就好，这样直接说的话，会不会加深误会？

0027.en: After thinking briefly, Su Tao knew this was an easy question with only one answer.
0027.speaker: 旁白
0027.cn: 稍加思考，苏桃也知道这个是送分题，答案只有一个。

0027.en: She answered awkwardly, "I like it."
0027.speaker: 苏桃
0027.cn: 她讪讪回答道，“喜欢呀。”

0027.en: Chi Xiaocheng blinked again, her tone innocent, "Then what do you like most?"
0027.speaker: 池小橙
0027.cn: 池小橙又眨了眨眼睛，语气纯真，“那最喜欢哪里呀？”

0027.en: "Uh... hands, I guess."
0027.speaker: 苏桃

0027.en: Her eyes looked guilty, but fortunately she was behind Chi Xiaocheng fixing her hair, so her guilt wouldn't be noticed.
0027.speaker: 旁白
0027.cn: 她眼神心虚，好在此时是处于池小橙侧后方为她整理秀发，不会被看出自己的心虚。

0027.en: But answering like this should help her avoid the topic, right?
0027.speaker: 苏桃
0027.cn: 不过这样回答，应该能回避过去吧？

0027.en: She thought so.
0027.speaker: 旁白
0027.cn: 她如是想着。

0027.en: But then she heard Chi Xiaocheng say quietly, "Since Taotao likes them, how about I give you my hands?"
0027.speaker: 池小橙
0027.cn: 却又听池小橙幽幽说道，“既然桃桃喜欢，那我把手送给你怎么样？”

0027.en: Su Tao paused her movements, "Give... give?"
0027.speaker: 苏桃
0027.cn: 苏桃动作顿了一下，“送...送？”

0027.en: Chi Xiaocheng nodded gently, "Yes, does Taotao want the left hand or the right hand? I'll cut it off and give it to you."
0027.speaker: 池小橙
0027.cn: 池小橙轻轻点头，“是呀，桃桃是要左手还是右手呀，我切下来送给你。”

0027.en: Suddenly, Su Tao's guilty expression turned to panic. She quickly came to Chi Xiaocheng's front, with a forced smile and as gentle a tone as possible, "You don't need to... give them to me. What I like more is a healthy, complete Xiaocheng."
0027.speaker: 苏桃
0027.cn: 骤然间，苏桃心虚的眼神变得慌张了起来，她连忙来到池小橙面前，笑容牵强，语气尽量温柔，“送...送我就不必了，我更喜欢的是健康的、完整的小橙。”

0027.en: "Oh, I see..."
0027.speaker: 池小橙

0027.en: "Yes, yes, that's right!"
0027.speaker: 苏桃
0027.cn: “嗯嗯，就是这样！”

0027.en: "Okay, then I'll eat more meat and take good care of my body."
0027.speaker: 池小橙
0027.cn: “好的，那我多多吃肉，养好身体。”

0027.en: A sweet smile bloomed on her face, extremely cute.
0027.speaker: 旁白
0027.cn: 乖巧的笑颜自脸颊绽放，可爱至极。

0027.en: Su Tao was stunned for a moment.
0027.speaker: 旁白
0027.cn: 看得苏桃一时间都愣了一下。

0027.en: Then she felt overjoyed.
0027.speaker: 苏桃
0027.cn: 旋即狂喜。

0027.en: She seemed to have found a way to treat Chi Xiaocheng!
0027.speaker: 苏桃
0027.cn: 她好像找到了治疗池小橙的方式！

0027.en: Because I said I liked hands, she thought she had to cut off her hands to make me happy.
0027.speaker: 苏桃
0027.cn: 因为我说喜欢手，误以为要把手砍下来给我我才会高兴。

0027.en: Now I said I wanted her to be healthy.
0027.speaker: 苏桃
0027.cn: 现在我说希望她健健康康。

0027.en: She would really try to eat more and recover her body.
0027.speaker: 苏桃
0027.cn: 她就真的会努力增加营养恢复身体。

0027.en: So this is how yanderes work!
0027.speaker: 苏桃
0027.cn: 原来病娇是这样的啊！

0027.en: As long as I keep an eye on her, it shouldn't be a problem?
0027.speaker: 苏桃
0027.cn: 只要多看着点她，好像也不会出什么问题？

0027.en: Looking at Chi Xiaocheng squinting and smiling foolishly, with a small pointed canine tooth showing, Su Tao also showed a relaxed smile.
0027.speaker: 旁白
0027.cn: 看着池小橙眯着眼睛傻笑，一颗尖尖的小虎牙若隐若现，一时间苏桃也露出了一个轻松的笑容。

0027.en: Indeed, normal Xiaocheng was still very cute.
0027.speaker: 苏桃
0027.cn: 果然，正常的小橙还是很可爱啊。

0027.en: She chose to ignore the issue about hands, and the atmosphere between them became harmonious as they finally started having a normal conversation.
0027.speaker: 旁白
0027.cn: 她选择忽略了关于手的问题，二人的氛围融洽下来，也终于开始了正常的聊天。

0027.en: After last night's rain, the morning outside gradually brightened, and a ray of sunlight fell from the window, landing right on Su Tao.
0027.speaker: 旁白
0027.cn: 经过昨天一夜的雨，早晨的窗外渐渐明朗，一抹阳光从窗边洒下，正好落在苏桃身上。

0027.en: She wore a hospital gown, smiled as she talked, her slender fingers swaying gently, as if painting the scenes she described for Chi Xiaocheng.
0027.speaker: 旁白
0027.cn: 她穿着病号服，扬着笑容侃侃而谈，轻轻晃动的纤细手指，好似在为池小橙描绘她所说的景象。

0027.en: The sunlight dyed her black hair with a golden glow, half her face serene and gentle, making Chi Xiaocheng's heart skip a beat.
0027.speaker: 旁白
0027.cn: 阳光为她的黑色秀发染上一层金色的余晖，半张侧脸恬静温柔，让池小橙的心不由漏了一拍。

0027.en: "So beautiful."
0027.speaker: 池小橙
0027.cn: “真好看。”

0027.en: Su Tao, who was talking about school topics, was stunned by Chi Xiaocheng's words, "What?"
0027.speaker: 苏桃
0027.cn: 正聊到学校话题的苏桃听到池小橙的话愣了一下，“什么？”

0027.en: Chi Xiaocheng showed her dimples, saying softly, "I said, I like you!"
0027.speaker: 池小橙
0027.cn: 池小橙露出梨涡浅浅，柔声道：“我说，喜欢你！”

0027.en: Su Tao was dazed and couldn't help but turn her head away.
0027.speaker: 苏桃
0027.cn: 苏桃一呆，脑袋不由撇到一边。

0027.en: "Really, saying such things again."
0027.speaker: 苏桃
0027.cn: “真的是，又说这种话。”

0027.en: A blush appeared on her delicate face, perfectly hidden by the sunlight, making Chi Xiaocheng feel she looked even more beautiful.
0027.speaker: 旁白
0027.cn: 精致的脸蛋出现了一抹红晕，恰好被阳光掩饰，一时间池小橙只觉得，她更好看了。

0027.en: However, this warm and intimate atmosphere didn't last long.
0027.speaker: 旁白
0027.cn: 不过这样温馨暧昧的氛围没持续多久。

0027.en: There was a knock outside, and Dongfang Yang walked in with a doctor.
0027.speaker: 旁白
0027.cn: 外面敲了敲门，东方阳和一个医生一起走了进来。

0027.en: The doctor looked at Chi Xiaocheng and said, "Have you contacted the patient's family? We need a family member to sign here."
0027.speaker: 旁白
0027.cn: 医生看了眼池小橙道，“病人家属联系上了吗，这里需要家属签字。”

0027.en: Su Tao and Dongfang Yang both looked at Chi Xiaocheng.
0027.speaker: 旁白
0027.cn: 苏桃和东方阳都看向了池小橙。

0027.en: The signature should have been done yesterday, but because of the emergency and Dongfang Yang's guarantee as a young master, it had been delayed until now.
0027.speaker: 旁白
0027.cn: 昨天就应该签字了，只是情况紧急，加上东方阳这个大少爷的保证，就一直耽搁到了现在。

0027.en: Su Tao said, "I originally wanted to contact Brother Chi Song, but I thought it would be better not to worry them about this kind of thing, so I've been planning to wait until you woke up to see."
0027.speaker: 苏桃
0027.cn: 苏桃道，“我本来想联系池松哥的，但想了想这样的事情还是不要让她们担心得好，所以一直打算等小橙你醒来再看看。”

0027.en: Chi Xiaocheng hesitated for a moment and asked, "Can't I sign it myself?"
0027.speaker: 池小橙
0027.cn: 池小橙犹豫了一下，问道，“我自己签不行吗？”

0027.en: From her memories, she knew the original owner's family was ordinary, with parents who had been farmers for generations, living in a not-so-wealthy village far from Jiuzhou City, unable to come over.
0027.speaker: 旁白
0027.cn: 从记忆中得知，原主家境普通，父母世代都是农民，住在不算富裕的村子里，离这九州市很远，根本过不来。

0027.en: As a villainous supporting character, she also had an equally villainous brother.
0027.speaker: 旁白
0027.cn: 作为反派配角，她还有一个同样反派的哥哥。

0027.en: Three years ago, when the brother learned from her school teacher that Chi Xiaocheng had good grades in her first year of high school and might get into a top university with two years of effort, he chose to drop out of college and join society.
0027.speaker: 旁白
0027.cn: 在三年前，哥哥从她学校老师中得知池小橙高一成绩很好，两年努力有机会考上985后，刚上大学的他就选择了辍学混社会。

0027.en: Because he had no skills and was naive, he was deceived and ended up following a gang boss.
0027.speaker: 旁白
0027.cn: 因为没什么能力又单纯，被人骗了后跟了一个道上的大哥。

0027.en: Over two years, he didn't achieve much and was even arrested several times, but he kept sending tuition and living expenses back home.
0027.speaker: 旁白
0027.cn: 两年下来没成什么事，还进过几次局子，但一笔又一笔的学费生活费都寄了回来。

0027.en: Until a year ago, when he took a knife for the gang boss, he lost an arm but also became the boss's trusted aide, earning a commercial apartment in the inner ring of Jiuzhou City.
0027.speaker: 旁白
0027.cn: 直至一年前，他给道上的大哥挡了一刀，虽然断了一条手，但也成了大哥心腹，混到了九州市内环的一套商品房。

0027.en: This was exactly where Chi Xiaocheng now lived.
0027.speaker: 旁白
0027.cn: 这也正是池小橙现在住的地方。

0027.en: In the original story, after the original owner was killed by Ye Liang, her brother appeared as a new villain who turned dark, leading the boss's forces in a mad pursuit of Ye Liang, living for about two hundred chapters before meeting a tragic end.
0027.speaker: 旁白
0027.cn: 在原著中，原主被叶良杀死后，哥哥作为新的反派黑化登场，带着大哥的势力疯了似的扑杀叶良，活了大概两百来章，还是落了个惨死的下场。

0027.en: But Chi Xiaocheng knew that when it came to family, whether he had turned dark or not, her brother was always very good.
0027.speaker: 旁白
0027.cn: 但池小橙知道，在对家人这方面，无论黑没黑化，哥哥都非常好。

0027.en: Although she had transmigrated, she still respected this bond, and unless absolutely necessary, Chi Xiaocheng didn't want to worry the original owner's brother.
0027.speaker: 旁白
0027.cn: 她虽是穿越过来，却也敬重这份感情，没那个必要的话，池小橙不想让原主的哥哥担心。

0027.en: The main concern was that he might conflict with the male leads, which would be really troublesome.
0027.speaker: 旁白
0027.cn: 主要还是怕他跟男主们起冲突，那才是真的难办。

0027.en: Because of this, when she looked at the doctor, her little eyes practically screamed "I have unspeakable difficulties."
0027.speaker: 旁白
0027.cn: 对此，她看向医生的小眼神中，就差把“我有难言之隐”这几个字给写上了。

0027.en: The doctor looked at Dongfang Yang expressionlessly.
0027.speaker: 旁白
0027.cn: 医生面无表情地看了眼东方阳。

0027.en: The latter said calmly, "It's nothing serious anyway, just let her sign it herself. It's just a formality."
0027.speaker: 东方阳
0027.cn: 后者淡淡道，“反正也没什么大事，就让她自己签吧，走个程序而已。”

0027.en: "Alright."
0027.speaker: 旁白
0027.cn: “好的。”

0027.en: The doctor nodded without saying much.
0027.speaker: 旁白
0027.cn: 医生点头，也没多说什么。

0027.en: After handing Chi Xiaocheng the medical instructions to sign, he left on his own.
0027.speaker: 旁白
0027.cn: 将医嘱递了上去让池小橙签字后，又自觉离开。

0027.en: Chi Xiaocheng looked at Dongfang Yang weakly, using her acting skills to instantly become a bit more cute and fragile.
0027.speaker: 旁白
0027.cn: 池小橙弱弱地看了眼东方阳，发动演技，霎时变得呆萌娇弱了些许。

0027.en: However, with Su Tao present, she didn't go too far.
0027.speaker: 旁白
0027.cn: 不过苏桃在，她也没有太过火。

0027.en: "Thank you, Young Master Dongfang."
0027.speaker: 池小橙
0027.cn: “谢谢东方少爷。”

0027.en: She said weakly, which in Su Tao's eyes just looked like fear.
0027.speaker: 旁白
0027.cn: 她弱弱地说了一句，在苏桃眼里就是有些害怕。

0027.en: Su Tao couldn't help but turn around and defend her, saying, "Dongfang Yang, don't scare Xiaocheng."
0027.speaker: 苏桃
0027.cn: 苏桃不由回头，维护说道，“东方阳，你别吓着小橙了。”

0027.en: "Huh?" Dongfang Yang pointed at himself, "How did I scare her?"
0027.speaker: 东方阳
0027.cn: “啊？”东方阳指了指自己，“我哪吓着她了？”

0027.en: He had only said one sentence since entering the room!
0027.speaker: 旁白
0027.cn: 他从进门到现在，只说了一句话好不好！

0027.en: Su Tao: "Your expression scared her. Just be normal like usual. You're not good at acting cool."
0027.speaker: 苏桃
0027.cn: 苏桃：“你的眼神吓着她了，和平时一样就行了，你不适合装高冷。”

0027.en: Dongfang Yang: "..."
0027.speaker: 东方阳

0027.en: He felt wronged.
0027.speaker: 旁白
0027.cn: 他很委屈。

0027.en: He had clearly stayed quiet so as not to disturb the doctor!
0027.speaker: 旁白
0027.cn: 刚刚分明是不想出声打扰到医生所以才闭口不言的好不好！

0027.en: Su Tao grabbed one of Chi Xiaocheng's small hands and gently squeezed it, "It's okay, Xiaocheng. He won't scare you like before."
0027.speaker: 苏桃
0027.cn: 苏桃抓着池小橙的一只小手，轻轻捏了一下，“没事的小橙，他不会像之前那样吓你的。”

0027.en: Chi Xiaocheng nodded gently, then looked at Dongfang Yang, "I'm... I'm sorry."
0027.speaker: 池小橙
0027.cn: 池小橙轻轻点头，又看向了东方阳，“对...对不起。”

0027.en: Dongfang Yang waved his hand generously, "Forget it, it's nothing anyway."
0027.speaker: 东方阳
0027.cn: 东方阳大度地摆摆手，“算了，本来也没什么。”

0027.en: "No, no." Chi Xiaocheng quickly shook her head to explain, "What I mean is, when you came in just now, even though I knew you wouldn't do anything to me, I was still a little scared."
0027.speaker: 池小橙
0027.cn: “没有没有。”池小橙连忙摇头解释道，“我的意思是，刚刚你进来的时候，我明明知道你不会对我怎么样的，但还是有点害怕。”

0027.en: "I have to apologize for this. You've helped me so much, yet I still thought this way."
0027.speaker: 池小橙
0027.cn: “关于这一点我要说对不起，你明明帮了我那么多，我居然还这样想。”

0027.en: She lowered her head, her tea-colored hair perfectly catching the sunlight, creating a thin golden mist. Her frail appearance made people feel much more fond of her.
0027.speaker: 旁白
0027.cn: 她低下了脑袋，茶色的秀发恰巧被阳光映衬出一层薄薄的金雾，孱弱的模样不由让人好感大增。

0027.en: Dongfang Yang touched his cheek, feeling a bit embarrassed.
0027.speaker: 旁白
0027.cn: 东方阳摸了摸脸颊，有些不大好意思。

0027.en: This was her reason for apologizing.
0027.speaker: 旁白
0027.cn: 她道歉的理由居然是这个。

0027.en: And was she blushing when she lowered her head?
0027.speaker: 旁白
0027.cn: 而且低下头是脸红了吗？

0027.en: She felt... quite cute.
0027.speaker: 东方阳
0027.cn: 感觉还...怪可爱的。

0028.en: Chapter 28: Lies
0028.speaker: 旁白
0028.cn: 第28章 谎言

0028.en: People are such strange creatures.
0028.speaker: 旁白
0028.cn: 人就是这样奇怪的生物。

0028.en: Dongfang Yang had felt a bit wronged when Su Tao ignored him.
0028.speaker: 旁白
0028.cn: 被苏桃忽视本来东方阳还觉得有点委屈。

0028.en: But when Chi Xiaocheng filled his emotional needs, he felt it didn't matter anymore.
0028.speaker: 旁白
0028.cn: 可当池小橙将他的情绪价值补上，他又觉得没什么了。

0028.en: He couldn't help but wonder if this version of Chi Xiaocheng was her true nature, and if her makeup attempts, multiple confessions to him, and targeting Su Tao were all because she was forced by the people who bullied her.
0028.speaker: 旁白
0028.cn: 不禁去想，难道这样的池小橙才是本性，之前化妆和自己表白几次，又去针对苏桃等，都是被那些霸凌她的人逼的？

0028.en: He had been secretly investigating Chi Xiaocheng.
0028.speaker: 旁白
0028.cn: 他是有在暗中调查过池小橙。

0028.en: However, he didn't know that after Chi Xiaocheng gained her hacking skills, she had simply gone through her own information and created some false impressions online.
0028.speaker: 旁白
0028.cn: 却不知，池小橙在获得黑客技能后，就简单地将自己一系列信息给过了一遍，在网上营造了些许假象。

0028.en: Unless someone investigated on the ground, her story of being bullied and threatened could perfectly cover up the lies she had told during this time.
0028.speaker: 旁白
0028.cn: 除非去实地调查，否则她被霸凌威胁的事情，可以完美掩盖自己这段时间撒的谎。

0028.en: Plus, with Su Tao backing her up,
0028.speaker: 旁白
0028.cn: 再加上有着苏桃背书

0028.en: his investigation was exactly what Chi Xiaocheng had predicted.
0028.speaker: 旁白
0028.cn: 他的调查，恰好被池小橙预判到了。

0028.en: It would naturally make people think
0028.speaker: 旁白
0028.cn: 不由自主地就会让人联想到。

0028.en: that what she did was actually because she was forced to!
0028.speaker: 旁白
0028.cn: 自己所作所为，其实是被逼的！

0028.en: However, Dongfang Yang wouldn't be like Su Tao, who would take care of her emotions and not ask questions. As soon as he sat down, he looked at Chi Xiaocheng's arms. "Now that things have calmed down, don't you plan to tell us about your situation? Last night's situation was very serious."
0028.speaker: 东方阳
0028.cn: 不过东方阳可不会如苏桃一样照顾她的情绪而不闻不问，一坐下就看着池小橙的手臂，“现在已经没什么事了，你不打算说说看你的情况吗，昨晚的情况可是严重得很。”

0028.en: Although he didn't mention the suicide attempt,
0028.speaker: 旁白
0028.cn: 虽然没提轻生的事情。

0028.en: his slightly raised eyebrows made Chi Xiaocheng understand that she wouldn't get past this without a clear explanation.
0028.speaker: 旁白
0028.cn: 但微挑的眉毛，让池小橙明白，不说个清楚怕是过不去这关了。

0028.en: One question was directed at two people.
0028.speaker: 旁白
0028.cn: 一个问题，问到了两个人。

0028.en: Chi Xiaocheng hung her head so her expression couldn't be seen, while Su Tao was panicking inside.
0028.speaker: 旁白
0028.cn: 池小橙垂着脑袋看不清表情，而苏桃在一旁心中也慌得要死。

0028.en: Things like being yandere, self-harm, and liking herself - if these were talked about openly, people might not even believe it, but Xiaocheng was still a dangerous person.
0028.speaker: 旁白
0028.cn: 病娇、自伤、喜欢自己这种事情往外说的话，信不信还不一定，小橙终究算是个危险份子。

0028.en: She knew that Dongfang Yang had some feelings for her. If he found out, or if word got to Ye Liang and the others, and things got out of hand, they might be fine.
0028.speaker: 旁白
0028.cn: 她是知道东方阳对自己有些好感，要是被他知道，又或者传到叶良等人那里，事情闹大了之后，他们可能会没事。

0028.en: But what about Xiaocheng?
0028.speaker: 旁白
0028.cn: 但小橙呢？

0028.en: Even if they didn't hurt Xiaocheng, wouldn't Xiaocheng hurt herself?
0028.speaker: 旁白
0028.cn: 他们不伤害小橙，难道小橙就不会伤害她自己吗？

0028.en: Su Tao felt anxious, but her mind quickly searched for a solution.
0028.speaker: 旁白
0028.cn: 苏桃有些着急，脑海还是很快地寻找解决方法。

0028.en: Suddenly, what Dongfang Yang had talked about last night came to mind.
0028.speaker: 旁白
0028.cn: 瞬间，东方阳昨晚聊的事情浮现在脑海中。

0028.en: Xiaocheng was forced into this. She was bullied and threatened, so she acted this way.
0028.speaker: 旁白
0028.cn: 小橙是被逼的，她被霸凌被威胁，所以才会做出这样的行动。

0028.en: That's right, as long as Xiaocheng cooperated and nodded along with what she said, they could temporarily hide it from Dongfang Yang!
0028.speaker: 旁白
0028.cn: 没错，只要小橙配合得上自己说的话点头，就能暂时瞒着东方阳！

0028.en: Su Tao's spirits lifted. Having thought of a solution, she was about to speak when she saw Chi Xiaocheng speak first. "The wounds on my arms - I made them myself."
0028.speaker: 池小橙
0028.cn: 苏桃精神一振，想到办法后刚想说出口，就见池小橙先开口了，“手臂上的这些伤，都是我自己弄的。”

0028.en: "Xiaocheng?" Su Tao stared at Chi Xiaocheng, not knowing what to do.
0028.speaker: 苏桃
0028.cn: “小橙？”苏桃呆呆地看着池小橙，一时间不知所措。

0028.en: Dongfang Yang frowned and looked at her without saying anything.
0028.speaker: 旁白
0028.cn: 东方阳皱了皱眉，看着她没有说话。

0028.en: Chi Xiaocheng took a deep breath and said, "I don't want Taotao and Ye Liang to be together!"
0028.speaker: 池小橙
0028.cn: 池小橙深呼吸一口气说道，“我不想让桃桃和叶良在一起！”

0028.en: She raised her head, her red eyes filled with determination.
0028.speaker: 旁白
0028.cn: 她抬着头，赤红的双眼坚定无比。

0028.en: Dongfang Yang paused and asked curiously, "Why? Don't you like Ye Liang?"
0028.speaker: 东方阳
0028.cn: 东方阳顿了一下，好奇问道，“为什么，你不是喜欢叶良吗？”

0028.en: "I don't like him at all." Chi Xiaocheng pouted. "He's so mean and always has a stern face. In the past, I used to see him yelling at people who helped him with things."
0028.speaker: 池小橙
0028.cn: “我才没有喜欢他呢。”池小橙撇了撇嘴，“他那么凶，又一直板着脸，以前还时不时看到他对帮他办事的人破口大骂。”

0028.en: "If you don't do well, you get scolded. I don't want Taotao to be with him." She lowered her head again. "Last night's party was important, right? He wanted to take Taotao to a party before to satisfy his pride."
0028.speaker: 池小橙
0028.cn: “做得不好就要挨骂，我才不想桃桃和他在一起呢。”说着，又低下了脑袋，“昨晚的宴会很重要吧，上次他就想带桃桃去参加宴会，满足他的虚荣心。”

0028.en: "I knew without thinking that he would say something like 'Taotao is my girlfriend.' With so many rich people there, once he said it, everyone would know, right?"
0028.speaker: 池小橙
0028.cn: “我不用想就知道，肯定会说什么桃桃是他女朋友之类的，那里那么多有钱人，他一说，谁都知道这件事了吧？”

0028.en: Chi Xiaocheng looked at Su Tao with incredibly gentle eyes. "Taotao is just an ordinary person. If so many people talked about her, could she fight back? If that Ye Liang got unhappy, who knows what he might do? If she really became his girlfriend, she'd definitely be bullied every day."
0028.speaker: 池小橙
0028.cn: 池小橙看向苏桃，眼神温柔无比，“桃桃又是普通人，被那么多人说了她能反抗吗，那个叶良一不开心说不定又会怎么样，要真成了他女友，以后肯定天天被欺负。”

0028.en: Of course, the original Su Tao in the story was so soft. No matter what these male leads did, she basically never argued back. She just accepted everything and being bullied was normal for her.
0028.speaker: 旁白
0028.cn: 可不是嘛，原著中的苏桃那么软，这几个男主无论做什么她基本都不反驳，又是逆来顺受，被欺负是常态了。

0028.en: The betrayal by all the male leads in the later part of the story, forcing Su Tao to commit suicide, was even worse.
0028.speaker: 旁白
0028.cn: 大后期的各大男主背叛，苏桃被逼自杀就更不用说了。

0028.en: Chi Xiaocheng's words caused huge waves in both Dongfang Yang and Su Tao's hearts.
0028.speaker: 旁白
0028.cn: 池小橙一番话，在东方阳和苏桃心中可谓是掀起大波。

0028.en: Su Tao was thinking that the main reason Xiaocheng had her breakdown in the basement last time was because Ye Liang had already wanted to publicly announce that she was his girlfriend.
0028.speaker: 旁白
0028.cn: 苏桃想的是，原来上次地下室小橙暴走的主要原因，是因为那时叶良就已经想当众公布自己是他女友的事情。

0028.en: But actually, that was just pretend, just to help him save face.
0028.speaker: 旁白
0028.cn: 可实际上这是只是假扮的，给他充场面而已。

0028.en: But Xiaocheng didn't know it was pretend!
0028.speaker: 旁白
0028.cn: 但小橙不知道那是假扮的啊！

0028.en: She had always been well-behaved and gentle because things had never crossed her bottom line?
0028.speaker: 旁白
0028.cn: 往日她一直安分温顺，是因为事情一直没触及她的底线？

0028.en: So Xiaocheng's previous targeting of Ye Liang, even confessing to Ye Liang, was all for me.
0028.speaker: 旁白
0028.cn: 原来，小橙之前针对叶良，甚至表白叶良，都是为了我

0028.en: Looking at it from Chi Xiaocheng's perspective, Su Tao couldn't help but feel moved.
0028.speaker: 旁白
0028.cn: 换在池小橙的立场去看，苏桃心中不由有些感动。

0028.en: But Dongfang Yang didn't think so. He was thinking that Chi Xiaocheng had confessed to Ye Liang so many times, and it was actually for Su Tao?
0028.speaker: 旁白
0028.cn: 但东方阳不那么想，他想的是，池小橙前面表白那么多次叶良，竟然为的是苏桃？

0028.en: He had really thought that Chi Xiaocheng liked Ye Liang, and because she clashed with Su Tao and thought Su Tao had stolen her man, she targeted Su Tao.
0028.speaker: 旁白
0028.cn: 他是真的以为池小橙喜欢叶良，因为跟苏桃撞了，又认为苏桃抢了他的男人，所以才对苏桃进行针对。

0028.en: For a friend, she was willing to sacrifice herself. Did such friendship really exist?
0028.speaker: 旁白
0028.cn: 为了朋友，宁愿献身自己，这样的友谊，真的存在吗？

0028.en: At this moment, Chi Xiaocheng looked at him again and said slowly, "Actually, I think you're much better than Ye Liang, Young Master Dongfang."
0028.speaker: 池小橙
0028.cn: 恰逢此时，池小橙又多看了一眼他，缓缓道，“其实我觉得东方少爷你比叶良好多了。”

0028.en: Dongfang Yang: "!"
0028.speaker: 东方阳
0028.cn: 东方阳：“！”

0028.en: Could it be
0028.speaker: 旁白
0028.cn: 难道

0028.en: that Chi Xiaocheng thinks I'm more suitable for Su Tao than Ye Liang?
0028.speaker: 旁白
0028.cn: 池小橙是认为我比叶良更适合苏桃？

0028.en: She confessed to Ye Liang because she disliked him and didn't want Su Tao to fall into his hands.
0028.speaker: 旁白
0028.cn: 她向叶良表白，是讨厌他，更不想让苏桃落入他手。

0028.en: But she also confessed to me, the difference being that she confessed fewer times and hardly ever targeted me. Doesn't this prove that she actually likes me a little?
0028.speaker: 旁白
0028.cn: 但同时她也表白过我，区别就是表白的次数较少，也几乎没怎么针对过我，这是不是证明她其实是有点喜欢我的？

0028.en: She's even willing to ruin the relationship between Ye Liang and Su Tao for me!
0028.speaker: 旁白
0028.cn: 她甚至愿意为了我，而去搞坏叶良和苏桃两个人的关系！

0028.en: Well, Dongfang Yang also felt he was overthinking things. At first glance, what Chi Xiaocheng said seemed fine, but you could still see the contradictions in the logic.
0028.speaker: 旁白
0028.cn: 好吧，东方阳也觉得是自己想太多了，乍一想觉得池小橙说的话没什么问题，但其中逻辑的矛盾还是能看出来。

0028.en: It was just that he had been led astray, so Dongfang Yang didn't think in that direction.
0028.speaker: 旁白
0028.cn: 只是被他带歪了后，东方阳没往那方面去想。

0028.en: Calming himself down, Dongfang Yang decided not to think wildly anymore. "What about the wounds on your arms? Just calling Su Tao back from the party and making up a lie would have been enough, right? Why did you have to go to such extremes?"
0028.speaker: 东方阳
0028.cn: 定了定神，东方阳索性不再胡思乱想，“那你手臂上的伤呢，把苏桃从宴会喊回来，编一个骗局就行了吧，为什么要做到这种地步？”

0028.en: Hearing this question, Su Tao's heart also tightened.
0028.speaker: 旁白
0028.cn: 听到这问题，苏桃也是心中一紧。

0028.en: Chi Xiaocheng looked away from Dongfang Yang's gaze. "Anyway, nobody wants me. If Taotao gets together with Ye Liang, she definitely won't want me anymore, so I might as well..."
0028.speaker: 池小橙
0028.cn: 池小橙错开和东方阳对视的视线，“反正我也没人要，如果桃桃和叶良在一起了，肯定就不要我了，我还不如......”

0028.en: Might as well die.
0028.speaker: 旁白
0028.cn: 还不如死了得了。

0028.en: Chi Xiaocheng didn't finish, but both of them understood what she meant.
0028.speaker: 旁白
0028.cn: 池小橙没说完，但二人都清楚她是什么意思。

0028.en: Dongfang Yang was about to continue when Su Tao grabbed his sleeve, shook her head, and pulled him out of the room.
0028.speaker: 旁白
0028.cn: 东方阳还想继续说下去，就被苏桃给拽住了衣袖，摇摇头后拉他走出了房间内。

0028.en: "What's wrong?" Dongfang Yang looked at Su Tao with confusion.
0028.speaker: 东方阳
0028.cn: “怎么了？”东方阳不解地看着苏桃。

0028.en: Su Tao twisted a strand of hair around her finger, looking a bit agitated. "Dongfang Yang, stop asking so many questions. Can't you see that Xiaocheng clearly has some psychological problems?"
0028.speaker: 苏桃
0028.cn: 苏桃卷了一下鬓角的秀发，有些焦躁，“东方阳你就别问那么多了，小橙显然有点心理问题你没看出来吗？”

0028.en: Dongfang Yang paused. "I think she seems pretty normal, and about the wounds on her arms and the suicide attempt, there has to be some conclusion, right? Aren't you afraid this kind of thing will happen again?"
0028.speaker: 东方阳
0028.cn: 东方阳顿了一下，“我感觉她挺正常的啊，而且她手臂的伤，还有轻生的事情，总得有个结果吧，你不怕下次再发生这种事情？”

0028.en: "I... I'll watch over her." Su Tao bit her lip. "That was done because some people bullied her and forced her to do it. When I went back to the dorm yesterday afternoon, I saw Xiaocheng being beaten up by someone. You should know that some people just enjoy tormenting others for fun."
0028.speaker: 苏桃
0028.cn: “我...我会看着她的。”苏桃咬了咬嘴唇，“她那个是被某些人霸凌，逼迫着去弄的吧，我昨天下午回宿舍的时候，还看到小橙被人打了呢，你应该也知道，有些人就喜欢以玩弄他人为乐。”

0028.en: Dongfang Yang frowned and sighed. "Alright, I'll listen to you and stop asking."
0028.speaker: 东方阳
0028.cn: 东方阳皱眉叹了口气，“好吧，我听你的，不问了。”

0028.en: He could tell at a glance that Su Tao was hiding something from him.
0028.speaker: 旁白
0028.cn: 他一眼就看出了苏桃是有什么事情瞒着自己。

0028.en: And it definitely had to do with Chi Xiaocheng.
0028.speaker: 旁白
0028.cn: 而且肯定跟池小橙有关。

0028.en: Maybe the truth wasn't that simple.
0028.speaker: 旁白
0028.cn: 或许事实没那么简单。

0028.en: But... forget it. Su Tao must have her reasons. He wouldn't dig deeper into this matter.
0028.speaker: 旁白
0028.cn: 但...算了，苏桃肯定有她的道理，这件事他就不深究了。

0028.en: Dongfang Yang looked sideways through the door crack at the dazed Chi Xiaocheng. "But the matter with those delinquent girls will have to wait. Su Tao, you should think about how to explain things to Ye Liang after you're discharged."
0028.speaker: 东方阳
0028.cn: 东方阳侧目从门缝看了眼发呆的池小橙，“不过那群不良少女的事情还得往后放一下，苏桃你不如想一下，出院后怎么和叶良那边解释。”

0028.en: "That guy - I don't think he'll let Chi Xiaocheng off easily."
0028.speaker: 东方阳
0028.cn: “那家伙，我觉得他不会轻易放过池小橙。”

0029.en: Chapter 29: Why Don't You Act Cute With Me?
0029.speaker: 旁白
0029.cn: 第29章 你怎么不朝我撒娇？

0029.en: Back in the hospital room, both of them silently agreed not to mention what just happened.
0029.speaker: 旁白
0029.cn: 回到病房，二人都默契地没有再提刚刚的事情。

0029.en: But there was one thing Chi Xiaocheng couldn't avoid.
0029.speaker: 旁白
0029.cn: 但还有一个事情是池小橙怎么也避不过的。

0029.en: That was the huge medical bill!
0029.speaker: 旁白
0029.cn: 那就是高额的医药费！

0029.en: Chi Xiaocheng looked at the medical bill in her hand, feeling her head buzzing. She looked at Dongfang Yang in confusion, "Twenty-three thousand? Why is it so expensive?"
0029.speaker: 池小橙
0029.cn: 池小橙看着手里的医药单子，感觉脑袋嗡嗡响，她不解地看着东方阳，“两万三，为什么那么贵？”

0029.en: Dongfang Yang said calmly, "Look at what kind of room you're staying in and what kind of service you're getting. The doctors and nurses are on standby 24 hours a day for you. Not only did they use a lot of equipment, but the medicine was also top quality. Twenty-three thousand is actually reasonable."
0029.speaker: 东方阳
0029.cn: 东方阳淡淡说道，“你不看看你住的是什么病房，享受的是什么服务，人家医生、护士24小时待命候着你，不仅用了不少仪器，药也是最高规格的，两万三还好了。”

0029.en: Chi Xiaocheng's hand holding the medical bill trembled slightly. This time she wasn't acting - she was really about to cry. "But... that's way too much!"
0029.speaker: 池小橙
0029.cn: 池小橙拿着医药单的手，微微颤抖，她这次不是演的，是真的要哭了，“可是...这也太多了吧！”

0029.en: "That doesn't even include your phone." Dongfang Yang pointed to the new phone in her hand and said calmly, "I had someone buy it for you last night. It's a Xiaomi 14, four thousand yuan. I'll round it down - just pay me back twenty-five thousand."
0029.speaker: 东方阳
0029.cn: “还没算你手机的钱呢。”东方阳指了指她手上的新手机，淡淡道，“我昨晚让人给你买的，大米14，4000块，给你抹个零，还我两万五就行了。”

0029.en: Hearing this, Chi Xiaocheng looked at Su Tao with tearful eyes, "Taotao~"
0029.speaker: 池小橙
0029.cn: 池小橙闻言，泪眼摩挲地看向苏桃，“桃桃~”

0029.en: Her voice was soft and sweet as she acted cute, holding Su Tao's hand. Dongfang Yang was stunned.
0029.speaker: 旁白
0029.cn: 她声音软腻甜美，撒娇地牵着苏桃的手，听得东方阳目瞪口呆。

0029.en: This sweet, soft loli voice - what man could resist it!
0029.speaker: 旁白
0029.cn: 这娇滴滴的软糯萝莉音，哪个男人受得住啊！

0029.en: His bad impression of Chi Xiaocheng plus Su Tao being nearby always made Dongfang Yang unconsciously ignore one fact.
0029.speaker: 旁白
0029.cn: 一直对池小橙的不良印象加上苏桃在身边，总是会让东方阳下意识地忽略一个事实。

0029.en: Chi Xiaocheng was a legal loli whose looks were just as good as Su Tao's.
0029.speaker: 旁白
0029.cn: 池小橙是一个颜值不亚于苏桃的合法萝莉。

0029.en: Both were beautiful girls who would stand out even among the many noble ladies he knew.
0029.speaker: 旁白
0029.cn: 二人都是美少女，即便放在她认识的诸多贵族小姐里，也是非常能打的存在。

0029.en: Su Tao stood to the side, awkwardly twirling her hair. Her pretty profile faced Dongfang Yang, and in her eyes, seeing two girls so close together was quite enjoyable.
0029.speaker: 苏桃
0029.cn: 苏桃在一旁，一脸尴尬地卷着自己的秀发，那张俏丽的侧颜对着东方阳，在她眼里两个女孩子贴那么近看着别提有多享受了。

0029.en: She felt like it wouldn't be a loss if she could take either of their places.
0029.speaker: 苏桃
0029.cn: 感觉自己要是能替代其中任意一个人的位置好像都不亏？

0029.en: Su Tao cleared her throat softly, "Sorry, Xiaocheng, I don't have much money either. My part-time job wages for this month haven't been paid yet, and I only have two thousand yuan on me. Um... I'll give you fifteen hundred."
0029.speaker: 苏桃
0029.cn: 苏桃轻咳了一声，“对不起啊小橙，我也没什么钱，我这个月兼职的工资还没发，身上就两千块钱了，那个我......我给你一千五吧。”

0029.en: Chi Xiaocheng was really happy that Su Tao could lend her fifteen hundred when she only had two thousand.
0029.speaker: 旁白
0029.cn: 就两千块了能借一千五，池小橙确实很高兴。

0029.en: But compared to the huge gap of twenty-five thousand, it really wasn't enough.
0029.speaker: 旁白
0029.cn: 但这对比两万五的天堑，属实是不够看了。

0029.en: She leaned against the headboard feeling defeated, thinking about how to use her advantage as a transmigrator to make some quick money.
0029.speaker: 池小橙
0029.cn: 她自闭地靠在了床头，思考着自己如何利用穿越者的优势，去赚点快钱。

0029.en: Right now, she only had four hundred yuan on her.
0029.speaker: 池小橙
0029.cn: 如今自己身上，也就四百块钱。

0029.en: Throwing away her phone had been too impulsive!
0029.speaker: 池小橙
0029.cn: 扔掉手机还是冲动了啊！

0029.en: In her previous life, Chi Xiaocheng had just graduated from university and studied new media for a few years. Apart from tuition paid by her family, she earned her living expenses by writing novels.
0029.speaker: 旁白
0029.cn: 池小橙前世也就大学刚毕业，学了几年的新媒体，除了家里给的学费，生活费都是靠写小说自己赚的。

0029.en: However, even though she had been writing for years, she was always a failed author, earning only a thousand yuan per month including perfect attendance bonuses, just enough to get by.
0029.speaker: 旁白
0029.cn: 然而他虽然写了几年，但一直是个死扑街，每个月加上全勤也才一千块，刚好够花。

0029.en: After transmigrating to this parallel world, Chi Xiaocheng had done some research. This place was called the Great Zhou Kingdom. Although the system and core were similar to her previous world's China, this novel was a female-oriented story, so the world setting served the various powerful male leads.
0029.speaker: 旁白
0029.cn: 然而穿越到这平行世界中，池小橙是了解了一下的，这里名为大周国，虽然制度和内核与前世华夏大体相同，可这本小说是女频文，世界观背景都会为各大强势男主服务。

0029.en: Financial groups were everywhere, powerful families were extremely strong, and the entertainment industry was highly developed. Methods like copying novels, anime, and movies that transmigrators usually used to make money were completely unavailable to her.
0029.speaker: 旁白
0029.cn: 财阀林立，世家大族强盛无比，娱乐业发达无比，诸如穿越者自带的抄小说、动漫、电影等赚钱手段，她是完全没有机会。

0029.en: In such a setting, while there weren't any ridiculous urban supernatural powers, the novel's setting did include the existence of ancient martial artists in the Great Zhou Kingdom.
0029.speaker: 旁白
0029.cn: 而这样的背景下，虽说不至于有很离谱的都市异能，可小说中的设定，大周国也有古武者的存在。

0029.en: The priority was self-protection first, then thinking about paying him back. Dongfang Yang was so rich, maybe if she owed him for ten or eight years, he'd forget about it?
0029.speaker: 池小橙
0029.cn: 首要还是先自保，其次再考虑还他的钱吧，东方阳那么有钱，欠个十年八年没准他就忘了？

0029.en: Chi Xiaocheng looked at him, and he happened to look back. Their eyes met.
0029.speaker: 旁白
0029.cn: 池小橙将视线投在他身上，恰好他也看了过来，二人对视。

0029.en: Dongfang Yang smiled teasingly, "If you act cute with me like you just did with Su Tao, I might be happy enough to forgive you a bit more."
0029.speaker: 东方阳
0029.cn: 东方阳笑着调侃道，“你要是像刚刚对苏桃那样对我撒个娇，没准我高兴了可以再免你一点。”

0029.en: He showed a confident expression.
0029.speaker: 旁白
0029.cn: 他露出稳坐钓鱼台的表情。

0029.en: He thought to himself that if she called him "big brother" in that same soft, sweet voice, he wouldn't mind forgiving her two thousand yuan.
0029.speaker: 东方阳
0029.cn: 心中想道，要是用刚刚那样的语气软软糯糯地喊自己一声哥哥，给她免个两千块也不是不行。

0029.en: But who knew, as soon as he said it, Chi Xiaocheng's expectant little eyes became disgusted.
0029.speaker: 旁白
0029.cn: 可谁知，他才刚说出口，池小橙原本期待的小眼神就变得嫌弃了起来。

0029.en: She turned her head away, pouting, "No way."
0029.speaker: 池小橙
0029.cn: 脑袋扭到一边，撇着小嘴，“不要。”

0029.en: Dongfang Yang's mouth twitched, "You confessed to me before, and now you're so disgusted by me?"
0029.speaker: 东方阳
0029.cn: 东方阳嘴角一抽，“之前还跟我表白呢，现在这么嫌弃我？”

0029.en: Chi Xiaocheng huffed softly, "I only act cute with Taotao."
0029.speaker: 池小橙
0029.cn: 池小橙小小地哼了一声，“我只跟桃桃撒娇。”

0029.en: Su Tao watched Chi Xiaocheng's complete rejection and realized that her previous confession to Dongfang Yang might have had the same motive as Ye Liang's - she didn't want her and Dongfang Yang to be together.
0029.speaker: 苏桃
0029.cn: 苏桃看着池小橙全然拒绝的模样，也知道之前表白东方阳，可能还是和叶良的出发点一样，不想自己和东方阳在一起。

0029.en: The love she spoke of was something she put into action every moment.
0029.speaker: 苏桃
0029.cn: 她嘴里说着的喜欢，是每时每刻都在付之行动啊。

0029.en: Feeling warm in her heart, Su Tao looked at Dongfang Yang, "How about this - I'll also take responsibility for part of the money Xiaocheng owes. You're not short of money, so you're not in a hurry, right? We'll slowly pay you back within a year."
0029.speaker: 苏桃
0029.cn: 心中微暖，苏桃看向东方阳，“这样吧，小橙欠的钱我也负担一部分，东方阳你不缺钱应该不急吧，我们会在一年内慢慢还给你的。”

0029.en: Seeing Su Tao speak up for Chi Xiaocheng again, Dongfang Yang really felt like she was being stolen away.
0029.speaker: 旁白
0029.cn: 又见苏桃为池小橙说话，东方阳真的有一种她被拐跑了的感觉。

0029.en: Just a few days ago, she was quite clingy with him.
0029.speaker: 旁白
0029.cn: 明明几天前，还蛮黏自己的。

0029.en: Now everything was about Xiaocheng.
0029.speaker: 旁白
0029.cn: 现在什么都是小橙。

0029.en: He scratched his hair and sighed, "Forget it. I invested in a coffee shop outside the school. Chi Xiaocheng, you can work there for three months, and I'll consider the debt forgiven."
0029.speaker: 东方阳
0029.cn: 他抓了抓头发，叹气道，“算了，我在学校外投资了一家咖啡厅，池小橙你去给我看三个月的店，这笔钱就算给你免了。”

0029.en: "Really?" Chi Xiaocheng's eyes sparkled.
0029.speaker: 池小橙
0029.cn: “真的可以吗？”池小橙双眼闪烁。

0029.en: "It's just a casual task for the family anyway. Just don't mess it up."
0029.speaker: 东方阳
0029.cn: “反正也是随手完成家族的任务，你别搞砸了就行。”

0029.en: "Thank you, Young Master Dongfang!" Chi Xiaocheng gave him a happy smile, her small pointed canine tooth looking extremely cute.
0029.speaker: 池小橙
0029.cn: “谢谢东方少爷！”池小橙对他露出了开心的浅笑，那颗细尖的小虎牙可爱至极。

0029.en: Dongfang Yang nodded coolly, "Only because of Su Tao. Also, for these three months, you're my subordinate. Don't be timid. If anyone dares to bully you, fight back, understand?"
0029.speaker: 东方阳
0029.cn: 东方阳高冷地点了点头，“看在苏桃的份上而已，另外这三个月你也算我小弟了，别畏畏缩缩的，谁敢欺负你就怼回去，知道了吗？”

0029.en: "Yes, yes!"
0029.speaker: 池小橙
0029.cn: “嗯嗯！”

0029.en: Dongfang Yang's lips curved up, "Come on, call me boss."
0029.speaker: 东方阳
0029.cn: 东方阳唇角上扬，“来，喊一声老板听听？”

0029.en: "Boss Dongfang~"
0029.speaker: 池小橙
0029.cn: “东方老板~”

0029.en: Chi Xiaocheng called out sweetly, her voice clear and intoxicating like a lark.
0029.speaker: 旁白
0029.cn: 池小橙甜甜地喊了一声，如百灵鸟般清脆的声音令人陶醉。

0029.en: This girl is actually quite cute.
0029.speaker: 东方阳
0029.cn: 这家伙，确实有点可爱。

0029.en: Dongfang Yang thought this as he looked at Chi Xiaocheng's pretty face for a while, then looked away somewhat awkwardly.
0029.speaker: 旁白
0029.cn: 东方阳心中如是看了一会儿池小橙的俏脸，这才略带别扭地将视线投到一边。

0029.en: After chatting for a long time, the doctor came for Chi Xiaocheng's second checkup, and then Su Tao and Dongfang Yang left the room together.
0029.speaker: 旁白
0029.cn: 又聊了许久，医生来进行对池小橙的二次检查后，苏桃才和东方阳一起离开了房间。

0029.en: "Thank you, Dongfang Yang." Su Tao came to the hallway, looked back at the door, and spoke sincerely.
0029.speaker: 苏桃
0029.cn: “谢谢你啊，东方阳。”苏桃来到走廊，回头看了眼房门，语气真挚。

0029.en: Dongfang Yang nodded lightly, "I'm just afraid she'll have an accident. With my reputation, Ye Liang probably won't openly target her."
0029.speaker: 东方阳
0029.cn: 东方阳淡淡点头，“也是怕她出意外而已，有我的名头，叶良应该不会撕破脸皮地去针对她。”

0029.en: Su Tao was stunned, "So you had that plan too?"
0029.speaker: 苏桃
0029.cn: 苏桃闻言，愣了一下，“原来你还有这层打算的吗？”

0029.en: "What else?" Dongfang Yang shrugged, "Making her pay back the money was just teasing her. Twenty thousand yuan isn't even enough for a proper meal for me. Looking at the cheap cosmetics she used to use, I know she doesn't have much money."
0029.speaker: 东方阳
0029.cn: “不然呢？”东方阳耸耸肩，“让她还钱也就逗她一下而已，两万块还不够我正经地吃顿饭，看她以前用的几十块的化妆品就知道，她没几个钱。”

0029.en: Su Tao scratched her cheek, "I was worried you'd dislike her."
0029.speaker: 苏桃
0029.cn: 苏桃挠了挠脸颊，“我还一直担心你会讨厌她来着。”

0029.en: "I did a bit before." Dongfang Yang put his hands in his pockets, then remembered that sweet call of "boss" and smiled.
0029.speaker: 东方阳
0029.cn: “之前是有点吧。”东方阳双手插兜，又想到了那一声甜甜的老板，唇角上扬。

0029.en: "But now, I think she's not bad."
0029.speaker: 东方阳
0029.cn: “不过现在，感觉她还不错。”

0029.en: Although it was an accident, the result was good.
0029.speaker: 旁白
0029.cn: 虽然是意外，但结果总归是好的。

0029.en: Chi Xiaocheng also knew in her heart that after learning about her being bullied, Dongfang Yang had the idea of protecting her.
0029.speaker: 池小橙
0029.cn: 池小橙心底也清楚，知道自己被霸凌后，东方阳是有想庇护自己的想法。

0029.en: This young master seems a bit tsundere.
0029.speaker: 池小橙
0029.cn: 这大少爷，感觉有点傲娇啊。

0029.en: Time flew by, and after resting for three days, Chi Xiaocheng went through the discharge procedures.
0029.speaker: 旁白
0029.cn: 时间一晃而过，池小橙休息了三天后，办理了出院手续。

0029.en: During this time, Su Tao stayed by her side almost constantly, even feeding her meals on the first day.
0029.speaker: 旁白
0029.cn: 这期间，苏桃几乎时刻陪在她身边，甚至第一天的时候吃饭都是她喂的。

0029.en: Although she was still a girl, she already showed a hint of that mature wife-like charm.
0029.speaker: 旁白
0029.cn: 虽然还是少女，但人妻的那种韵味已经微微体现。

0029.en: Chi Xiaocheng both enjoyed it and loved it.
0029.speaker: 池小橙
0029.cn: 她是既享受，又喜欢。

0029.en: Nothing unexpected happened during this time, and she behaved extra well.
0029.speaker: 池小橙
0029.cn: 过程没发生什么意外，她也表现得格外地乖。

0029.en: This made Su Tao even more convinced that yandere could be cured!
0029.speaker: 苏桃
0029.cn: 这更让苏桃确信，病娇是可以治的！

0030.en: Chapter 30: System Rewards, Huge Improvement!
0030.speaker: 旁白
0030.cn: 第30章 系统奖励，巨大提升！

0030.en: After leaving the hospital, Chi Xiaocheng stretched her body. Even though she had been on IV drips for three days, she still didn't feel as good as before.
0030.speaker: 旁白
0030.cn: 出了医院，池小橙活动着身体，虽然打了三天的吊瓶，但感觉还是没有之前状态那么好。

0030.en: When she first traveled through time, she was already physically weak and was being chased around.
0030.speaker: 旁白
0030.cn: 刚穿越来的时候，本身就体虚又被追着抓。

0030.en: The night before last, she also got a high fever because of her plan.
0030.speaker: 旁白
0030.cn: 前天的那个晚上，也因为计划而发了高烧。

0030.en: If she hadn't taken the System's medicine, Chi Xiaocheng felt that even if she didn't die from serious illness, she would have had to stay in the hospital for three to five months.
0030.speaker: 旁白
0030.cn: 如果不是吃了系统的药，池小橙感觉自己重病没死，也得住院个三五个月。

0030.en: Getting out in four days wouldn't delay too much time or cause her to fall behind the novel's plot.
0030.speaker: 旁白
0030.cn: 四天出院，倒也不会耽误太多时间而导致跟不上小说剧情。

0030.en: Back home, Chi Xiaocheng first took a comfortable bath, experienced the charm of a girl's body, then put on a little dress from the closet.
0030.speaker: 旁白
0030.cn: 回到家，池小橙先是舒舒服服地泡了个澡，感受了一下女孩子身体的魅力后，又换上了柜子里的一条小裙子。

0030.en: She pulled down her neckline slightly with her thumb and made a peace sign with her index and middle fingers.
0030.speaker: 旁白
0030.cn: 拇指稍稍拉低领口，食指和中指比了个耶。

0030.en: "Click—"
0030.speaker: 旁白

0030.en: A selfie: a few water droplets clinging to her skin, flowing down her delicate collarbone into the gently curved lines, strands of hair sticking to her pretty face, cute yet with a hint of allure.
0030.speaker: 旁白
0030.cn: 一张自拍，几滴水珠贴合肌肤，顺着精致的锁骨淌入微微起伏的曲线，缕缕秀发粘在俏脸，可爱中又带了一点涩气。

0030.en: She sent this selfie to Su Tao and typed, "I'm back home, just took a bath."
0030.speaker: 池小橙
0030.cn: 将这张自拍发给了苏桃，池小橙敲字道，“回到家啦，刚洗了个澡。”

0030.en: Then she changed into ordinary casual clothes and took a rather unremarkable photo.
0030.speaker: 旁白
0030.cn: 完事又换了一套普通的常服，拍了一张不怎么出彩的照片。

0030.en: She posted it on her social media with a caption.
0030.speaker: 旁白
0030.cn: 配文发朋友圈。

0030.en: "Do I look better without makeup?" — visible to everyone.
0030.speaker: 池小橙
0030.cn: “是不是不化妆会更好看点啊？”——所有人可见。

0030.en: The photo had lots of shadows, was a bit overexposed, and the angle was nothing special, just like a newbie who couldn't take photos.
0030.speaker: 旁白
0030.cn: 照片阴影多，还有些曝光，角度也平平无奇，像极了不会拍照的小白。

0030.en: Although it wasn't outstanding, Chi Xiaocheng's beauty was undeniable. Even this casual shot was stunning.
