0030.speaker: 旁白
0030.cn: 虽说不出彩，可池小橙的颜值摆在那里，然是这样随便拍，也是惊为天人。

0030.en: After doing all this, Chi Xiaocheng returned to her room and sat down. "System, how many Emotion Points do I have now?"
0030.speaker: 池小橙
0030.cn: 做完这些，池小橙才回到房间坐下，“系统，我现在有多少情绪值了？”

0030.en: These past few days, since nothing much happened, she didn't gain many Emotion Points. The big chunk was still from that stormy night.
0030.speaker: 旁白
0030.cn: 这几天因为没发生什么事情，获得的情绪值并不多，大头还是那一天暴雨的晚上。

0030.en: "I can do two ten-pulls now. Although I don't know this system's probability rates, I should at least get two skills guaranteed."
0030.speaker: 池小橙
0030.cn: “可以进行两次十连抽了，虽然不知道这个系统的概率，但保底至少两个技能。”

0030.en: Chi Xiaocheng browsed the system shop while thinking about how to spend this fortune.
0030.speaker: 旁白
0030.cn: 池小橙一边浏览系统商城，一边思考要怎么花这笔巨款。

0030.en: "System, let's do a ten-pull first!"
0030.speaker: 池小橙
0030.cn: “系统，先进行十连抽！”

0030.en: These past few days had been like walking on thin ice. It was time for this useless system to be useful!
0030.speaker: 旁白
0030.cn: 这几天如履薄冰，也该是这个废物系统派上用场的时候了！

0030.en: Ten cards spread out in the center of the system panel, with one glowing gold and another faintly white.
0030.speaker: 旁白
0030.cn: 十张卡片摊在系统面板的中央，其中一张是金光，另一张淡淡的白色。

0030.en: Chi Xiaocheng raised an eyebrow. "Two skills?"
0030.speaker: 池小橙
0030.cn: 池小橙眉毛一挑，“两个技能？”

0030.en: With a wave of her hand, all the card contents were revealed.
0030.speaker: 旁白
0030.cn: 小手一挥，抽卡全部内容展开。

0030.en: [Obtained Delicate Soft Candy x1 (taking it makes skin more delicate)]
0030.speaker: 系统
0030.cn: 【获得细腻软糖*1（服用可以让皮肤更加细腻）】

0030.en: [Obtained Sleep Chocolate x3 (taking it puts you into at least 6 hours of deep sleep within 1 minute, greatly restoring fatigue)]
0030.speaker: 系统
0030.cn: 【获得睡眠巧克力*3（服用可在1分钟内进入至少6小时的深度睡眠，大幅度恢复疲惫状态）】

0030.en: [Obtained Cinderella's Handkerchief x1 (whoever gets the handkerchief will unconsciously think of the host)]
0030.speaker: 系统
0030.cn: 【获得灰姑娘的手帕*1（得到手帕者会不由自主地想起宿主）】

0030.en: [Obtained Wine-filled Chocolate x3 (taking it quickly puts you in a tipsy state)]
0030.speaker: 系统
0030.cn: 【获得酒心巧克力*3（服用迅速进入微醺状态）】

0030.en: [Congratulations host on obtaining passive skill: Cat Eyes (Basic)]
0030.speaker: 系统
0030.cn: 【恭喜宿主获得被动技能：猫瞳（初级）】

0030.en: [Cat Eyes (Basic): When the host stares at someone for a long time and feels strong emotions, pupils will become mysterious and emit a hypnotic glow, creating a powerful intimidating effect]
0030.speaker: 系统
0030.cn: 【猫瞳（初级）：当宿主长时间注视别人，并产生强烈情绪时，瞳孔会变得妖异，并散发幻觉般的光芒，起到强烈的震慑作用）】

0030.en: [Congratulations host on obtaining skill: Surface Recovery (Intermediate)]
0030.speaker: 系统
0030.cn: 【恭喜宿主获得技能：表皮恢复（中级）】

0030.en: [Surface Recovery (Intermediate): Speeds up recovery from any surface injuries the host suffers, removes scars, and restores to original condition]
0030.speaker: 系统
0030.cn: 【表皮恢复（中级）：加快恢复宿主遭受的任何表皮伤害，并去掉疤痕，恢复如初】

0030.en: 8 items, 2 skills!
0030.speaker: 旁白
0030.cn: 8个物品，2个技能！

0030.en: And they all looked pretty useful.
0030.speaker: 旁白
0030.cn: 而且看着都还比较实用。

0030.en: Especially that Cinderella's handkerchief. In Chi Xiaocheng's view, its effect was no worse than these two skills!
0030.speaker: 旁白
0030.cn: 特别是那个灰姑娘的手帕，在池小橙看来，作用不比这两个技能差！

0030.en: If she gave it to Su Tao, her impression in Su Tao's heart could deepen further.
0030.speaker: 旁白
0030.cn: 如果给苏桃的话，自己在她的心中印象就能进一步加深。

0030.en: Chi Xiaocheng also felt that these two skills were specially matched for her by the system.
0030.speaker: 旁白
0030.cn: 而且池小橙还感觉，这两个技能也是系统特意搭配给她的。

0030.en: Her eye color was already an unusual crimson red. Every time she used her acting skills, Chi Xiaocheng would try to make her gaze look sickly.
0030.speaker: 旁白
0030.cn: 自己的瞳色本就是奇异的赤红，每次演技打开，池小橙都会尽量让自己眼神病态。

0030.en: Now with this Cat Eyes skill, she wouldn't have to glare like she was cross-eyed.
0030.speaker: 旁白
0030.cn: 现在有这个猫瞳技能，她就不用瞪得跟个斗鸡眼似的。

0030.en: The other Surface Recovery skill needed no explanation.
0030.speaker: 旁白
0030.cn: 另一个表皮恢复的技能更不必多说。

0030.en: Recovery skills were like mini-miracles for her current self!
0030.speaker: 旁白
0030.cn: 恢复技能对现在的自己而言都是小神技！

0030.en: And they said the lottery was completely random.
0030.speaker: 旁白
0030.cn: 还说什么抽奖全随机。

0030.en: "I think you're just being tsundere, System. If you love me, just say so."
0030.speaker: 池小橙
0030.cn: “我看统子你也是个傲娇，爱我就直说嘛。”

0030.en: With over 1000 points left, Chi Xiaocheng wanted to do another ten-pull right away.
0030.speaker: 旁白
0030.cn: 剩下1000多点，池小橙都想直接再来个十连了。

0030.en: But reason ultimately won over impulse.
0030.speaker: 旁白
0030.cn: 但理智终究是战胜了冲动。

0030.en: "System, exchange for a Body Strengthening Potion in the shop."
0030.speaker: 池小橙
0030.cn: “统子，商城兑换强身药剂。”

0030.en: [Body Strengthening Potion exchanged successfully for 800 Emotion Points]
0030.speaker: 系统
0030.cn: 【强身药剂800情绪值兑换成功】

0030.en: A dark red potion appeared in her hand.
0030.speaker: 旁白
0030.cn: 一瓶殷红色的药剂出现在了手中。

0030.en: Small permanent improvement to physical condition.
0030.speaker: 旁白
0030.cn: 小幅度永久提升身体素质。

0030.en: Without hesitation, Chi Xiaocheng drank it down.
0030.speaker: 旁白
0030.cn: 二话不说，池小橙喝了下去。

0030.en: She felt a warmth flow from her stomach throughout her body. She exhaled a breath of stale air and looked at the system panel.
0030.speaker: 旁白
0030.cn: 感觉一阵暖意自腹部流向全身，她呼了一口浊气，看向系统面板。

0030.en: [Host: Chi Xiaocheng]
0030.speaker: 系统
0030.cn: 【宿主：池小橙】

0030.en: [Physical State: Sickly → Sub-healthy]
0030.speaker: 系统
0030.cn: 【身体状态：病弱→亚健康】

0030.en: [Emotion Points: 533]
0030.speaker: 系统

0030.en: [Skills: Acting (Intermediate), Pain Reduction (Intermediate), Hacking (Intermediate), Surface Recovery (Intermediate), Liquid Enhancement (Basic), Cat Eyes (Basic)]
0030.speaker: 系统
0030.cn: 【拥有技能：演技（中）、痛感减弱（中）、黑客（中）、表皮恢复（中）、加料液体（初）、猫瞳（初）】

0030.en: With 533 points remaining, Chi Xiaocheng decided to save up.
0030.speaker: 旁白
0030.cn: 剩下533点情绪值，池小橙打算攒一下。

0030.en: She had her eye on something good in the system shop.
0030.speaker: 旁白
0030.cn: 她看上了系统商城的一个好东西。

0030.en: [Status Glasses (3000 Emotion Points): Wearing the glasses shows others' feelings and attitudes toward the host in numerical and text format. The glasses can be upgraded with Emotion Points]
0030.speaker: 系统
0030.cn: 【状态眼镜（3000情绪值）：戴上眼镜将别人对宿主的好感和态度以数值和文字样式体现，眼镜可花费情绪值升级改装】

0030.en: This was a good thing.
0030.speaker: 旁白
0030.cn: 这是好东西。

0030.en: It was just too expensive.
0030.speaker: 旁白
0030.cn: 就是太贵了

0030.en: "Everything really costs Emotion Points!"
0030.speaker: 池小橙
0030.cn: “真的是什么都要情绪值啊！”

0030.en: Closing the system panel, Chi Xiaocheng spread her legs and lay on the bed in a "big" character position.
0030.speaker: 旁白
0030.cn: 将系统面板关掉，池小橙双腿张开，“大”字躺在床上。

0030.en: After lying in the hospital too much, she couldn't sleep at home.
0030.speaker: 旁白
0030.cn: 在医院躺多了，回家反而睡不着。

0030.en: She picked up her phone again and looked at the social media post she had just made. A bunch of people had already replied.
0030.speaker: 旁白
0030.cn: 又拿出手机看了眼，刚刚发的朋友圈，已经一大群人回复了。

0030.en: Xiu Hua: "Xiaocheng, why are you posting on social media without makeup again? Without some powder, your face looks a bit zombie-pale. Didn't you get the makeup I gave you? Come to school tomorrow and I'll do your makeup beautifully."
0030.speaker: 秀花
0030.cn: 秀花：“小橙怎么又不化妆就发朋友圈啊，不加点粉脸色就显得有些僵尸白了，我的化妆品小橙没收到吗，还是明天来学校吧，我给你画美美的妆。”

0030.en: Soda Water: "@Xiu Hua, how disgusting. Are you jealous of her bare face? So it was you who taught Xiaocheng to do that terrible makeup before. Having a friend like you is really unlucky."
0030.speaker: 苏打水
0030.cn: 苏打水：“@秀花，恶不恶心啊，人家素颜你就嫉妒了？感情原来小橙以前化妆的鬼样子是你教唆的，有你这样的朋友真是晦气。”

0030.en: Xiu Hua: "How dare you talk like that? What does a smelly man like you know about girls?"
0030.speaker: 秀花
0030.cn: 秀花：“怎么说话呢，你一个臭男人懂什么女孩子？”

0030.en: Kun Kun: "Cute."
0030.speaker: 坤坤
0030.cn: 坤坤：“可爱。”

0030.en: Yang: "Can't even take photos properly, so stupid."
0030.speaker: 阳
0030.cn: 阳：“拍照都不会拍，蠢死了。”

0030.en: Want to be Xiaocheng's dog: "@Yang, Young Master Dongfang, when are you going to eat that three pounds of poop you said you'd eat if Xiaocheng looked good without makeup?"
0030.speaker: 想当小橙的狗
0030.cn: 想当小橙的狗：“@阳，东方大少，上次你说小橙是素颜炫三斤翔，什么时候开饭？”

0030.en: Yang: "???"
0030.speaker: 阳

0030.en: Looking at the lively comments, Chi Xiaocheng couldn't help but laugh out loud.
0030.speaker: 旁白
0030.cn: 看着动态的欢乐，池小橙不由笑了出声。

0030.en: Although she had deleted Dongfang Yang's previous reply, the boomerang still came back at him!
0030.speaker: 旁白
0030.cn: 虽然自己删了东方阳上次的回复，但回旋镖还是打身上了啊！

0030.en: Seeing that Su Tao hadn't replied to her message, Chi Xiaocheng turned off her phone and fell into a deep sleep.
0030.speaker: 旁白
0030.cn: 见苏桃没回消息，池小橙关掉手机，沉沉睡去。

0030.en: The next morning, Chi Xiaocheng woke up feeling completely refreshed.
0030.speaker: 旁白
0030.cn: 次日一早，池小橙起床精神百倍。

0030.en: Taking the medicine really made a difference. Usually, her chest would ache when she got up, but now it was much better.
0030.speaker: 旁白
0030.cn: 喝了药就是不一样，平时起床心口总会阵疼，现在好多了。

0030.en: Today was Friday.
0030.speaker: 旁白
0030.cn: 今天周五。

0030.en: She wouldn't go to school. She'd go check out Dongfang Yang's coffee shop first. According to what he said, she should start working as soon as she got out of the hospital.
0030.speaker: 旁白
0030.cn: 学校就不去了，先去东方阳的咖啡厅看看吧，按照他的意思，出院就要上岗了。

0030.en: After brushing her teeth and washing up, having oatmeal and eggs for breakfast, Chi Xiaocheng put on an extra light blue hoodie and headed out.
0030.speaker: 旁白
0030.cn: 刷牙洗漱，早餐吃点麦片和鸡蛋，池小橙多加了一件浅蓝色的卫衣，径直出门。

0030.en: "Whew, it's still a bit cold. I need to save money to buy a cotton coat."
0030.speaker: 池小橙
0030.cn: “呼，还是有点冷，要攒钱买个棉大衣了。”

0030.en: Feeling the outdoor temperature, Chi Xiaocheng rubbed her hands together. The warm breath from her mouth was already visible as little white puffs.
0030.speaker: 旁白
0030.cn: 感受着室外的温度，池小橙搓了搓小手，从嘴巴呼出的热气已经可以看到点点白雾。

0030.en: Leaving the residential area, greeting Uncle Zhang at the gate, Chi Xiaocheng walked straight toward the school entrance.
0030.speaker: 旁白
0030.cn: 出小区，和门口的张大爷打声招呼，池小橙径直往学校门口走去。

0030.en: "Moon Cafe, that's a nice name. North Street near the school isn't far either. I just don't know what the situation is like... hmm?"
0030.speaker: 池小橙
0030.cn: “月色咖啡厅，倒是个不错的名字，学校北街也不远，就是不知道情况怎么......嗯？”

0030.en: Just as she reached the school gate, Chi Xiaocheng squinted her eyes slightly.
0030.speaker: 旁白
0030.cn: 刚来到学校门口，池小橙便轻轻眯起了眼睛。

0030.en: Outside a bubble tea shop at the gate, Su Tao was chatting with a boy. She was looking down, kicking pebbles with her toes, looking troubled.
0030.speaker: 旁白
0030.cn: 门口边的一家奶茶店外，苏桃正和一个男生聊着什么，她低头脚尖撵着石子，面容发愁。

0030.en: "That person is Si Chen, right? Another male lead from the novel. Did he find Su Tao, or did Su Tao find him?"
0030.speaker: 池小橙
0030.cn: “那个人是司辰吧，小说的另一个男主，他找的桃桃，还是桃桃找的他？”

0031.en: Chapter 31: Crisis, Under Suspicion!
0031.speaker: 旁白
0031.cn: 第31章 危机，被怀疑了！

0031.en: Standing in the shade of a tree, Chi Xiaocheng rolled her eyes, wondering if she should get closer and listen to what they were talking about.
0031.speaker: 池小橙
0031.cn: 站在树荫下，池小橙转动着眼珠子，思考要不要凑上去听听看二人聊些什么。

0031.en: Or maybe she should chime in to make her presence felt.
0031.speaker: 池小橙
0031.cn: 或者插上一嘴，增加一下自己的存在感。

0031.en: Standing where she was, information about the original owner and Si Chen surfaced in her mind.
0031.speaker: 旁白
0031.cn: 站在原地，脑海中过着原主和司辰相关的信息。

0031.en: Si Chen wore glasses and was tall, about 1.9 meters.
0031.speaker: 旁白
0031.cn: 司辰戴眼镜，是高个，有1米9。

0031.en: Ye Liang initially had a modest position in his family, but he used his family's resources at a young age to build his own business empire, regaining a firm footing in the family through his own influence.
0031.speaker: 旁白
0031.cn: 叶良起先在家族中地位一般，但年纪轻轻就利用家族资源建立起属于自己的商业帝国，以自己的影响力重新在家族中站稳脚跟。

0031.en: Dongfang Yang, on the other hand, was the sole son who was showered with love. He could live as he pleased and squander the family fortune, living a very carefree life.
0031.speaker: 旁白
0031.cn: 东方阳则是集万千宠爱于一身的独子，生活任你作，产业随你烧，活得很是潇洒。

0031.en: Si Chen was different from Ye Liang and Dongfang Yang.
0031.speaker: 旁白
0031.cn: 司辰和叶良东方阳二人不一样。

0031.en: He was the second son of the Si family. In the plot, he was pushed out during a family struggle and ended up in Jiuzhou City from the capital.
0031.speaker: 旁白
0031.cn: 他是司家次子，剧情设定中他在家族之争中被排挤在外，从京城流落到了九州市。

0031.en: By getting to know the female lead, Su Tao, he slowly gained resources and returned to his family to show them who's boss. At this stage, his relationship with Su Tao was more like a pure friendship between a man and a woman.
0031.speaker: 旁白
0031.cn: 通过和女主苏桃相识，慢慢地掌握资源，重回家族装逼打脸，现阶段他和苏桃，其实更像是异性朋友间的纯正友谊。

0031.en: It was only later, through his interactions with Su Tao, that Si Chen gradually fell for this "white moonlight" and began to compete with the other male leads.
0031.speaker: 旁白
0031.cn: 只是后来司辰在和苏桃的交互中，慢慢喜欢上了这位白月光，与诸多男主开始竞争。

0031.en: The original owner had very little interaction with him, having only confessed her feelings once.
0031.speaker: 旁白
0031.cn: 原主和他的交集很少，只表白过一次。

0031.en: It seemed that Si Chen, with his glasses and gloomy expression, was too intimidating, so the original owner never dared to bother him again after that one confession.
0031.speaker: 旁白
0031.cn: 那次似乎是觉得戴着眼镜一脸阴沉的司辰太吓人，原主表白过一次后就不敢再去惹这个人了。

0031.en: "But this bit of information isn't enough."
0031.speaker: 池小橙
0031.cn: “不过目前这点信息还不够。”

0031.en: Chi Xiaocheng's eyes flickered. "System, spend 200 Emotion Points to buy chapters 160 to 200 of the original novel."
0031.speaker: 池小橙
0031.cn: 池小橙眸子闪烁了一下，“系统，花费200情绪值购买原著小说160到200章的内容。”

0031.en: Her memory only went up to chapter 160, where the original owner died and a new female villain, Chen Qian, appeared.
0031.speaker: 旁白
0031.cn: 她印象只到160章内容中原主死亡下线，新的女反派陈倩上线。

0031.en: Now, because of her, the butterfly effect had already begun, and the subsequent plot could only be used as a reference.
0031.speaker: 旁白
0031.cn: 如今因为自己，蝴蝶效应已经产生，后续的剧情只能作为参考了。

0031.en: Memories flooded into her mind, and Chi Xiaocheng frowned.
0031.speaker: 旁白
0031.cn: 记忆随风涌入脑海，池小橙皱了皱眉。

0031.en: It was just as she had guessed.
0031.speaker: 池小橙
0031.cn: 果然和猜想一样。

0031.en: The following plot completely deviated from the current developments.
0031.speaker: 旁白
0031.cn: 后续剧情完全偏离了现在的发展。

0031.en: In the next 40 chapters, half were about Su Tao struggling with what happened with Chi Xiaocheng and getting over it with the help of the male leads. The other half was about a new, god-like doctor male lead.
0031.speaker: 旁白
0031.cn: 后40章中，有一半章节是苏桃纠结池小橙的事情，并在几个男主的帮助中走出心结，剩下一半章节写的是一个新的神医男主。

0031.en: The main storyline was about healing her injuries.
0031.speaker: 旁白
0031.cn: 以治好身上的伤为主线进行。

0031.en: Ye Liang was still around; he had the highest favorability towards Su Tao and often competed with the doctor male lead.
0031.speaker: 旁白
0031.cn: 叶良还好，对苏桃好感度最高，经常出现和这位神医男主相争。

0031.en: As for a small fry like Dongfang Yang, even in the original novel, he was just an errand boy during this time.
0031.speaker: 旁白
0031.cn: 像东方阳这样的小卡拉米，即便在原著中，这段时间也是打杂的存在。

0031.en: Si Chen was still on his way.
0031.speaker: 旁白
0031.cn: 司辰还在骑马赶来的路上。

0031.en: "Although the follow-up plot doesn't mention him yet, his relationship with Su Tao hasn't warmed up. Maybe I can use this?"
0031.speaker: 池小橙
0031.cn: “虽然后续剧情暂时没有提及，但这人和苏桃的关系还没升温，现在或许可以利用一下？”

0031.en: Chi Xiaocheng squinted at the two people chatting, hesitating whether to go forward and make her presence known.
0031.speaker: 旁白
0031.cn: 池小橙眯着眼看着聊天的二人，犹豫要不要上前增添自己的存在感。

0031.en: Suddenly, Si Chen, who had been chatting with Su Tao, turned his head. His deep eyes were as aggressive as a cobra's, and his stare made Chi Xiaocheng tremble.
0031.speaker: 旁白
0031.cn: 忽然，原本在和苏桃聊天的司辰陡然侧过头来，一双深沉的眸子似眼镜蛇般极具攻击性，被一眼盯住，让池小橙不由身子一颤。

0031.en: She quickly lowered her head and slipped into the crowd.
0031.speaker: 旁白
0031.cn: 她连忙低下头，钻进人群中。

0031.en: The idea she just had was completely extinguished.
0031.speaker: 旁白
0031.cn: 彻底熄灭了刚刚的想法。

0031.en: Her sixth sense told her that this person was very dangerous!
0031.speaker: 池小橙
0031.cn: 第六感告诉自己，这个人很危险！

0031.en: After she hurried away, Su Tao noticed something was off with Si Chen and turned to ask, "What's wrong?"
0031.speaker: 苏桃
0031.cn: 而在她匆匆离开后，苏桃才注意到司辰的异样，转头望去询问道，“怎么了？”

0031.en: Si Chen pushed up his glasses with his long middle finger, a sharp glint in his deep eyes. He smiled faintly, "It's nothing. Where were we?"
0031.speaker: 司辰
0031.cn: 司辰伸出修长的中指，从中间推了推眼镜，深沉的眸子闪过一抹精芒，他淡淡一笑，“没什么，刚刚说到哪里了？”

0031.en: Su Tao: "I was just asking, if a yandere existed in real life, how do you think they should be treated?"
0031.speaker: 苏桃
0031.cn: 苏桃：“就是说，你认为现实中要是有病娇这样的存在，应该怎么去治疗呢？”

0031.en: Fleeing from the school gate, Chi Xiaocheng kept muttering to herself, recalling the look he gave her. "What's with that guy? It's the first time I've ever felt such an intense aura, like he wanted to tear me to pieces."
0031.speaker: 池小橙
0031.cn: 逃离校门口，池小橙还在不断嘀咕，回忆着刚刚的那个眼神，“那家伙到底是什么情况，我还是第一次直直地感受到那样的气势，感觉像是要把我撕碎一样。”

0031.en: She silently warned herself not to provoke Si Chen until she could protect herself.
0031.speaker: 旁白
0031.cn: 心中暗暗告诫自己能自保前先不要去惹那个司辰。

0031.en: Soon, she arrived outside the Moonlight Cafe.
0031.speaker: 旁白
0031.cn: 很快，就来到了月色咖啡厅的外面。

0031.en: Because she had told Dongfang Yang before leaving, the young master was now standing at the entrance, bored and playing with his phone.
0031.speaker: 旁白
0031.cn: 由于她出门前和东方阳说了一声，现在这位大少爷正无聊地站在门口，把玩手机。

0031.en: She took out her phone and checked her outfit: a cute bear hoodie hiding her small frame, her brown hair down, with two small white lotus hairpins holding back a bit of hair on each side.
0031.speaker: 旁白
0031.cn: 拿出手机看了眼自己的打扮，可爱的小熊卫衣藏住娇小的身子，茶色秀发披散而下，两侧由两枚小巧的白莲花发夹带起一撮发丝。

0031.en: Unlike traditional twin tails, these two strands swayed with her movements, giving off the pure charm of a girl next door.
0031.speaker: 旁白
0031.cn: 不似传统的双马尾，这别出的两抹随主人姿态晃动，邻家小妹的清纯油然而生。

0031.en: She walked over, deliberately staying out of Dongfang Yang's line of sight.
0031.speaker: 旁白
0031.cn: 她走过去，故意在东方阳的视野外。

0031.en: Then she jumped out, "Boss, are you waiting for me?"
0031.speaker: 池小橙
0031.cn: 然后跳了出来，“老板，在等我吗？”

0031.en: Your little cutie has suddenly appeared!
0031.speaker: 旁白
0031.cn: 你的小可爱突然出现！

0031.en: Dongfang Yang was startled, and those words immediately popped into his head.
0031.speaker: 旁白
0031.cn: 东方阳被吓了一跳，脑海中紧接着出现了这几个字。

0031.en: He cleared his throat, fist to his lips. "The AC just turned on in the cafe and it's a bit hot. I was just getting some fresh air while they adjust the temperature."
0031.speaker: 东方阳
0031.cn: 他握拳放在唇边，轻咳了一下，“咖啡厅里刚开了空调有点热，正在调温，我在外面吹吹凉风而已。”

0031.en: "I see..." Chi Xiaocheng said, staring straight at him. "I would have been very happy if you said you were waiting for me!"
0031.speaker: 池小橙
0031.cn: “这样啊...”池小橙感叹一声，直勾勾地盯着他，“如果老板说在等我的话，我会很开心的！”

0031.en: Meeting her expectant gaze, Dongfang Yang's heart skipped a beat for no reason.
0031.speaker: 旁白
0031.cn: 对上的期待的视线，东方阳没来由地心底一慌。

0031.en: He quickly scoffed, "Don't be so full of yourself, you idiot. It's just a coincidence."
0031.speaker: 东方阳
0031.cn: 旋即轻哼着嘲笑道，“别自作多情了你个蠢货，只是凑巧遇上你而已。”

0031.en: With that, he walked into the cafe first.
0031.speaker: 旁白
0031.cn: 说罢，他率先走进咖啡厅。

0031.en: Following behind him, Chi Xiaocheng had a playful smile on her face.
0031.speaker: 旁白
0031.cn: 跟在他背后的池小橙则扯出点点玩弄的笑容。

0031.en: A little tsundere. You think I can't handle you with a direct approach like that?
0031.speaker: 池小橙
0031.cn: 小傲娇，这样的直球还拿捏不了你？

0031.en: When they got to the cafe, Dongfang Yang started explaining the job to Chi Xiaocheng. "Your job is to just sit here. You can take money, chat with customers, and if you don't know how to make coffee, just have Chu San help you."
0031.speaker: 东方阳
0031.cn: 来到咖啡厅，东方阳就给池小橙介绍起了工作，“你的任务呢，就是没事在这里坐着，收钱也好陪客人聊天也好，调咖啡你不会的话就让褚三帮你。”

0031.en: The honest-looking man waiting at the counter smiled at Chi Xiaocheng. "Hello, Miss. My name is Chu San."
0031.speaker: 褚三
0031.cn: 在吧台候着的憨厚汉子对池小橙微微一笑，“小姐您好，我叫褚三。”

0031.en: Dongfang Yang waved his hand. "No need to be so formal. She's just another worker."
0031.speaker: 东方阳
0031.cn: 东方阳摆摆手，“不用那么客气，她也是个臭打工的。”

0031.en: Then he looked at Chi Xiaocheng again. "For now, it's just the two of you in the cafe. If you don't understand something, ask Chu San. I don't care what you do, but don't run my cafe into the ground, got it?"
0031.speaker: 东方阳
0031.cn: 然后又看向池小橙，“目前咖啡厅就你们两个，有不懂的就问褚三，你干什么我管不着，但别把我这咖啡厅弄倒闭了，知道了吗？”

0031.en: Chi Xiaocheng nodded meekly. "Boss, can I use my phone at work?"
0031.speaker: 池小橙
0031.cn: 池小橙弱弱点头，“老板，我能上班玩手机吗？”

0031.en: Dongfang Yang's mouth twitched. "As long as it doesn't interfere with your work."
0031.speaker: 东方阳
0031.cn: 东方阳嘴角一抽，“不允许耽误工作。”

0031.en: "Okay."
0031.speaker: 池小橙
0031.cn: “好的。”

0031.en: So that means I can use it.
0031.speaker: 池小橙
0031.cn: 那就是可以玩的了。

0031.en: It seemed like he was just looking for an excuse to let her pay off her debt; he probably never expected her to actually run this cafe.
0031.speaker: 旁白
0031.cn: 怎么看都是找个理由让自己还债，恐怕他就没指望自己经营这家咖啡厅。

0031.en: His main goal was to give himself a reason to help her pay her debt and to protect her.
0031.speaker: 旁白
0031.cn: 给自己找个理由还债，庇护自己才是最主要的。

0031.en: Even if his starting point was the female lead, Su Tao.
0031.speaker: 旁白
0031.cn: 即便出发点是因为女主苏桃。

0031.en: But Dongfang Yang's opinion of her had clearly changed.
0031.speaker: 旁白
0031.cn: 但东方阳对自己的观感，显然改变。

0031.en: Sighing internally, Chi Xiaocheng bowed again and said seriously, "Thank you, Young Master Dongfang. I'll do my best!"
0031.speaker: 池小橙
0031.cn: 心中感叹，池小橙再度鞠躬，很是认真道，“谢谢东方少爷，我会努力的！”

0031.en: This 'thank you' was from the heart.
0031.speaker: 旁白
0031.cn: 这句谢谢是发自内心的。

0031.en: He wasn't a bad person, he just had a different position than her.
0031.speaker: 旁白
0031.cn: 这人并不坏，只是和自己的立场不同。

0031.en: Don't worry, Dongfang Yang, I'll take good care of Taotao for you!
0031.speaker: 池小橙
0031.cn: 东方阳你放心吧，我会替你好好照顾桃桃的！

0031.en: In the future, whether we're kissing or in bed, I'll silently say your name in my heart and thank you for your contribution, just to make you feel included.
0031.speaker: 池小橙
0031.cn: 以后无论是亲嘴还是在床上，我会在心中默念一声你的名字并感谢你的付出，让你也有点参与感。

0031.en: Dongfang Yang had come to the cafe mainly to show Chi Xiaocheng around. Now that the introductions were done, he was planning to leave.
0031.speaker: 旁白
0031.cn: 东方阳来咖啡厅，主要也是让池小橙认识一下这里的情况，现在介绍完毕，他便打算离开。

0031.en: But before he left, he mentioned the hospitalization. "Although I don't know what you and Su Tao are hiding from me, I hope you'll be more rational, and don't break Su Tao's heart. Especially what happened last time, don't be so willful again."
0031.speaker: 东方阳
0031.cn: 不过临走时，还是对池小橙提了一嘴住院的事情，“虽然我不知道你和苏桃有什么是瞒着我的，但也希望你做任何事情的时候理智一点，别伤了苏桃的心，特别是上上次的事情，别再任性了。”

0031.en: Hearing this, Chi Xiaocheng's heart skipped a beat.
0031.speaker: 旁白
0031.cn: 池小橙听完，心里一惊。

0031.en: She quickly nodded like a chicken pecking at rice.
0031.speaker: 旁白
0031.cn: 连忙小鸡啄米般点头。

0031.en: 'Last time' referred to the basement incident.
0031.speaker: 旁白
0031.cn: 上上次，指的是地下室。

0031.en: He still suspects me!
0031.speaker: 池小橙
0031.cn: 还是被怀疑了！

0031.en: Although his impression of her had improved, his doubts had clearly not disappeared.
0031.speaker: 旁白
0031.cn: 他对自己的观感虽然好了不少，但心中的疑惑明显没有减少。

0031.en: "I need to prove that my emotional breakdown and psychological problems were because I was bullied. I need a source of despair to be the root of my yandere personality."
0031.speaker: 池小橙
0031.cn: “我被欺负所以情绪崩溃并出现心理问题的这个理由，得证实一下才行，我需要堪比绝望的压抑来作为病娇的源头。”

0031.en: For a moment, Dongfang Yang's suspicious glance and Si Chen's snake-like eyes flashed through her mind.
0031.speaker: 旁白
0031.cn: 一瞬间，脑海闪过东方阳刚刚的一抹怀疑，还有司辰眼镜蛇般的眼神。

0031.en: Chi Xiaocheng began to plot, recalling the people who used to bully the original owner.
0031.speaker: 旁白
0031.cn: 池小橙心中盘算，脑海逐渐回忆曾经欺负过原主的一些人。

0031.en: She took out her phone and sent a WeChat message to someone named "Liu Guijia."
0031.speaker: 旁白
0031.cn: 她拿出手机，给一个ID备注“刘桂嘉”的人发去了微信消息。

0031.en: "Liu Guijia, when are you going to pay me back?"
0031.speaker: 池小橙
0031.cn: “刘桂嘉，什么时候还我钱？”

0031.en: Right now, I'm just a weak and helpless little lolita!
0031.speaker: 池小橙
0031.cn: 现在的我，可是软弱可欺的小萝莉啊！

0031.en: Chi Xiaocheng slowly looked up, a fierce glint in her rational eyes.
0031.speaker: 旁白
0031.cn: 池小橙缓缓抬头，理智的双眼透出一抹狠戾。

0032.en: Chapter 32: Former "Sisters"
0032.speaker: 旁白
0032.cn: 第32章 昔日的“姐妹”

0032.en: Liu Guijia, like Huang Limei, was one of the three main bullies who targeted the original owner in high school.
0032.speaker: 旁白
0032.cn: 刘桂嘉和黄莉梅一样，是高中时期欺负原主的三巨头之一。

0032.en: Although she only got into a vocational college, she was also in Jiuzhou City. In the original owner's memory, Liu Guijia had troubled her several times in the past two months.
0032.speaker: 旁白
0032.cn: 如今虽然只考了一个大专，但却也在九州市，记忆中这两个月刘桂嘉找了好几次原主麻烦。

0032.en: It was always verbal insults, and if she dared to resist, they would beat her up and force her to hand over her money.
0032.speaker: 旁白
0032.cn: 每次都是语言上的侮辱，敢反抗就打一顿，然后逼她把钱交出来。

0032.en: This could already be considered a crime, but the original owner didn't dare to call the police or fight back. The oppressive environment had twisted her, and Su Tao's situation just happened to be the final straw, becoming an outlet for her frustration.
0032.speaker: 旁白
0032.cn: 这已经可以定性为犯罪了，奈何原主不敢报警，也不敢反抗，压抑的环境使她变得扭曲，恰巧苏桃的事情又撞枪口上，于是被她以作发泄的源头。

0032.en: Even so, Su Tao still treated the original owner gently, trying to change her for the better, which shows the charm of the "white moonlight" character.
0032.speaker: 旁白
0032.cn: 然是这样，苏桃依旧温柔地对待原主，想感化她，可见白月光人设的魅力。

0032.en: *Since I already have a conflict with them, how should I get bullied?*
0032.speaker: 池小橙
0032.cn: 本就和自己有矛盾，那应该怎么被欺负呢？

0032.en: Chi Xiaocheng looked at the message she had sent and smiled playfully.
0032.speaker: 旁白
0032.cn: 池小橙看着自己发去的消息，玩味地笑了笑。

0032.en: As expected, Liu Guijia sent a message back, "Sure, I'll wait for you at your place?"
0032.speaker: 刘桂嘉
0032.cn: 果不其然，刘桂嘉发了消息过来，“可以啊，我在你家等你？”

0032.en: "Okay."
0032.speaker: 池小橙

0032.en: *They used to bully me on the way home, but now they dare to come directly to my house.*
0032.speaker: 池小橙
0032.cn: 之前欺负自己还是在回家的路上，这下倒好，竟然敢直接跑到自己家里。

0032.en: Chi Xiaocheng didn't have to guess to know that the other person was laughing out of anger.
0032.speaker: 旁白
0032.cn: 池小橙不用猜就知道，对方已经被气笑了。

0032.en: For someone who had been bullied for so long to suddenly ask for money back, the first reaction would naturally be to find it ridiculous.
0032.speaker: 旁白
0032.cn: 长期被欺负的家伙，忽然跟自己说要求还钱，第一反应自然是觉得可笑。

0032.en: *"What kind of trash are you to dare to fight back?"*
0032.speaker: 旁白
0032.cn: 什么档次的小垃圾，竟然还敢反抗了？

0032.en: *"It seems you haven't been taught enough of a lesson."*
0032.speaker: 旁白
0032.cn: 看来是还没教训够。

0032.en: —If she were in their shoes, Chi Xiaocheng would have thought the same thing. But it didn't matter; she was going home this time specifically to *be* bullied.
0032.speaker: 旁白
0032.cn: ——换位思考下，池小橙肯定也会这样想，但没关系，这次回家就是奔着被欺负去的。

0032.en: *But if no one knew I was being bullied, the plan wouldn't be as effective.*
0032.speaker: 池小橙
0032.cn: 但如果没人知道自己被欺负，这次计划效果就没那么强了。

0032.en: Chi Xiaocheng thought for a moment, then glanced at the simple-looking man behind the counter.
0032.speaker: 旁白
0032.cn: 池小橙稍微思考了一下，又看了眼吧台的憨厚汉子。

0032.en: She said slowly, "Well, I'll go home and prepare today. I'll come for my first official shift tomorrow?"
0032.speaker: 池小橙
0032.cn: 缓缓道，“那我今天先回去准备准备，明天我来正式上岗？”

0032.en: Chu San nodded, "Okay."
0032.speaker: 褚三
0032.cn: 褚三点了点头，“好的。”

0032.en: "Mhm, I'll go back and study up on the relevant information. Let's add each other on WeChat, so you can contact me if anything comes up."
0032.speaker: 池小橙
0032.cn: “嗯嗯，我回去学习一下这些相关的知识，我们加一下微信吧，有什么事情你可以联系我。”

0032.en: Chi Xiaocheng took the initiative to add Chu San on WeChat, then returned to her seat to pack her things. She waved with a smile, "I'll have to trouble Uncle Chu San to watch the store alone today. Bye-bye~"
0032.speaker: 池小橙
0032.cn: 池小橙主动加了褚三的微信，而后又回到自己的座位收拾东西，笑吟吟地招手，“今天就麻烦褚三叔叔一个人看店啦，拜拜~”

0032.en: Waving her small hand, Chi Xiaocheng left the shop with a light spring in her step.
0032.speaker: 旁白
0032.cn: 挥着小手，池小橙脚步轻快地出了店门。

0032.en: The uncle watched her with a gentle expression, "I wish I had such a cute daughter too."
0032.speaker: 褚三
0032.cn: 看得大叔一脸温柔，“我要是也有这么可爱的一个女儿就好了。”

0032.en: Unfortunately, he was 35 now and didn't even have a wife.
0032.speaker: 旁白
0032.cn: 可惜他现在35了，连老婆都没有。

0032.en: After accepting the friend request on WeChat, Chu San continued to wait at the counter. With his sharp eyes, he suddenly spotted a handkerchief on the table Chi Xiaocheng had just left.
0032.speaker: 旁白
0032.cn: 微信点击同意好友，褚三继续在吧台候着，眼尖的他，忽然在池小橙刚刚的桌上发现一块手帕。

0032.en: It was pink and orange, with little cartoon oranges printed on it, and seemed to carry the faint, sweet scent of a young girl.
0032.speaker: 旁白
0032.cn: 粉橙相间，上面还印着一个个卡通的小橙子，好似残留独属于女孩子的淡香。

0032.en: He walked over, puzzled, and blinked. "Did the young lady from just now leave this? It seems she forgot to take it."
0032.speaker: 褚三
0032.cn: 疑惑着走了过去，褚三眨了眨眼，“刚刚那位小姐留下的吗，看来是忘记拿了。”

0032.en: "She's coming again tomorrow, so I'll just leave it here for now."
0032.speaker: 褚三
0032.cn: “她明天也会过来，先放着吧。”

0032.en: Reaching out to pick up the handkerchief, Chu San suddenly frowned again. "But what if this is something important? Maybe I should let her know."
0032.speaker: 褚三
0032.cn: 伸手将手帕拿起，褚三忽然又皱了皱眉，“可万一这是什么比较重要的东西，要不还是知会她一声吧。”

0032.en: Changing his mind, Chu San sent a message to Chi Xiaocheng.
0032.speaker: 旁白
0032.cn: 心中改变了想法，褚三给池小橙发去了消息。

0032.en: It wasn't until more than ten minutes later, when Chi Xiaocheng was almost home, that he received a reply.
0032.speaker: 旁白
0032.cn: 一直拖到十几分钟后，池小橙即将到家了，他才收到消息的回复。

0032.en: The reply was a voice message, her tone anxious. "Sob... I thought I lost this handkerchief. It was left at the cafe, that's great, that's really great."
0032.speaker: 池小橙
0032.cn: 发来的是一条语音，语气很是着急，“呜呜呜我还以为这条手帕不见了呢，原来是落在了咖啡厅，太好了，真是太好了。”

0032.en: She patted her chest, looking relieved.
0032.speaker: 旁白
0032.cn: 她拍着小胸脯，一副松了口气的模样。

0032.en: Holding the handkerchief, Chu San felt something was a bit off and asked nervously, "Is this item very important to you?"
0032.speaker: 褚三
0032.cn: 褚三拿着手帕，感到一丝异样，紧张询问道，“这个东西对你很重要吗？”

0032.en: "Yes, it's a gift I plan to give to someone. Right now... I'm too busy. Uncle Chu San, could I trouble you to bring it to me?"
0032.speaker: 池小橙
0032.cn: “嗯嗯，这是我打算送给别人的礼物，现在的话...我忙不过来，褚三叔叔能麻烦你帮我送过来吗？”

0032.en: Just after sending that voice message, Chi Xiaocheng added another sentence.
0032.speaker: 旁白
0032.cn: 这一条语音才发出去，池小橙又补了一句。

0032.en: "Actually, that's no good, it would be too much trouble for you. I'll send you the address, could you call a flash delivery for me? I'll pay for it. Thank you, Uncle Chu San!"
0032.speaker: 池小橙
0032.cn: “这样也不行，太麻烦你了，我发地址给你，你帮我叫个闪送吧，钱我出就行，谢谢褚三叔叔！”

0032.en: After saying that, she sent a location pin.
0032.speaker: 旁白
0032.cn: 说完，一个定位发了过来。

0032.en: It included the floor and room number.
0032.speaker: 旁白
0032.cn: 并附上了楼层和房间。

0032.en: Listening to her words, a warm feeling grew in Chu San's heart.
0032.speaker: 旁白
0032.cn: 褚三听着这几句话，心中暖意渐增。

0032.en: *What a considerate little girl, thinking it would be a bother for him to deliver it and asking for a flash delivery instead.*
0032.speaker: 褚三
0032.cn: 多懂事的小家伙，觉得自己送麻烦还叫闪送。

0032.en: *She's so cute, why does the young master always call her a little fool?*
0032.speaker: 褚三
0032.cn: 明明很可爱，少爷为什么总说他是小蠢货呢？

0032.en: Chu San didn't understand, but he glanced at the empty cafe and replied, "It's alright, I'll bring it over to you. No need to call a delivery service. Just wait for me for a little bit."
0032.speaker: 褚三
0032.cn: 褚三不懂，但看了眼毫无客人的咖啡厅，便回复道，“没事，我给你送过去吧，也不用再多叫个闪送，你稍微等我一会儿。”

0032.en: "Okay, okay, sorry to trouble you."
0032.speaker: 池小橙
0032.cn: “好的好的，麻烦你了。”

0032.en: After the exchange, Chu San took the handkerchief and was about to close the shop when he saw Su Tao walking in from outside. "Uncle Chu, are you heading out?"
0032.speaker: 苏桃
0032.cn: 话语结束，褚三拿着手帕就打算关门，却见苏桃从外面走了过来，“褚大叔，这是要出门吗？”

0032.en: Chu San made a gesture of greeting typically used for noble ladies and said respectfully, "Ah, Miss Su. Miss Chi Xiaocheng left a handkerchief here, and I was just about to return it to her."
0032.speaker: 褚三
0032.cn: 褚三比了个问候贵族小姐才会做的手势，恭敬道，“原来是苏小姐，池小橙小姐在我这里落了一条手帕，我正准备给她送回去呢。”

0032.en: "Oh... Xiaocheng isn't here?" Su Tao had thought Chi Xiaocheng was there and wanted to see the environment where she would be working.
0032.speaker: 苏桃
0032.cn: “额...小橙不在这吗？”苏桃还以为池小橙在，想看看她之后上班的环境呢。

0032.en: Chu San answered patiently, "She just came here with the young master to check things out. They left less than half an hour ago."
0032.speaker: 褚三
0032.cn: 褚三耐心回答，“刚刚和少爷来这里看了下情况，刚离开不到半小时。”

0032.en: "I see. I was just on my way to find Xiaocheng anyway. I can deliver it for you."
0032.speaker: 苏桃
0032.cn: “这样啊，我正好要去找小橙，我帮你送过去吧。”

0032.en: "Well..." Chu San hesitated.
0032.speaker: 褚三
0032.cn: “这......”褚三犹豫了一下。

0032.en: Su Tao said with a smile, "Don't worry, Uncle. Xiaocheng and I have already reconciled. Otherwise, she wouldn't be with Dongfang Yang, right?"
0032.speaker: 苏桃
0032.cn: 苏桃笑着说道，“叔你放心吧，我和小橙已经和解了，不然她也不会和东方阳一起是不？”

0032.en: She used to often vent to Dongfang Yang about Chi Xiaocheng at the cafe, so over time, Chu San had heard the general story.
0032.speaker: 旁白
0032.cn: 她以前经常在咖啡厅和东方阳倾诉池小橙的事情，长久下来，褚三也听了个大概。

0032.en: Hearing Su Tao say that, he felt relieved. "Then I'll have to trouble you, Miss Su."
0032.speaker: 褚三
0032.cn: 听到苏桃那么说，也就放心了下来，“那麻烦苏小姐了。”

0032.en: Taking the handkerchief, Su Tao felt a strange sensation. The comfortable fabric felt as if she were stroking Chi Xiaocheng's soft little hands.
0032.speaker: 旁白
0032.cn: 接过手帕，苏桃心中有些微妙，舒适的布料让她好似在摩挲池小橙的细软小手。

0032.en: It was the first time she had ever felt something so peculiar.
0032.speaker: 旁白
0032.cn: 她还是第一次感觉这么奇妙。

0032.en: Little did she know, this was all due to the "Cinderella" effect of the handkerchief. Whoever held it would involuntarily think of Chi Xiaocheng herself.
0032.speaker: 旁白
0032.cn: 殊不知，这都是手帕中“灰姑娘”的效果，拿到手的人会不由自主地联想到池小橙本人。

0032.en: Meanwhile, Chi Xiaocheng had already arrived at her apartment complex.
0032.speaker: 旁白
0032.cn: 而另一边，池小橙已经到了小区。

0032.en: She put her phone away with peace of mind.
0032.speaker: 旁白
0032.cn: 安心地将手机放好。

0032.en: *The audience is ready.*
0032.speaker: 池小橙
0032.cn: 观众已经准备好了。

0032.en: She patted her cheeks and stepped into the elevator.
0032.speaker: 旁白
0032.cn: 她拍了拍小脸，走进电梯。

0032.en: She took off the hairpin that held her hair in low pigtails and messed up her hair by scratching it vigorously.
0032.speaker: 旁白
0032.cn: 将别着秀发两端浅马尾的发夹取下，又狠狠地挠了几下头发。

0032.en: She clicked her tongue and pouted with dissatisfaction. "Sometimes having hair that's too smooth and being pretty isn't a good thing. It's hard to tone down my aura."
0032.speaker: 池小橙
0032.cn: 她啧了一声，不满嘟嘴，“有时候头发太柔顺，长得漂亮也不好，气质有点难降下来啊。”

0032.en: Before going out, she had specially styled her hair to make a good impression on Dongfang Yang.
0032.speaker: 旁白
0032.cn: 出门前她为了以好的印象去拉东方阳好感，可是特意打理了一下。

0032.en: Now, facing the people who bullied the original owner, she needed to appear weak to make them push their luck.
0032.speaker: 旁白
0032.cn: 现在面对欺负原主的人，需要体现出软弱才能让她们得寸进尺。

0032.en: Having no other choice, Chi Xiaocheng put on her hoodie, then rubbed the hood vigorously to create static electricity. In no time, her hair was a mess.
0032.speaker: 旁白
0032.cn: 没办法，池小橙把卫衣的帽子盖上，然后狠狠摩擦帽子产生静电，没一会儿头发就乱糟糟的。

0032.en: But even so, it couldn't hide her cuteness.
0032.speaker: 旁白
0032.cn: 可即便如此，也掩盖不了自身的可爱。

0032.en: But it was enough.
0032.speaker: 旁白
0032.cn: 但已经足够了。

0032.en: The elevator doors opened.
0032.speaker: 旁白
0032.cn: 电梯门打开。

0032.en: Chi Xiaocheng, wearing her hood, slouched her body slightly.
0032.speaker: 旁白
0032.cn: 池小橙戴着卫帽，稍微佝偻了一下身子。

0032.en: *Acting, begin!*
0032.speaker: 池小橙
0032.cn: 演技，展开！

0032.en: She looked completely like a timid, delicate, and harmless girl.
0032.speaker: 旁白
0032.cn: 完全一副胆怯娇弱的无害女孩。

0032.en: As she stepped out of the elevator, she saw two girls waiting in the hallway.
0032.speaker: 旁白
0032.cn: 走出电梯门，她便看到有两个女生在楼道这里等着了。

0032.en: They wore revealing clothes that showed their stomachs and thighs, had bleached-blond highlights, smoked, had lip piercings, heavy eyeshadow, and various chains characteristic of delinquent girls.
0032.speaker: 旁白
0032.cn: 露着肚子和大腿的小尺度衣服，挑染一头黄毛，吸烟、唇钉、重重的眼影，此外还有不良少女特有的各种链子装饰。

0032.en: *Now that's the classic image of a villain.*
0032.speaker: 池小橙
0032.cn: 这才是经典的反派印象啊。

0032.en: *Looking at myself, also a villain, I have no presence at all.*
0032.speaker: 池小橙
0032.cn: 再看看自己，同样是反派，一点气势都没有。

0032.en: She walked into the hallway, the "da da" sound of her canvas shoes echoing crisply.
0032.speaker: 旁白
0032.cn: 她走入楼道，布凡鞋踏出“哒哒”的声音吟唱清脆。

0032.en: The blonde leader, Liu Guijia, looked at Chi Xiaocheng, her head held high with a mocking smile. "Well, well, if it isn't our dear little Xiaocheng, back home."
0032.speaker: 刘桂嘉
0032.cn: 为首的黄毛，刘桂嘉看向池小橙，高高地抬着脑袋，扬起讥讽的笑容，“哟，我们可爱的小橙回来了呀。”
